159b5(dkon brtsegs): par ston par byed pas/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das ni nga/ snang ba chen po byed par 'gyur te/ deng nga ji lta ba bzhi na bas bye brag tu gyur pa ci yang me // de nas bcom ldan 'das la
159b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs nas/ slang ma'i dus kyi tshe/ sems
159b7(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang / yon tan dpag tu ma mchis par 'thob pa 'gyur bar mdzadadu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ 
159b8(dkon brtsegs): yang 'od zer chen po rab tu bkye'o// gzhan yang phyag sor cig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yo bar mdzad pas/ sems can rnams bde ba chen po thob par gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor
160a1(dkon brtsegs): deng 'dus pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams lha'i me tog dam pa dang / 
160a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i gos dam pa dag gis mngon par gtor nas/ dus cig tu lha'i rol mo rnams byas so// lha tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang lha'i gos rgyang nas mngon par gtor nas/ nam mkha' kun tu gang bar gyur to// skad 'thun
160a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'di skad du// kye ma sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni bsam gyis mi khyabo// gang gis chos zab mo 'di yongasu 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni/ sems can thams cad kyis gus par mchod cing / phyag bya ba'i 'os su
160a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur par rig par bya'o zhes smraso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ya ngabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' ya sa la 'di skad bka' stsal to// blo gros mtha' yas ma 'ongs
160a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus na/ gang bsod nams rlung ba'i sems can de dag gis ni ga/ cha'i bkod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pa 'di thos par mi 'gyur gyi/ sems can gang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang / 
160a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs chen po yongasu sdud pa gang yin pa de dag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos 'di thos par 'gyur ro// chos 'di la gang gis nan tan tu bsgrub par byed pa de dag ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yongasu
160a7(dkon brtsegs): gzungs par 'gyuraro// blo gros mtha' yas ma longs pa'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe/ nga'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la sogs pa la yongs su bto// ngas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs
160a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa nas/ blan med pa'i chos kyi gte rab tu bsags pas/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbug tu med pa'i bde ba thob pa gang yin pa de dag khyod kyang 'thob par 'gyur gyis sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams can
160b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis rab tu spangs te/ yon tan gyi rgya mtsho dpag tu med pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mthara' yas byang chub
160b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga brgya dang / khyims bdag ma smad pa dang / tshong dpon bzang skyong la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// 
160b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams mthu ci mchis pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub chen po'i chos yongs su bzung nas/ slad ma'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can rnams la phan gdags par bgyi'o zhes gsol
160b4(dkon brtsegs): to/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jug/ pa'i stan las langs te/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas/ lus kyi gos mchog das pa
160b5(dkon brtsegs): bung de mchod pa byas nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cang yongasu bsngo ste/ sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
160b6(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang / smad ma'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji
160b7(dkon brtsegs): snyed pa de dag yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur bar smon lam 'debs lagaso// de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu dga'
160b8(dkon brtsegs): ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad kun la ni// phan pa chen po bya ba'i phyir// nga yi byang chub chos bzung nas/ chos rgyal seng ge sgra sgrogs shing // ma los
161a1(dkon brtsegs): tha ma dus kyi tshe// gang zhig chos ni yang tshol ba// rgya chen chos 'di thos 'gyur na// thams cad bde ba thob par 'gyur// ngas ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin// gang gis theg pa'i/ 
161a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong zhing // mdo sde tshe 'di thos 'gyur na// ji ltar mos pa'i bde ba 'thob// blo dang ldan pa gang zhig gis// thabs mkhas dag ni rab bsgoms te// chos mchog 'di ni thos 'gyur na// lus dang sems ni rab bder 'gyur// gang zhig
161a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'dir 'dus gyur pa// nga yis mngon sum bshang mthong dang // chos 'di thos par gyur nas ni// rab tu dgar ba gang skyed pa// ma los tham dus kyi tshe/ khyod kyis bsod nams tshad med pa'i// phung po dag ni rab skyed cing / 
161a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba mtha' med sgrol bar 'gyur// ma los tha ma dus kyi tshe// chos rjes rab tu gsungs pa'i// chos 'di gang zhig 'dzin byed pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzungs par 'gyur// ma longs tha ma dus kyi tshe// nga yi byad
161a5(dkon brtsegs): chub chos 'dzin pa// de ni sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i// tha ma'i dus kyi tshe sa 'dzin 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'di bstan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa snyed mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod
161a6(dkon brtsegs): ba thob par gyur to// sems can tshad med pasnyed ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas/ byang chub sems dpa'
161a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan las kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stong ngo // / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i mdo stong phrag rgya
161a8(dkon brtsegs): pa las/ go cha'i bkong ba btsun pa'i 'dus pa ste/ 'dus pa bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// phags pa dgon mthog 'artsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya ba las/ le'u brgyang pa ste/ 
161b1(dkon brtsegs): 'babs pa chos kyi dbyis kyi rang bzhin byed med pa bstan pa/ bam pong po'o// rgyag gang du/ a dradang badra du thakri ti/ a sam byed ni te shanam ma tha yan sung/ bod gang du/ 'phags pa po
161b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong brag brgya pa las/ 'phags pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa zhes bya ba thag pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas pang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
161b3(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub
161b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs tha dad pa nas 'dus pa khri nyis stong dang / lha'i bu thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sum khri nyis stong dang / thabs cig tu
161b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhug so// de'i tshen 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu rin chen mchog ces bya ba yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par/ gyur to// de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di snyam du sems te
161b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa chos ston par bskul ba mdzad de/ bskul nas kyang bshang la/ ci nas kyang bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can yi chad par 'gyur ba
161b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can thams cad nga rgyal med cing shes pa brda sprod par 'gyur ba dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dag 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / 'bras
161b8(dkon brtsegs): bu thob pa dag kyang khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi gdung chud mi gcad pa'i phyir/ skye bo mang po dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas
162a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhal bgrangs me pa la ga par sprungs pa'i byang chub 'di yang yun ring du gnas pa dang / rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs sa ma/ oM su mya ngan mas la
162a2(dkon brtsegs): rung ste/ chos bstan pa gang dag gis thos par gyur pa de dag theg pa gang la mos pas myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'dar bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston ci ma rung sa mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu rin chen
162a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi sems kyi yongasu rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'khor 'di khyod las chos mnyan pa thos par 'ad kyi/ 'khor 'di dag la gtam gyi rgyud la/ 
162a4(dkon brtsegs): zhig la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci las brtsams te spobs par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings
162a5(dkon brtsegs): bI rang bzhin las rloms la khyod spobs par gyi shig/ 'jam dpal gyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyang chos kyi/ dbyings kyi rang bzhin lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das chos
162a6(dkon brtsegs): dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni brjod pa 'am/ mnyan par cung zad kyang rngo mi thog lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las brtsams te/ bstan par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
162a7(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal chos bstan pa 'di thos na/ gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal can dag ni skrag par 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag skrag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang chos kyi
162a8(dkon brtsegs): dbyings kyi rang bzhin can lags pas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni/ skrag par mi 'gyur lag so// de nas tshe dang pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal/ 
162b1(dkon brtsegs): gal pochos thams ca chos kyi byings kyi rang bzhi yin na/ chos kyi dbyis kyi rang bzhin la ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang med la/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yang med na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon
162b2(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bci las 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byis pa so so'i skye bo 'jig tshogs la lnga ba'i phyin ci log gis bslad cing / ngar 'dzin pa dang / 
162b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa la gnas pa rnams la ni/ bdag dang gzhan gyi 'du shes 'byung // bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pa la gnas pa de dag la ni/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag 'byung ste/ sems dang
162b4(dkon brtsegs): sems las byung ba'i chos de dag gis/ dge pa dang mi dge ba'i las mngon bar 'du bya ba dag mngon par 'du byed cing / de dag la rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / ngo bo nyid de'i rnam par smin pa nyid mngon par bsgrub
162b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur // btsun pa shA dwa ti'i bu de dag gi ji tsam du sring ba'i skye ba yongasu bzung ba de tsam du kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o/ btsun pa shA ra ti'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa de yang chos kyi
162b6(dkon brtsegs): dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du yongasu shes pa gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba zhes bya ste/ don dam par ni de la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba
162b7(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ gang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ci yang medo// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can brgya len pa med par zag
162b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams las sems rnam par grom// de das che dang ldan pa shA rA ti'i bus/ 'jam dang la gzhon du gyur ba la 'di gad ces smras// 'angam dngal khyod kyis bslad pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lhag pa'i
163a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal can brgyayin pa med par zag pa rnams las semapa rnam par gror te/ 'jam dngul chos kyi daphyis ni khyod las phyung bar 'byung // 'jam dal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra ti'i bu chos
163a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ston bcings par gyur la/ nga grol ba zhig yin snyam 'am/ smras pa 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni sngon bcings par gyur pa yang ma yin la/ da grol ba yang ma yin// smras pa/ btsun
163a3(dkon brtsegs): ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'o na dge slong de dag gi sems ci zhig las rnam par grol/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos mang po btul te/ de dag gi sems ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las rnam par
163a4(dkon brtsegs): grolo/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra ti'i bu ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yin nam/ smras pa/ 'jam dngul de de bzhin te/ khro bo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yin/ 
163a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci khyod kyi sems len par za ga ba rnams las rnam par grol lam/ smras pa/ 'jam dang / la rnam par gro'o// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ni khyod kyi
163a6(dkon brtsegs): sems lad pa rnam par grol lam/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar zung ba rnam par grol/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems 'das pa ni zad pa'i mtshan nyid yin la/ sems ma 'ongs pa ni mthob pa'i mtshan nyid
163a7(dkon brtsegs): yin/ sems da ltar byung ba ni mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/ btsun pa shA rad ti'i bu/ khyod kyi sems rnam par grol ba de dag gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa ti'i bus/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems
163a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa yang rnam par grol ba ma yin la/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da byung ba lang ma yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA rA dradwa ti'i bu 'on khyod kyi sems rnam par grol ba de gang yin/ smras pa/ ma
163b1(dkon brtsegs): pal kun rdzo rnam par gzhag pas/ sems rnam par grol bar bstan par zad kyi/ don dam par ni 'di la gang bcings pa 'am/ grol ba'i sems dmig su medo// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
163b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la kun rdzob dang / don ngas pa yod par 'dod dpa/ smras pa 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni kun rdzob dang / don ngas pa dmigasum // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
163b3(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'o na ji ltar kun rdzob rnam par gzhag pas/ sems rnam par grol bar ston smras pa/ 'jab dpal nam yang sems rnam par grol ba ci yang med dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA
163b4(dkon brtsegs): rangadwa ti'i bu/ gal te sems shig nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga'i bar na dmig su yod na ni/ sems rnam par grol bar yang 'gyur ba gA na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems ni nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ 
163b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyi ga med par yang dmigasum bas/ de la bcings pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba ci yang med // de nas 'khor de las dge slong nyis brgyas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos pa
163b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / stan las langs da dong nas/ tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ gal te 'di la gu yang rnam par grol ba med cing / su yang rnam par mi grol na/ 'o bu gcag gis rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs dge slong gi
163b7(dkon brtsegs): bos po la don ci yod/ gal te dngos por 'byung ba ci yang med na/ lam bsgom pa la don ci yod ces de ltar dge slong dag smod cing yi chad nas 'khor de nas dong ngo // de nas 'jam dpal
163b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhor nur gyur pas/ dge slong de dag 'dul ba'i dbang rig nas/ lam gang nas dge slong de dag don pa'i lam de'i mdun du sprul pa'i dge slong zhig sprul to// de nas dge slong de dag sprul pa'i dge slong deg la ba der rdo rjerje
163b9(dkon brtsegs): lpags nas/ sprul pa'i dge slong de la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa khyod ga las longs/ de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa dag kho ni 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pa'i
164a1(dkon brtsegs): so bdun pa la ma zhugs/ ma shes mamos/ 'dim ches nas/ kha bal kho den pa song ngo // denas ge slong nyis brgya ba de dag gis cang 'a gad ces smras// kho bcag kyang yangam dul gzhon du chu
164a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos bstan pa lam zhugs/ ma shes/ mchog/ sid pa ches nas/ kha ba cag 'kho nas dong ngo // de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des/ dge slong nyis brgya po dedag la/ 'di gad ces smraso// che nga ldan pa da/ 
164a3(dkon brtsegs): gis lajam dpal gzhon dur gyur ba'i chos bstan pa la mi 'thun paci zhig thos na/ khyed cag 'khor nas dang / de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'jam dpal gnon dur mur pa ni 'di la yu la yang thob pa
164a4(dkon brtsegs): med/ mngon par rtogs pa med/ rnam pa grol ba med par ston pas/ kho ba cag li bul du sems te/ gal te 'di la sul /  'thob ba med/ mngon par rtogs pa med/ rnam par grol ba medan/ 
164a5(dkon brtsegs): 'o bu cug gi gtu byung shing sred par rdzogs pa dge slong ga sus zam dan ci yod/ 'bru cag gi mangs par sbyong ba lan/ rnas pa la rngon ci yod/ gal te 'di la nges par 'drung bci ma na
164a6(dkon brtsegs): na/ lam bsgoms pa la don ci yod snyam du bsams nas/ kho bo cag 'khor de nas dong ngo // de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed cag ma mos nas/ 
164a7(dkon brtsegs): dong bar zad dam/ 'on te spangs shing mi snyan par brjod nas dong / de dag gis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni ma mos nas/ dong bar zad kyi/ kho bo cag gis spangs pa yang med la/ ma snyan par brjod pa yang mdo// de nas
164a8(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa'i dge slong des/ dge slong de dag la leg so zhes bya ba byin nas/ 'di skad ces kyang smras// tshe dang ldan pa dag rtsod pa med pa ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi mchog yin pas/ mi snyan par brjod par mi bya/ brtsad
164b1(dkon brtsegs): bar ri bya'i/ re shig rje 'gro bar bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag ci sems 'di sngon po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ ser po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ dbang po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ dkar po zhes bya ba zhig gam/ btsod ka zhes bya ba
164b2(dkon brtsegs): zhig gam/ shel gyi kha tog lta bu zhes bya ba zhig gam/ yang dag pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ rtag pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ mi rtag pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ gzugs can
164b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba zhig gam/ gzugs can ma yin pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/ zhes rtogs shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sems ni gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa snang ba med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ rnam
164b4(dkon brtsegs): par rig byed ma yin pa'o// de nas sprul pa'i dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa dag ci gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ snang ba med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ gnas med
164b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i sems de nang na gan so zhes bya ba/ 'am/ phyi rol na gnos zhes bya ba 'am/ gnyi ga'i bar na gan so zhes bya bar dmig su yod snyam 'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin
164b6(dkon brtsegs): no/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gal te sems de gzugs can ma yin/ bstan du med/ snang ba med/ thogs pa med/ gnas med/ rnam par rig byed ma yin/ nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med// gnyi
164b7(dkon brtsegs): gamed par yang dmig su med na/ ci de la yang dag par yongasu grub pa yod snyam 'am/ de dag gis smras pa/ doni ma yin// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gang yang dag pa ma yin zhing / yongasu grub pa ma yin pa de
164b8(dkon brtsegs): laci rnam par grol ba yod gam 'am/ de dag gis smras pa/ de ni ma yid// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de las ba'ams nas/ 'jab dngal gnon nur srur bas 'di skad du chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni/ du
165a1(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mos par 'byung ba yang med la/ rnam par byung bar 'gyur ba yang med do shing bstan te// tshe dang ldan pa dag yang byis pas pa'i skye bo phyin ci log gis badrang pa rnams la ni/ Sha 'dzin
165a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / nga'i 'dzin pa yong su 'dzin pa 'byung // ngar 'dzin pa dang / ngirar 'dzin pa la gnas te/ rtag tu yul rnams la spyod cing gnas pa de dag la ni dmigs pa las byung ba'i sems 'byung ste/ dmigs pa
165a3(dkon brtsegs): zad na/ zad par 'gyur la/ byung nas zhig cing zhu ste gnas pa medo// sems kyi dmigs pa gang gis rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ba dang / lam sgom par byed pa'i sems
165a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni rang bzhin gyis med pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / byung / ma yin pa'o// med pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / byung ba ma yin pa de la ni skye ba yang med/ 'jig pa yang med/ gas
165a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang med// gang la yang skyeb med pa dang / 'jig pa med bdang / gnas pa med pa de la ni bcis pa yang med/ rnam pa la ba yang med// de la ni thob pa yang med/ mngon par rtogs
165a6(dkon brtsegs): yang medo// tshe dang ldan pa dag de las bsams nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad du chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang med/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yang med
165a7(dkon brtsegs): de/ 'di la ni su la yang thob pa med/ mngon par rtogs pa med/ rnam par grol ba medo zhes smraso// de nas sprul pa'i dge slong ngas/ bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong de dag len pa med par zag pa rnams
165a8(dkon brtsegs): la sems rnam par grol lo// de dag sems rnam par grol nas/ yang ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gal ba nga ste phyin pa dang / ma ma ga thugs la mdapal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon par bgabanas/ 
165b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'di skad ces kyang smraso// 'jam dpal khyod kyis ni/ kho bo cag yongasu bskyab so// 'di ltar kho bo cag kyang dam pa'i chos spongs par ma zhugs pas/ nga phyin cad chos 'dul ba zab mo la 'jug pa las phyi rol
165b2(dkon brtsegs): tu gyur pa ma yin// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa dag gis ci zhig thob cing / ci zhig mngon par rtogs na/ rang rang gis bla gos 'jam dpa'al gnon
165b3(dkon brtsegs): dur gyur pa la mngon pa ga/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo cag gis ni/ ci yang thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med pas/ de'i phyir kho bo cag gis/ rang rang gi bla gos 'jam dpal
165b4(dkon brtsegs): gnod dur gyur pa la mngon par bka'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi cha/ kho bo cag la thob pa'i 'du shes yod par gyur pa de'i tshe na/ kho bo cag stan las langs te/ 'khor de nas dong ngo // gang
165b5(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe kho bo cag thob pa'i 'du shes de dang / bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ slar lhag so// dbyor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed ci las bsams te/ de skad smras/ de dag gis smras pa
165b6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa byor thob pa zhes bya ba de ni g.yo ba yin// de ni rlom sems yin te/ gang la g.yo ba yod pa dang / rlom sems yod pa de la ni thob pa yang med cing mngon par rtogs pa medo// btsun par byor gang la thob pa pa
165b7(dkon brtsegs): cing mngon par rtogs pa med pa de ni/ rloms sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yino// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag sus btul/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa ra
165b8(dkon brtsegs): 'byor gang thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa dang / gang skye ba med pa dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'dar ba med pa dang / gang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa med pa des
166a1(dkon brtsegs): btul to// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ ci khyed cag btul ba yin nam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dris shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ 'jam
166a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag sus btul/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang la phung po rnams med pa dang / khams rnams med pa dang / skye
166a3(dkon brtsegs): mched rnams med pa dang / gang so sor spyi bo ma yin pa dang / slob pa ma yin pa dang / mi slob pa ma yin pa dang / nyan thos ma yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
166a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / gang lus dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / ngag dang lda/ ba ma yin pa dang / sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / mtshungs bar ldan pa ma yin pa dang / bral ba ma yin pa des brtul to/ 
166a5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ston pa de su zhig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ da bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa zhig sprul na/ de mtshungs par
166a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yin snyam 'am/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de'i chos gang dang yang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo ci chos thams cad
166a7(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid yin nam/ spras pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dgara' bo// dge slong 'di dag ni sprul pas 'dul ba yin te/ sprul pa'i 'dul ba ci 'dra bar// nyan thas
166a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi 'dul ba yang de dang 'dra'o// btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag de ltar btul ba de dag ni yang dgu par btul ba yid// gang dag chos kyis 'dul ba 'di la mos par mi byed pa de dag ni lhag pa'i dargyal can
166b1(dkon brtsegs): du rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal ji ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun
166b2(dkon brtsegs): pa kun dga' bo// 'di la dge slong tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu dag pas/ yongasu dag par rloms ma su byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / 
166b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yong su dag pas/ yongasu dag par rlom semasu byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// bdag gis thob// bdag gis mngon sum du byas// snyam du ses
166b4(dkon brtsegs): shing / rlom semasu byed pa dang / yongasu rtogs par byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// 'jig tshogs la lta bas skrag cing / bgrod pa cig pa'i lam gyi ro myang bar byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i
166b5(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid gang ging 'jig tshogs la lta ba stong pa'i stong pa nyid des bgrod pa cig pa'i lam yang stong pa'i phyir te/ stong pa de lta bu la stong pa
166b6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis yang dag par mi 'jug pa de ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// btsun pa kun dga' bo gzhan yang dge slong gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bgrod pa cig pa'i lam gyi
166b7(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid de la/ stong pa nyid kyis mnyam par byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo// stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/ 'jig
166b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs la lta ba yang gzhan ma yin te/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba nyid stong pa nyid yin pa dang / stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/ lam yang gzhan ma yin te/ lam nyid stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyiraro// btsun pa kun dag
167a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan pa ge slong ma ris pa dang / gleng pa'i sring pas 'jigs shing / marig palas rnam par grol ba byung ba byed pa ni/ lhag pa'i rgyal can du shes par dbyer// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
167a2(dkon brtsegs): la gnyi su 'du shes 'jug pade ni/ rnam pa grol ba ma yin pa'i phyir// btsun bkun dgu'abo gzhan yang nga/ slong ga 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis skrag cing / rnam par thar pa'i
167a3(dkon brtsegs): gsum po dag gis rkyang bar byed ba dang / byin ci log panis skrag cing / 'dushes pazhi'i da myang ba byed pa dang / sgrib bsdus skrag cing ngar ma lnga lor myang bar byed ba dang / sbyi ma ched drug gas skrag cing mngon pa
167a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa drug ga drung ba byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas pa dun kyis skrag cing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi myang dbyed pa dang / log pa nyid brgyad kyis skrag cing 'bugs pa'i
167a5(dkon brtsegs): lan 'ag rgyang pa'i myong bar byung ba dang / 'dus byas kyi dbus ga gcing / mtha gyis gnas pa'i rnam par 'jug pa dgu byung bar byed pa dang / me dge babatsu las kyi lam gyi
167a6(dkon brtsegs): skrag cing slob pa namo bcu'i myang ba byed pa dang / 'jus bya gyi khams kyis sgrag cing / 'dus byas kyi khams dag gir byung ba byed pa ni/ lhag gi rang rgyal can du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
167a7(dkon brtsegs): bkun dga' bo// de dag thams cad ni gso ba dang / rlom se mas dang smos pa yin te/ btsun pa kun gar ba dzi tsa mjug so ba dang / rlob sangs dang / spros pa dang / sems mam pa dang / ngas rab dang / yin pa dang / grong bang / oM chu
167a8(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa dang / rten pa dang / lhag par med pa dang / sgo 'as pa yod ba tsam du lhag pa byed bang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i dargyal yin pa'i phyir te/ bdun pakun dag bo// de la bu'i dge slong ni lhag pa'i ngul du shes par bya'o// de
167b1(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa kun dga' bo 'dus byas kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid du mi 'jug pa ni/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par bya ba yin
167b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyiraro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang
167b3(dkon brtsegs): ga tshe/ dge slong nang nye bar zhi bas yul thams cad kyang nye bar zhi bar mthong zhing / mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'am/ mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'am/ rig pa zhes bya ba 'am/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'am/ dmigs shes bya ba 'am/ mi dmigs shes
167b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas shes bya bar rlom sem su mi byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ gnyis 'byed par mi byed/ cig tu sdud par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ 'dor
167b5(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed/ 'phro bar mi byed/ mngon par zhen par mi byed cing / chos tha mas cad yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam par yang dag par rjesu mtho ngal/ mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa med par mnyam pa nyid kyis
167b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pas mnyam par bya ba 'am/ mi mnyam par bya ba'i chos gang yang med de/ mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de yang yang dag par rje su mthong zhing / rlom semasu mi byed/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed/ mngon par
167b7(dkon brtsegs): zhen par mi byed na/ thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa 'am/ mngon sum du bya bas rlom semasu byed pa lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas mdo// btsun pa kun dga' bo de ltar na/ dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing // gnyen po mad
167b8(dkon brtsegs): bdang / phyogs med pa dang / rang gi phyogs dang / gzhan gyi phyogs dang bral ba dang / chong ba thams cad chu gcad pa dang / tshor ba dang / tshor ba med pa thams cad dang / dmigs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / ming la byed pa nga
168a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba dang / 'ching bayed pa dang / rke ba len pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu ni ba dang / nye ba zhi ba yin ted ning nga 'dzin pa dang / dayid 'dzin pa dang bral bas chos gang la yang sbas pa 'am
168a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rtogs pa 'am/ mngon sum du bya ba yod pa'i chos de yang dag par rjegu mi mthong ste/ de ltar zhugs pa'i dge slong ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin// des ni nam kha'i khams mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams
168a3(dkon brtsegs): cang mnyam pa nyid rtogs pas na/ chos gang la yang dge ba zhes bya ba 'am/ mi dge ba zhes bya ba 'am/ khang mtho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 
168a4(dkon brtsegs): zag pa med pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dzi garten las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas shes bya ba'am/ 'dus ma byas shes bya bar sgro 'dogs par mi byed do// de'i sgo
168a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs pa med pa nyid kyis kyang rmob sam su mi byed/ rtog par dri/ byed/ rnam par rtog par mi byed de/ yang dag par rjesu mi ma thang ngo // des ni tshas thams cad spro btags pa med par mnyam pa
168a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis mnyam zhing na mkhara' ltar mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa yin// btsun pa kun dgar bo gang de ltar mos pa'i dge slong ni/ yang dag par shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/ de ltar na lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ 
168a7(dkon brtsegs): de las dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du ji ltar rnam par lag mthil la mi chags pa ltar dge sbyong gi chos kyang de bzhin no zhes gsung so// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong nyis brgya len pa med par
168a8(dkon brtsegs): zad pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yang dag
168b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa brda sprod par byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du
168b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i sems de nang na gnas par yang mi mthong / phyi rol na yang ma yin/ gnyi ga med par yang ma yin/ phyi rol gyi yul
168b3(dkon brtsegs): la rgyu zhing gnas par yang mi mthong la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsams par bya ba dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba'i phyir yang rgyu zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de
168b4(dkon brtsegs): yang / sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la rjod bar byed la/ sems de yang yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid du rtog par gyur te dris na/ sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sems can thams cad kyi
168b5(dkon brtsegs): ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs la/ chos thams cad kyi ngo tsha/ nyid kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs shing / dge
168b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid brda sprod par byed pa de ni/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa yino// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub
168b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ gang gtong bar byed pa dang / gang gis gtong bar byed pa dang / gang la gtong bar byed pa dang / gang du gtong bar byed pa dang / gang du yongasu sngo bar byed pa de dag shin tu gtong bas
168b8(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar byed cing / rten par mi byed/ gnas par mi byed/ mngon par zhen par mi ri bar mi byed/ dmigs par mi byed la/ yang dag par rje su mi mthong bas dris na/ shin tu gtong ba nyid dang / shin du mi dmigs
169a1(dkon brtsegs): kya sa te/ mam cad kyang ga kyis sems can thas cad cing ga dogs shing / mams can bams cad kyang sa kyis/ byam byam papa ra nga sa brda ba byed/ 
169a2(dkon brtsegs): nga tu ma sa pa zhes pa'i ba slong sbyin sa sug pad // kwa'i thug nas gang shi / byang chu ma pa ma zheb nibs chus gli sa ma te/ 
169a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can la sa com mas ca kha na ba na gamams cad / bang zhepas yang ga pa'i tha dang dzin/ sra bar rtogs pa/ de sa ga pa tha ba na
169a4(dkon brtsegs): /  sa/ gas /  na ba / 'i bdu byang chu sems pa'i tshogs pa pang rjo chus thas kyis pa lungs
169a5(dkon brtsegs): / 'i thun ga / bya sa sa pa shi tu da / kau kya gas co nyid du/ shi sul man pa nyid du gas/ pams na thams cad kyis
169a6(dkon brtsegs): sa nga / gangs gyi nga gi mas su ma rdzong ba dang / gshes pang tshwa ba gyung mira'i meng byed bye ma dus shi shing / sems can mams cad kyis pa byas pa nga pa dang / 
169b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa dang / bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa dang / byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid
169b2(dkon brtsegs): yin par rtogs shing / chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mthi'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs te/ dris na shin tu zad pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu skad cig pa'i chos nyid dang / shin tu ya ma rla'i chos nyid du rtogs pas/ rgyu ba med pa/ 
169b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis bzod pa brda sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pas/ yongasu dag pa yin// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpas yid la byed pa thams cad kyis
169b4(dkon brtsegs): dben pa'i chos rtogs shing / sgro 'dogs pa med la/ btang snyoms dang ldan pa 'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/ brtsam pa gang rtsom pa de dben pa nyi nga du yang dag par rje su mthong ba dang / de nang dben pas phyi
169b5(dkon brtsegs): rol tu rtsub med par sems can mo su smin par bya ba'i phyir rgyu zhing / brtson 'grus dben pas sems can len par rtogs pa dang / sems can daden pas byang chub dben par rtogs pa dang
169b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dben pas chos dben par rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad dben pas yang dag pa'i mthar dben par rtogs pas dris na/ brtson 'grus de dag nyid kyi rang bzhin dngan pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ dben par brda
169b7(dkon brtsegs): spong bar byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa/ brtson 'grus kyis yongasu dag pa yin// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad mnyam zhing
169b8(dkon brtsegs): bye brag med par gyur par bsam gtan byed / bsam gtan de la sems gnas par 'jog cing / gnas de la yang rnam par shes pa gnas par mi byed pa dang / des rnam par shes pa mi gnas shing / sems mnyam pa
170a1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyis bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid
170a2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rje su rtogs pas/ de ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa zhes bya bar rig la/ dris na/ rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam pa nyi kyis
170a3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid bang sprod par byed de/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa bsam gtan gyis yong su dag pa yin// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems las
170a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi mig gis rnam par sbyangs pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad ma thong ste/ ji ltar chos gang yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba de ltar mthong zhing / gang gi tshe chos gang yang yang dag par rje su mi 'aco
170a5(dkon brtsegs): bde'i tshe/ ci yang ma yin par 'gyur// de ci yang ma yin pa'i shes ba zab pas/ mi nu/ rab tu mi rgyu/ rnam par me d+hu'o// des rgyu ba dang / rab tu chub dang / rnam par rgyu ba thams cad
170a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rgyun bcad pas mi 'khor ro// rnam par mi 'khor ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des gang gis 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i rab tu rgyu ba de 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa dang // chags pa dang / smon pa'i rgyun bcang
170a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir te/ de 'dod pa don du gnyer ba thams cad med par sems can yengs smin par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsdu ba dang / dam pa'i chos yong su gzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum
170a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ bsam bzhin du skye ba rnamasu rgyu bar byed de/ de ni rgyu ba med pa nyid kyis rgyu bar byed cing / chos rnams kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam par 'khrug par mi byed
170b1(dkon brtsegs): de ni de'i shes rapa yin pas/ de shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub rab tu shes pa dang / byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can gyi rang bzhin dang / sems can gyi rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs shing / 
170b2(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin du rab tu shes te/ dris na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa de nyid brda sprod bar byed/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa'i brda sprod pa shes
170b3(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi mig gis yongasu dag pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pas gnas pa na/ des sngon gyi mtha' lus ni/ ma skyes par
170b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu sheso// phyi ma'i mtha'i lus ni 'pho ba med par rab tu sheso// da ltar byung ba'i lus la ni/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / bong ba dang / mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid lta bur so sor rtog par
170b5(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ dede ltar lus la lus kyi rjesu lta zhing gnas pas/ lus kyi rang bzhin skye ba med par rig nas/ lub kyi rnam par rig pa dang ldan pa yid la byed pa kun nas slong bar mi byed do// yid la byed pa
170b6(dkon brtsegs): nas slong bar mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ lhag par byed pa la mi gnas pa yin te/ de lhag par byed pa dang bral zhing rnam par shes pa mi gnas pas/ lus la lus kyi rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom yang / chos
170b7(dkon brtsegs): gang la yang sgom par mi byed/ rnam par 'jig par mi byed// des chos thams cad dngos po med par rig nas/ lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas pa na/ sems gang gis de ltar lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing gnas
170b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems de yang / rgyu ma'i chos nyid dang / brag tsha'i chos nyid lta bur rab tu shes so// de ltar rab tu shes pas bde ba'i tshor ba la rje su chags pa med la/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la long khro ba
171a1(dkon brtsegs): med cing / sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la yang rmongs pa med pas/ ma rig pa bag la nyal bar mi 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe/ nor ba rnams kyis mi
171a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrogs pa de ni/ de'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rje su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin// de de ltar tshor ba'i rje su lta zhing gnas pa na/ chos thams cad la tshor ba'i rgyu ba dag gi sems mi rgyu bas de chos
171a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la sems mi gnas pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi sos spong bar mi byed/ 'dong bar mi byed/ yong su gtong bar mi byed de/ da ni de'i sems la sems kyi rje su lta ba ri dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yino// de chos shes pa
171a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du gyur pas/ chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lba zhing ga danas pa na/ dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pas/ chos nyid la 'jug par byed cing / lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos
171a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams la 'du shes dang / yid la byed pa dang / lta ba dang / kunanas dkris padag gis gnas par mi byed de/ de ni de'i chos rgya sa kyi rje su lwa ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yino// des chos thams
171a6(dkon brtsegs): cang nga bzhin gyi mabyung shing / dngas po med pa dang / nam la rang banyings bur rtogs pa' dring na/ dran pa meng pa dang / mngon pa 'du bya ba med pa dang / dran panye bar gzhag pa brda smod par byed/ lha'i bu de ni
171a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ses dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda spros pa dran pa nye bar gnag pas yongasu dgu pa yino// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa ni gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
171a8(dkon brtsegs): des su shes pa byed/ rnam par rig pa gying / gnas par byed/ ma spong bar byed / rnam par migs par byed/ mi brjed par byed pa dang / dang po dge pa'i rtsa ba rnams kyi thagam pa 'gro ba dang / 
171b1(dkon brtsegs): sna'i sems la mi 'jug pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yong su gtong ba'i rjesu 'jug pa dang / 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems spong ba dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa med pa dang / sems can thams
171b2(dkon brtsegs): cad la gnod sems med cing / rtsod pa med pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyis rma mi 'byin pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi brtson 'grus mi rtsom pa dang / theg pa chen po'i brtson 'grus rtsom
171b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams yid la mi byed cing / mi dran pa dang / bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mi gnas par sgom pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad la mi rgyu ba dang / chos
171b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'phro bar mi byed pa dang / chos thams cad la rnam pa me/ dra bar 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i rnam pa la 'jug pa dang / yul rnams la mi rgyu ba dang / 'phags pa'i
171b5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo rnams kyi rje su 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye/ bo rnams dang ma 'dres pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las ma smad pa dang / bag yod pa lhur len cing / sangs rgyas kyi
171b6(dkon brtsegs): chos yongasu tshol ba dang / bstang mi dgos par dgos pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs pas rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrims skyon med pa'i phyir
171b7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu gdung ba med pa dang / log par zhugs pa rnams dang ma 'brel pa dang / nang shin tu dag pas tshul chos pa med pa dang / ngag gi las yongs su dag pas kha gsag med pa dang / rang gi rnyed pas chog shes pas
171b8(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba med pa dang / tshol ba ngan pa rnam par spangs pas thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang / ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / khams gsum la 'dun pa dang bral bas 'dod pa chung ba
172a1(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa 'dod pa dang bral bas chog shes pa dang / chos thams cad dben par mos pas dben pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa spangs pas don nyung ba dang / spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcad bas
172a2(dkon brtsegs): spros pa med pa dang / 'dun pa dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti mug dang bral bas 'gro ba med pa dang / nga rgyal nges par bcom pas chos la dga' ba dang / sems shin tu dul bas cad shes pa dang / tshul khrims
172a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po kun tu srung ba dang / tingange 'dzin gyi phung pos sems pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi phung pos sems gnas pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi phung pos sems rnam par grol ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs mi 'dong bar
172a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems la das bcas pa mnyams pa dang / rnyed pa dang / !kun+da sti nga / thams cad don du mi gnyer ba dang / sems can pa rdol dag gi nga byed pa dang / gzhan kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir/ bdag
172a5(dkon brtsegs): rjesu bsrung ba dang / rang gi sems la nges par sems pas gzhan/ gyi 'khrul pa rnams mi tshol ba dang / tshul khrims legs pa/ ra bsdams pas 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / slob dpon
172a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi dpe mkhyu med pas chos kyi bgo ba sha byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams rje su srung ba dang / dang por dge ba'i chos thams cad la thog mar 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ro cig pas spyod pa tha dad
172a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pas rlom sems med pa dang / skye ba med par yang so sor rtog la sems can yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsams bzhin du skye ba yang yong su 'dzin pa dang / chos
172a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la gzod sa nas stong pa nyid du yangs sor rtog la/ lta ba thams cad gdul ba'i phyir sems can yongasu smin par yang byed pa dang / mtshan ma med pa yong su 'dris par yang byed la/ mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems
172b1(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la yang lta ba dang / smon pa'i shes pa yang med la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir smon lam thams cad kyang yong su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yang so sor rtog la/ dge
172b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya bas kyang ngoms mi myong ba dang / dngos po ni dngos po med par snang bas/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa la rtog pa dang / lhag par byed pa dang dbral ba'i phyir yid la byed pa med pa dang / sems can bang/ 
172b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa la sbyor bas bdag la bdag med pa dang / nyon mongs pa yongasu btang ba dang / sems can yongasu ma btang bas btang ba dang / ma btang ba dang / thabs dang shes rab bsgoms pas ma zhi zhing zhi la nye bar zhi ba dang / 
172b4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang ma 'dres pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba dang / bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'das pas lam yin pa'i lam dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang ma
172b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dres pas spyod pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa dang / chos thams cad la rtog/ pas gdeg pa med cing gzhag pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / gzhan pa lhag pas rlom semasu mi byed pas/ bdag mi sgrogs pa dang / 
172b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yong su rdzogs pas shes pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags par bzod pas/ mi skye bo'i chos la bzod pa ste/ lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems
172b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i shes pa yin no// lha'i bu mi skye ba dang / mi 'byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba'i 'khor ba yong su 'dzin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yos
172b8(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// skyo zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par rig par bya ba la dga' zhing / mchog tu dga' ba ni byang
173a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba mtshams sbyor ba'i shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no/ 
173a2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu gcod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyun chags pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang zhes 'gras pa ni/ byang chub sems pa'i shes pa ma
173a3(dkon brtsegs): yin gyi/ dag pa'i rtsa bas ngoms mi myong ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// khams gsum du mtshams sbyor bar mi byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can yongasu
173a4(dkon brtsegs): smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bsams bzhin du skye ba yong su 'dzin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin// rang gi nyon mongs pa spong ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems
173a5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa snang ba'i phyir brtson da ni/ byang chubasems dpa'i shes pa yin no// bdag gi phyir byed pa ni nga chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad
173a6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin// yal bar 'dod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can yo su smin par bya bar sbyor ba ni/ byang chub
173a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa zad par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ yodod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
173a8(dkon brtsegs): dang nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// 'aklog pa'i chos mngon sum du byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ 'gog pa yong su 'dris par
173b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// zag pa zad par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa bas zag pa bri bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin// 
173b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa gsum mngon sum du byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa gsum la yongasu 'dres par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin// phung po lnga'i khur
173b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dor ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi khung lor bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin// dbang po drug 'gog par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ sems
173b4(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi bang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// skye bzang par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba'i mtshams sbyor bar
173b5(dkon brtsegs): byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin no// nyan thos dang / rang ngas rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu thob pa ni byang chub sem sa dpa'i shes pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi snying por rnam par grol ba'i
173b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bus sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yino// yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa'i le ru bstan pa 'di bshad ba na/ 'khor de las srog chags khris bla na mang pa yang dag par
173b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal leg so legs so// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes
173b8(dkon brtsegs): ba b.rarda sprong ba de legs par smra'o// 'jam dbral byang chub sems dpa' gang dag shes pa brda sprod ba bstan pa 'di bos na mos par 'gyur zhing / ji skrag zhing / mi skrag mi dang la/ dang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni/ bla na med pa
174a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyi du ba ngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang dag pa'i shes pa ba spyod par 'gyur ro// / dam pa des
174a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces spraso// 'jam dpal ci khyod shes pa brda sprod bar byed ngab/ 'jam dal gyis smras pa/ lha'iri bu gal te kho bos chos 'ga' zhig thob bam/ spangs
174a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na ni/ kho bo shes pa brda sprod par yang 'gyur ba zhig na/ lha'i bu kho bos ni chos 'ga' yang thob pa med cing spangs pa med pas na/ kho bos ci zhig shes pa brda sprod par bya/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod
174a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ba'i klung gi bye ma snyed po dag la sa thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'thob pa
174a5(dkon brtsegs): 'am mngon par rtogs pa'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad// smras pa 'jam dpal 'on/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan las rnams ji lta chos ston par mdzad/ 'jam dbral gyis smras pa/ lha'i bus bya
174a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi phyir gyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa nyid kyis chos ston par mdzad kyi/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gdeg pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / sems can med pa
174a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can dang bral ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khor ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir/ chos ston par ni mi mdzad/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de
174a8(dkon brtsegs): ltar chos ston par mdzad do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'dar ba'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad na/ 'o na gang gi don du sangs rgyas 'byung bar
174b1(dkon brtsegs): 'thung / 'jab dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyasani 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid rdzogs par bya ba'i don tu 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ning rig pa dang / srid pa'i ma
174b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyi ngo bo 'di yang dag par bstan pa'i don tu 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid rtogs par bya ba'i don tu 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni/ phyin ci log
174b3(dkon brtsegs): gi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i don tu 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rtogs par bya ba'i don tu 'thung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi
174b4(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i don du 'byung ngo // lha'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni/ chos thams cad skye ba mang pa'i tshig bla dwags yin te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba med pa de la ni 'khor ba yang
174b5(dkon brtsegs): med la/ yongasu mya ngan las 'dang ba yang me // lha'i dus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de lta na/ sems can gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha ni bgo/ 
174b6(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan pa med pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ phan pa gang gis rab tu phye ba yin snyapa/ smra ba/ 'jam dpal phan pa ni mngon
174b7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'du byed pas rab tu phye ba yino// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par 'du mdzad pa yod par 'dod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mngon
174b8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'du mdzad pa mi mngar ba yin pas/ de ni 'dus ma byas pa bdes pa dang / 'dun ma byas shing mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mngar ba yin// 'jam dngal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod kyis ngas bcas pa de'i kyis ni/ mngon par
175a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dug ma byas pa la ni/ phan pa dang gnod pa dmig su me // lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos bstan pa 'di ni las da po pa rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir she na/ thos
175a2(dkon brtsegs): na skrag par 'gyur zhing / skraganas kyang phyir ldog par 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu las dang po pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' skrag pa dang phyir ldog pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyir mi ldog pa/ 
175a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid la yang dag par gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smras/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos dang / rang
175a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sas skrag cing / ser sna dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrim sa dang / gnod sems dang / le lo dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab dag las bying ldog pa de ni/ phyir mi ldog pa
175a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid la yang dag par gnas pa yin no// smras pa/ lajam dpal dzilta/ ra gnas na/ yang dag par gnas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha/ 'i bu mnyam par gnas shing mi mnyam par gnas pa ma yin na/ de'i
175a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar gnas pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid
175a7(dkon brtsegs): la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid gnas pa de lta bu ni/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yin/ smras pa/ 
175a8(dkon brtsegs): lha bu gang gi tshe sems dpa' dang po nyid nas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i chos la mos pa de'i phyir/ las dang po pa zhes bya'o// smras pa
175b1(dkon brtsegs): 'angang dang 'dzis pa byang chub sems lal yu ri pongs kyang ba yid/ smras pa/ lha'i bam tsham ma'i skye boms cad yun ring bongs byang ba yid te/ deg gi 'thor ba sa kyibapa mim du ma byung / sgrubapa/ 
175b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spyad ba srung ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags la spyad pa yongasasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod chags kyi spyad pa la spyod kyang 'dod
175b3(dkon brtsegs): chags kyi sbyong ba dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' spyang bsrung ba yin no// zhe sdang la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ zhe sdang gi spyad pa la spyod kyang zhe sdang gi spyod pa dang lhan cig
175b4(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas pa dang / gti mug la spyod pa yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ gti mug gi spyong ba la spyad kyang gti mug gi spyod pa dang / lhan ci ga mi gnas pa dang / cha mnyam pa la spyod pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
175b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mnyam pa'i spyad pa la spyod kyang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang ldan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa srung ba yin no// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can yo su
175b6(dkon brtsegs): smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rje su 'jug kyang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyang rnam par 'khrugs par mi byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa srung ba
175b7(dkon brtsegs): yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' chos gang yang 'jig par mi byed/ 'chags par mi
175b8(dkon brtsegs): byed la/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med cing 'chags pa med par rtogs pa de lta bu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa dang
176a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams su yang ldog la/ bsam gtan rnams la yang 'jug par byed pa'i phyir ro// 
176a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpas ma rtogs pa rtogs shing / mi rtsod pa lhur len pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des sems can gyi khams dang / chos kyi
176a3(dkon brtsegs): khams dang / bdag gi khams ma rtogs pa de mngon sum du gyur pas chos thams cad la yang phyir ldog pa med pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ste/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog
176a4(dkon brtsegs): cing / nem nur med la/ the tsom med cing / som nyid dang bral ba'i phyir/ bzod ma nas ngag cing dri ma med la nyon mongs pa med cing / she sa rab kyi snang ba gsal bar gyur pas/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyu
176a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa de'i phyir/ phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpar skye ba cig gis thogs pa yin/ 
176a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba thams cad skye ba med par shes shing / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'bo dang skye ba yang rab tu shes la/ sems can yongasu smin
176a7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i phyir/ skye ba thams cad skye ba ston cing / len pa med par skye ba yongasu 'dzin par byed pa dang / skye ba dang tshe rabs thams cad du len pa dang bral bas/ 'chi ba dang skye ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang / chos
176a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'dar shing yang dag par mi 'angaja' ba dang / d+hu dang rkyen tshogs pa'i don rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad dalus mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad dang sems mnyam pa
176b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can thams cad dang ngag mnyam pa dang / sems can thams cad dang yul mnyam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi yul rtogs pa dang / chos kyi byings mnyam pa nyid kyis
176b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i bya ba zhes pa dang / dus la lta ba dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa de ni skye ba cig gis thogs pa zhes bya ste/ lha'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba cig gis
176b3(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med cing / thams cad du dbyas/ 
176b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed pa dang / nga rgyal gyis byas pa dag mi byed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems
176b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' khan mtho ba med cing thams cad du dbyas med pa yin// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'abyang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas bdog pa thams cad yos
176b6(dkon brtsegs): su gtong ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang ser sna dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin// gang gi tshe/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / brlab pa dang / tshul khrims dang
176b7(dkon brtsegs): yi dam thams cad dang ldan pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yino// gang yang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe/ sems can thams cad
176b8(dkon brtsegs): la khong khro b.ri sems med pa de lta bu ni/ kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang brnab sems dang / gnod sems kyi bag la nyal dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe
177a1(dkon brtsegs): dge pa'i rtsa thathams cad rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus la yang dag par snang ba des du ni/ khanamatha med pa yid// gang yang la lo nga ldan cig mi gnas bden bu ni dpyas med pa yin
177a2(dkon brtsegs): no// gang gi tshe bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de lta bu ni/ kha na mtho ba med pa yin no// gang yang bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro myang ba mi byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa
177a3(dkon brtsegs): yin no// gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi rtsa ba'i thos pa yongs rgyal ba la brtson par lta bu ni/ kha na mtho ba med pa yin no// gang yang 'chal pa'i shes rab dang / lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa
177a4(dkon brtsegs): yin no// gang gi tshe/ rma phyung yang mi 'byin pa de lta bu ni kha nam thob med pa yino// gang rma byung yang rnga mi 'byin pa de lwa bu ni dbyas med pa yin// gang gi tshe ji lta ba bzhin du smras pa de lta
177a5(dkon brtsegs): bu mi khan mtho ba med pa yin// gang yang de bzhin du byed pa de lta bu ni dbyas pa med pa yin na// gang gi cha/ nang nye ba shi ba de lta bu ni kha na mtho ba med pa yin no// gang yang
177a6(dkon brtsegs): rol gyi yul rnams kyis mi gos pa de lta bu ni dbyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la bsam pa tha dad pa med pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yino// gang yang theg pa dman pa la
177a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa med pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin// gang gi tshe/ bdud kyi las rnams rtogs pa de lta du ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin// gang yang bdud kyi las rnams zlog pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yi no// gang gi tshe/ 'jig
177a8(dkon brtsegs): rten na snang ba thob pa des bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin// gang gi tshe/ bya ba dang 'gal bar mi byed pa de lta bu ni khan ma tho ba med
177b1(dkon brtsegs): ba yin no// gang yang bya ba ma yin par mi ltung ba de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tsheng rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / snyems pa thams cad dang bral ba de lta bu ni kha na mtho ba med pa yin no// gang yang ye
177b2(dkon brtsegs): shes dang / rnam par shes pa phun sum tshogs shing / 'phags pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yino// gang gi tshe/ dam bcas pa brtan pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yino// gang yang
177b3(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yino// gang gi tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lugs dang 'thun par byed pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yino// gang yang rten cing 'brel
177b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'thung ba'i chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa med pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe shes rab dang ye shes kyis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par rab tu shes pa de lta bu ni
177b5(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba med pa yino// gang yang thabs shes pas dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad yang dag par sdud pa de lta bu ni dbyas med pa yino// gang yang rtsom pa thams cad la snying rje chen pos 'jug pa de
177b6(dkon brtsegs): lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin// gang yang chos thams cad la rnam par thar bar gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yino// gang yang chos thams cad
177b7(dkon brtsegs): mi dmigs pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin// gang yang
177b8(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa'i lta ba spangs pa'i phyir/ chos ston pa del bu ni dbyas med pa yin no// gang yang tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor zhing / chos gang yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ba de lta bu ni lan mtho ba med pa yin
178a1(dkon brtsegs): ro// gang yang 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du byed pa de lta bu ni dmyal med pa yin no// gang gi tshe chos kyi dbyis ston pa zhes bya bar mo ma rtags pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin// gang yang
178a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no// gang gi tshe khams gsum dang lhan cig mi gan/ de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no// gang yang sems can thams cad la lta ba'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las
178a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dar ba de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin// lha'i bu gzhan yang ji tsam du tshig 'jug pa dang / tshig gis rlom sam su byed pa dang / tshig gis rtog par byed pa dang / tshig la mngon par zhen par byed pa de tsam du skyon yin// lnga'i
178a4(dkon brtsegs): bu'i tsam du chos thams cad la bsnang du myed pa nyid dang / la gru ba med pa nyid dang / rlom sems su med pa nyid dang / rnyog pa med pa ni da dang / 'phro ba med panyid dang / brjod du med pa nyid dang / sems can yos
178a5(dkon brtsegs): su mi gang ba'i phyir/ gtan dus su mya ngan las mi 'ad na nga yin pa tsam du lan mtho ba med ci byas med pa yid do// lha'i bugang lan mtho ba med cing byas meng ba de ni yi ge med pa yin// rang
178a6(dkon brtsegs): la yi ge med pa de ni brjod du med pa yin te/ brjod du med pa'i don la ni kha na ma tho ba med cing dbyas med do// lha'i bu de lta bas na brjod du med pa'i don la rton pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rang gi sems gtso bor byed pas kha na
178a7(dkon brtsegs): mtho ba med cing / 'jagapa rnams kyis grus bya med pa yin do// brdzun pa 'di ba sha ban/ bcom ldan las kyis 'jam dang la gzhon du gyu pa la legs zhes bya ba byin te/ laja mdapal leg mo len mo// khyod
178a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi khanamatho med pa dang / bya med pa de legs par smras// 'jam dpa la gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems da de ltung banamatho bamed ci byas med par gyur pade'i tshi/ sa sa rgyam mos
178b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to// bstan pa 'di thos nas/ 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag thams cad
178b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag du/ ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag tu 'gyuraro zhes/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas 'khor de las
178b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di yun ji srid cig na/ blan mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu
178b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ byang chub thob pa'i ming ni ji skad ces bya bar 'gyur snyamo// de nas sangs kyi 'thus/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu
178b5(dkon brtsegs): rin chen mchog 'di yun ji srid cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur/ 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ byang
178b6(dkon brtsegs): chub thob pa'i ming ni ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di
178b7(dkon brtsegs): ni/ bskal pa 'bum 'das pa'i 'og tu/ bskal pa rin chen 'byung gnas shes bya ba la/ shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bkod pa zhes bya bar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
178b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen bkod pa zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten
179a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams dga' ba bkod pa de yang 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lha dang mi rnams kyis kun tu gang ba dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song thams cad dang
179a2(dkon brtsegs): bral bar 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de ni rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing / lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ rin po che sna gsum 'di lta ste/ bai DUr+ya dang / ke ba dang /  tshu ru
179a3(dkon brtsegs): gser gyis smras shing bltan sdug la/ gser gyi drabs kun nas bkab par 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa ci 'dra ba de bzhin du/ mi de dag gi longs spyod pa
179a4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar spyod pa yang de 'dra bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams deng ni/ bzara' ba dang btung bdag kyang yid la bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi khams deng ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
179a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas dag gi ming yang 'byung ba ba'i 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpang de dgakyang chos kyi dga' ba sna tshogs dang / chos kyi rnam pa rjod/ bsna tshogs dang / bsam gtan dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms
179a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa sna tshogs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa sna tshogs dag gis dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur te/ chos kyi rab tu dgar ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dag gis dga' bar gyur pa ma gton
179a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshor ba gzhan dag myong bar mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rab bkod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni/ yo bye ba brag drug cur 'gyuraro// de'i byang chub sems
179a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpar bye ba phrag drug cur 'gyuraro// de'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa ni dpag tu med par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen po pa
179b1(dkon brtsegs): de gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos rab tu byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpar bye ba phrag drug cur 'gyuraro// de'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa ni dpag tu med par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
179b2(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa de gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par ra gyur pa de'i tshe/ steng gi bar snang la/ ta la bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsam du na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams skyil mo dkrung cig
179b3(dkon brtsegs): gis khyab par byas nas 'od zer brgya stong dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der snang bas khyab par byas shing / lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / phye ma'i char dag mngon par rab tu phab nas/ lha'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdo ba dang / glu dbyangs
179b4(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong dag gi sgra byung ste/ thams cad nga ldan pa'i sa sa rgyas kyi zhing sgras go bar byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di lta ste/ mi zad pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// 
179b5(dkon brtsegs): de la mi zad pa'i sgo'i gzus kyi sgo gang she na/ 'di lta ste/ lus da nga / sems dben pa nyid smyon par byed pa chos thams cad kyi ben/ pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi nges par rtog pa nyi ston par byed pa chos
179b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la so sor rtog pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba med pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi yang dag
179b7(dkon brtsegs): bi'i nan tan gyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ston par byed nga chos thams cad kyi snang ba'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi bye brag med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi
179b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par g.yeng ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi zhi gnas kyi sgo dang / chos thams cad kyi 'gal ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi lhag mthong gi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi 'khrug pa
180a1(dkon brtsegs): meng pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi nges par sems pa'i sgo nga / chos rnams kyi mi brjed pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi dran pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi don rtogs pa
180a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa chos thams cad kyi rtogs pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi ying rnam par dgang ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi blo gros kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa sngon
180a3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi zhi ba nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par gcod pa ston par byang
180a4(dkon brtsegs): ba chos thams cad kyi smon pa med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi mngon par 'du byed pa dang dral ba ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi mngon par 'grub pa med pa
180a5(dkon brtsegs): ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi gnyis med pa'i chos nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi 'byung ba med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi rtog pa med
180a6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi mngon sum gyi shes pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi gnyis
180a7(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi gnyisu med pa nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi g.yo ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi rten pa med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi sems can
180a8(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid dun par byed pa chos thams cad kyi sems cadan med pa nyid kyi sgo dang / chos palas kyi 'gyur ba med pa nyid thun par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi byed pa med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi spyod pa
180b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi gzung ba med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi gzhi yang dag par 'joms pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi gzhi med pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi lhag par byed pa med
180b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi nges pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi 'bras bu 'grub pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi rgyu'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi mi brjed pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi
180b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par brtson pa'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi kun nas ldang ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba'i sgo dang / chos rnams kyi ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi de
180b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi dbyer med pa nyid ston pa rapyad pa/ chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / cho ba rnams kyi ro cig pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi chos kyi
180b5(dkon brtsegs): dbyings kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi dus sum mnyam pa nyid ston bar byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta bzhin gyi sgong nga / chos rnams kyi sgra byangs dang / tshig gi lam gyis brjod pa thams
180b6(dkon brtsegs): cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi badz+ra du med pa'i don gyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi bsam gtan gyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi gang zag
180b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyid ston par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi sgo dang / chos rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sgo ste/ kun dga' bo de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rin
180b8(dkon brtsegs): chen kod pa de na mkha'i dkyis de nyid las ma bzhengs par/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la mi zad pa'i sgo'i gzungs kyi sgo de dag rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur te/ deng yang byang chub sems dpar
181a1(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu me dgras med pa dag gis bzod pa thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'aladas gang la de bzhin gshegs pa
181a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams lhun gyis grub cing mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mngal bas/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la thogs pa mi mngar ba'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar lag so// bcom
181a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo// gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lhun gyi grub cing mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas/ langs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la thogs
181a4(dkon brtsegs): ba mi mngar ba'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa de ni ma 'dres pa yi no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ lha'i bu rin chen mdo ga la 'di skad ces smraso// lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pas blan
181a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ni/ khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed // lha'i bus smras pa// rkun pa kun dga' ba 'di la ni/ gang lung bstan pa'i chos gang yang
181a6(dkon brtsegs): dmig su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/ gzugs kyang lung bstan du med la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems
181a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ma yin pas/ rnam par shes pa yang lung bstan du med pa dang / sa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/ sa'i khams kyang lung bstan du med pa dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi
181a8(dkon brtsegs): khams byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/ rlung gi khams kyang lung bstan du med pa dang / mig byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/ mig kyang lung bstan du ma pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid
181b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/ yid kyang lung bstan du med pa dang / ming dang gzugs byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/ ming dang gzugs kyang lung bstan du med pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba byang / 
181b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/ dus gsum yang lung bstan tu med pa dang / rgyu dang lta ba byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas/ rgyu ba dang lta ba yang lung bstan du med pa dang / 'byung ba dang 'jig pa byang chub sems dpa' ma
181b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pas/ 'byung ba dang 'jig pa yang lung bstan du med pa'i phyiraro// btsun pa kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni/ brda'i gzhi'i tshig bla dwags yin no// de ni nye bar zhi ba'i gzhi yin te/ chos gang
181b4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu nye bar zhi ba de la ni/ lung bstan pa gang yang meng ngo // bcu na ba kun dga' bo lung bstan pa zhes bya ba de ni/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i tshig bla dgas yin te/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang gi
