251a2(dkon brtsegs): ge 'dra// lce bshin tu bcing na rgyas pa/ d+hu D+yan gang sla mdza ba shang dugasol// gas surnam ngag dus dang dri bsnus// bsgyur mel rig mthon cing ldan// g.yas su khyil cing rlom
251a3(dkon brtsegs): bang ldang ba// rgyu rkyen gang srad 'dzum mdzad ba shad dug sol// sku mchog dam pa yongs rdzogs rtags gnas pa/ deper na n+ya grong 'i shing rgyal bzhin// yon tan thams cad kyis ni rab tu brgyan// gsung
251a4(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs dag gis 'khor ni dga' bar mdzad// dadung pa zlum zhing phrag pa sdug la mdzes// gtsug tor yongs rdzogs g.yas su 'khyil par gdang // zhing ni brgya stong phrag med rgyu bar
251a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// sems can log nga yang dag lam sto mdzad/ tshems dgar dri mi mngarabs ru nga 'dra// ljags mtshan srid ri na la ni kun du khebs// 'gram pa sang ge shas kyang
251a6(dkon brtsegs): mtho/ thams cad thabs dang rnam gzugs las skyes// u po la rig sung ni zhal nas dbyung // can dang dri drug spu ni kun tu khyag/ sngon ni byams pa rgya cher bsgoms pas na// rnam dag mos brtag tu
251a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyun mi 'chang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs mngal shin du mnyam// sa la reg kyang rdul ni gos mi 'gyur// gam pa sang gi glang po che 'dra bas// 'jig rten thams cad las ni yang dag 'das// 'khor
251a8(dkon brtsegs): mi rtsibs stong mtshan gyis mdzes par brgyad/ byad 'apags 'od zer dag nir bzhugs pa// dge bdag gis skye gu pan 'dogs pas// gang gis mthong ba dang ba rab tu skye/ sang cig 'od zer brtsa/ 
251b1(dkon brtsegs): spong rab ba kye nas// sangs rgyas zhing ni dpag mang snang bar mdzad// sngon ni dge sbyong mang po rab bsgrubs pas// mtshan gyis bkod pa sna tshogs 'di brnyes lags// gzugs sku longs rdzogs depa zla yongam
251b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis// zhal mtshan rapa mdzes shin du khyad bar 'phags// rdzu 'phrul dag gis 'jig rten pan 'dogs pa// ci smad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad ba shang du gsol// byin pa ri dgas e ne yang
251b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra/ sku dbyings mi gu seng ge ji lta bzhin// 'jig rten byung nas 'jig rten snang mdzad pa// ci spang mdzum pa bstan mdzad pa shang du gsol// cang shes bzhin du mtshan sbas rdul mi mngar/ 
251b4(dkon brtsegs): phyag mthil mnyam rgyas phyag ni pus mo 'das/ mi'i seng geng mtshar khyad par 'phags// ci smang sadzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// sku las 'od zer bag med rab 'gyed
251b5(dkon brtsegs): cing / kha dog tu nom ranani dgagasal pa// rnam sathugs ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad // mang sde tshad me dpa da/ ston par mdang // ngag nga chad bdag la gnas pa yis
251b6(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i chos ni bsgrub par 'gyur ma lags// gang gis mthar lha rnams ni rab spangs na/ bcom ldan rnam dag su ni myur thob 'gyur// lhang 'brug sgra gsung ni kun grags shing // ka la/ 
251b7(dkon brtsegs): dka'i dbyas snyan rab tu gsas// lba'i klu sgra brgya slong mang ldan pa// ci snang 'od zer bkye pa bshad du gsol// 'dren pas gsung cig tu ni chos bstan pas// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can dag rgyun
251b8(dkon brtsegs): yang bcad// de bzhin gshegs pas dbyes rab gang gsungs pa// de kun rab cing ngo mchar chos leg so// khyu mchog smin mtshams 'od zer rab bkye bas/ sangs rgyas ning ni brgya
252a1(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar mdzad// spyad bachog dag ni 'dog payod cing dz+ra// gdun to mchon rnam pa'i lhas mi mthong // tshems dgang gtams pa bzhi bcu ga dang ldan// dper na rin chen chu shes
252a2(dkon brtsegs): gang mjug/ dge ba 'bril dag skyes//  pa sa ga gyu // bgan pa shegs pa yod / dardzogs pa su// bgongs pa dag da na tshogs shing / @
252a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam gang mtsharang rab bye ba// ci smad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa shang du gsol// thugs rje chen po mchog rgyal rkang gnyis gtso// sems can yang dag bsam pathugs su rlung / thogs pa ma mchis spongs
252a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mchog brnyes pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad ba shang du gsol// / de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol la byod pas// rig pag/ sum dang mngon shes drug phur tshogs// rnam dag 'od ze dag
252a5(dkon brtsegs): med ston mdzad pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan sngon ni bskal ba dpag med rnyed// bcom ldan/ brgya stong snyed la mchod pa mdzad// de 'dra'i rgyu 'bras chab ni mi
252a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba// ci smad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshang du gsol// bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med rnyed// ting 'dzin mchog rnams la ni rab zhugs pas// mig gi skye mtha' zad pa'i mthar mkhyen na// ci
252a7(dkon brtsegs): smad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad ba shang du gsol// 'ab pa dang ni ma los daltar dus// 'dren pas de dag kun ni radum khyen// rnam dag mkhyen pa thogs med pasam mi khyab// ci srad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa shad gsos
252a8(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khong mang po'i mdun du phyag gsar gyi kha dag lta bu brgya ste/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo la phyag bgaganas// tshigs su bcad de bga' stsal pa// gnon du shin su legs par nyon
252b1(dkon brtsegs): byang duthog// 'od ze btun pa nga / khyos gang du mo la gyis// ma lam pa ma sa co// tsho na rnam parapa 'angag pan/ khyod gyis sems can rnamamasan// ra
252b2(dkon brtsegs): sha yang gyib// banisal rgya ma spyan dag gis// ma los tham dus kyitshe// shin tu bcing gnom pa'i// mang rdzi ba pa 'di gal// gang mas gang ni mi tshas pa/ 
252b3(dkon brtsegs): mas cad kun kya gzigs shing mkhyen// sems can dag ni gang shig gis// byang chubal ma li chol pa/ rtagasusangs rgyas rjes rba zhing // mang sde 'di ni gzu ba
252b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim/ gang zhig dadapa ba 'jog cing // 'du jil ni mos gyur ba// nyin mtshan gnyis la ga ga' ba// mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// nga'i bstan pa dag las ni
252b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung bar gyur nas kyang // mya ngan 'das pa'i chos dag la// mos pa dag ni mi skye ba/ skyes bu/ blun po de dag ni// dad pas byin pa chud gzon 'gyur
252b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas rnams kyi chos dag la// nyes dmigs mang bar thos na sa ni// 'jig rten dag la mngon zhen nas// 'jigs pa dag ni mi skye ba// skyes bu dran pa dag ni// mkhas pa rnams
252b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis spong bar 'gyur// chos gos dag ni bgos gyur kyang // de la shes rab ci yang meng // thub pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos// yang dag bka' ni gang yin pa// shes pa med pas thos gyur na// yid ches
252b8(dkon brtsegs): len par mi 'gyur te// skyes bu blun po de dag dang // lhan cig gnas par mi byora'o// khyad par 'phags pa'i chos 'di dag/ gal te thos par gyur nas kyang // rab tu dga' zhing mos pa'i// sems kyang skye bar mi 'gyub
257a1(dkon brtsegs): yang med// gang gis mdo sde 'di mos na// sangs rgyas spyan ni thob par 'gyur// 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med tshe// sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa byung // nga ni drang srong khye'ur gyur tshe/ 
257a2(dkon brtsegs): me tog thogs nas mchod pa byas// shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba// byang chub snying po la 'dug nas// mdo sde 'di ni ston 'gyur zhes// ngal byang chub lung yang bstan/ khyod ni de tshe gzhon nur gyur// ngal lung bstan
257a3(dkon brtsegs): thob gyur nas// dga' zhing rang ba'i sems bskyed de// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad du// gal te drang srong khye'u 'di ni// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas tshe// bdag ni de'i grogs gyur nas// mya ngan 'das
257a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'og tu yang // chos kyi sde sdong rab 'dzin cing // srung bar shog ces smon lam btab// sangs rgyas ma me mdzang de yis// / 'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni// ji sang gsungs bzhin dro'i tshe// bras
257a5(dkon brtsegs): ze khye ru nga g.yon nu gnyis/ lags par mnyan cing som su/ bcu// sngon las pa'i sa gyiche// me tog sung/ la dag gis// sas rgyas de la mchongad pa byas// dem kyo
257a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dug ste// 'di skad du ni smon lam btab// nga'i bstan pa tha ma lo// mdo sde 'di ni rab bzung nas// rgya cher ston par shog ces smras// gang gi chos 'di thos gyur nas// zhe sdang sems ni mi skyed par/ 
257a7(dkon brtsegs): gzung 'dzin klog cing gang 'don pa// de ni skyes bu dam pa yin/ khyod kyis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe// zos dka'i chos 'di rab bzung nas// sems can dag la don kyi tshul// rgya cher dbye zhing bstan par bya// ngas
257a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang las bdus kyi tshe// yang dag chos ni nub pa na// 'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'din// sems can dag la rgya cher bstan// blun pos nan tan mi sgrub pas// 'di la srur ba 'debs par byed// ngas ni de skad
257b1(dkon brtsegs): thos gyur kyang // ge sdang dag ni skyed mi byed// ngas ni ngag tu bzod pa sgoms nas// 'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs byed// bzod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pas na// mtshan dang sa byang dag gis brgyan
257b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nung khyod kyis sangs rgyas su// gyan ma yongs su rdzogs 'gyur zhing // gser gyi kha dog rnam dga' bags// bzod pa'i spobs las byung bar los// nga'i zhabs nis reganas// shing ni chang me
257b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yo byed kyang // sems can rnams ni mi ltung ba// thams cad bzong pa'i spobs las skyes// ngi'i spu lung cig nas ni// 'od zer brgya stong rab bkyenas// thams cad gsal bar gang byed pa// thams cad bzod
257b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog stobs las byung // srin po shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs// srog chags pa'i byin 'phrog byed pa// nga la rtag tu gus pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog spongs las byung / nga'i 'khor ni rdzi
257b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ sems ni rab tu dul gyur nas// de bzhin gshegasal du yang // thams cad bzod pachog gangs las drung // rol mar smini brgya stong ba// 'khor 'dus chen pon ngag tu// sangs
257b6(dkon brtsegs): yod na bsngags brjod ga/ thamasas da rjod chog goms las byung // klu'i rgyal po bcu myongs// rab tu gdun cing 'jigs / sa sa rgyam mngon dga' ba yang // thams cad med ma
257b7(dkon brtsegs): spobs las byung // srin po gnod sbyin la sogs pas// me tog phreng ba brgya srung rdzogs// los nas ngal mchod bye ba// thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // shing ni brgya stong chad med par// 'azhugs
257b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i di bzhin gshegs pa rnams// nga'i yon ngan bsngags pa yang // thams cad bzod mchog spobs las byung // lto 'phyed ni lus hrul po/ brgya slong ga ni 'dus gyur nas// me tog gtong nas pa mchod pa
258a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung // gnod sbyid rgyal po la sogs pa// bre ba brgya phrag drug cu rnams// 'ongs nas ngal gang mchod pa/ thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / 
258a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang klu'i rgyal ba ni// man ba ga la sogs pa// mu tig dbang pos mchod pa// thams cad bzod pa chog rlobs las byung // du bu ru drang shing khyi ba'i// brgya srong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas// ros mo dag gis
258a3(dkon brtsegs): ngamachod pa// thams cad bzod mchog spobs las byung // lto byed nga ni lus srul po// brgya spong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas// me tog spos kyis mchod ga/ thams cad bzod pa chog stobs las byung // sa chen
258a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa klu'i rgyal// lus phyed dag ni rab bstan nas// thal sbyar bal gus par yang // thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung / lus med sgra can zin la sogs// bye ba phrag ni brgya stong rnams
258a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ba'i sems kyis nga mchod pa// thams cad bzod mchog stobs sa byung // gzhon nu khyod kyis 'di ltar bltos// sarba rgyas 'od zer gang reg pa// sdug bsngal bral nas bde thob pa
258a6(dkon brtsegs): sa rgyang ga pa rmya// sam su zungagis// cwa ldan pam sa ga man//  ba pa yod ga/ thams cad 'dod mchog stobs las byung // lha'i 'tsha
258a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong dag pa b+hi'i me tog gter mchod de/ sreng sbas sangs rgyas sten byed pa// thams cad bad mchog stobs las byung / khyod kyisasas rgyas rdzu dru dang // sbyi dang dum khrims smra bsna
258a8(dkon brtsegs): nas thams cad kun du thos mdzad pa// bzod mchog spobs las zung bar bsngos// phung po khams kyi sgra ga dang // bden pa bzhi'i sgra dag gis// thams cad kun ni go mdzad pa// thams cad bzod pas/ 
258b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzobs las byung // nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' la mig zad mthar dag dang // rab gini sgra ni thos gyur te// skye ba'i mthar yang de bzhin no// nga rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkhar las mig ni rdzu
258b2(dkon brtsegs): nga rkyen// de las skye yang 'gro 'ong med// de gang du ni thos par 'gyur // nga'i rdzu 'phrul spongs kyis ni// mkhar las mig ni rtogs byed// sas rgyas rnams kyang de las skyes// de skang du ni thos par
258b3(dkon brtsegs): dgyur/ nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig zad pathar zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/ 
258b4(dkon brtsegs): mkha' las mi mtha' rab zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de la sa skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// nga'i rdzu 'bru la rdzobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig skye mthar ni las/ 
258b5(dkon brtsegs): sas rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de sang du ni thob par 'gyur/ ngari rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// mkha' las mig 'jug pa zhin// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad
258b6(dkon brtsegs): du thos par 'gyur// nga'i rdzu 'phrul spongs kyis ni// mkhara' las mig mi skye zhi bas// sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'thur// bi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis
258b7(dkon brtsegs): ri// mkha' las mi ga ben rab ni bas// sangs rgyas rnams de de las skyes// de skad du ni thos par 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra drir reg bya nas// sgra dang ming la
258b8(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa'i bar// thams cad kun kyang de bzhin do// 'di lda na'i drug 'ong khrong // 'chabar phra ga dog g.yo spu dang / bes dang rgyal ma sogs pa// rgya cher ba gad parang de bzhin no// de
259a1(dkon brtsegs): nas zla 'od gzhor rung ba de lta bu'i chos khyad par du 'phags pa thos pas// rab tu dga' bar gyur nas thal po sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di gad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
259a2(dkon brtsegs): sang gi gdugs la/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'khor mang po dang bcas par gdugs chod la spyad 'drenan/ thugs brtsa bar dgongs te/ bdag gis sbyar pa'i gdugs tshong gsol bar cig nang
259a3(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu de'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / sems can tshad med pa rnams la yang phan pa mdzad par/ 'gyur ba thugs kyis mkhyen nas// thugs brtse
259a4(dkon brtsegs): bdang gongs te cang migasudu bar gnang // de nas zla 'od gzhod rung gyur pa stad las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mag thos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskang ba byas nas/ ra tu
259a5(dkon brtsegs): dgar bas rang gi khyim du song ste/ rang gi 'khong dang bcas pa dang // lA dang / kru dang / gnod sbyir/ srin po dang / lho 'bye la sogs pas/ rgyal po'i ra'agrong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdza
259a6(dkon brtsegs): ngang gyi lding khang bres te/ lding khang de yang shin tu mtho zhing rgya che la// thams cad kun du khyab pa/ gser gyi tsong cong dra bar bres pa/ nor bu rin po che ri phreng ba sbyangs pa// seng ge'i ba dad dang / gser gyi phreng
259a7(dkon brtsegs): la lu gu rgyud can 'bum brag brgya stong sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gzhan yang rin po che'i me tog kha dog khyad par du 'bags pa'i phreng ba'i phung po dang / gcal du bkram mo// me tog tsam pa ka dang / a ti mug tra
259a8(dkon brtsegs): las sogs pa sna tshogs kyis phreng batshad med grangs med pa yang rin po che'i lding lang gi nang thams cad dang / 'khor 'jus pa thams cad kun tu khyab par sbyangs shing rgyan du bres so// gzhan yang de'i nang bu bri stan rnams
259b1(dkon brtsegs): bshanas nas/ rin po che'i spos byil ka dang / dus ca dang / can dadadang / gung gus rnam par gcing / yid dga' bar byed pa sna tshogs bsregs so// de bzhin du myur smos mchogangs pa sna tshogs cad mchong
259b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yod byang du sbyar ro// gzhan yang spos kyi nus lam srang rnams kun tu khyab par chag chag btab po// sa bzhi kun du me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram mo// de'i tshe lha'i bu mo dang / snga ma
259b3(dkon brtsegs): yid gyi bu po dang / sgra gcan zin gyi bu po gras med chang med pa yang rabatu ga' ba'i sems bskyed ngas/ byang rucu kyi rgyu mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir/ deng lo sa nas grong khyer chen po khyad par du rapags
259b4(dkon brtsegs): pa derab tu brgyan to// de nas bla 'o gagon nur srung bgrong khyi ra de kun du khyab par brgyan cing yos su dag pa dang gdugs chod la bab par riganas bcom ldan las la 'di sa
259b5(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la glan par mdzad pa'i slang du grong khyer chen po gshegs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan las 'khor mang po dang shabs
259b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu grong khyer du gshegs nas sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag sa thag tu grong khyer chen po de des chen po yang btu g.yos par gyur/ phyogs bcu 'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag brgya stong chad med pa yang
259b7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ de'i tshe long ba dag ni mthong bar gyur/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde bathob par gyur/ 'od pa rnams ni sgra thos par gyur// brang bzhin mi sdug pa rnams ni drung
259b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin bzang po thob par gyur/ nor med pa rnams ni nor dang ldan par gyur/ bu med pa rnams ni bu yod par gyur// gos med pa rnams ni gos thob par gyur rin po che med pa rnabs ni rin po che
260a1(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur/ nye ba shes med pa rnams ni nye ba shes dang ldan par gyur/ lus kyi rgyan thams cad kyis phos pa rnams ni lus kyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// gzhan yang dang pa
260a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / khrung khrung dang / ne co dang / rma byadang / ka rig la sogs pa bya'i tshogs mang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / rab kun pa'i sems ni bskyed nas/ sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba mchog das pa byung / 
260a3(dkon brtsegs): gang gis sgra de dag thos pa yang yid shin tu bde bar gyur to// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsam pa ka'i ljon shing tshad med pa rnyed mngon par sprul pas/ sems can brgya stong mang sha rnams
260a4(dkon brtsegs): me tog yongs su dag pa de dag dang / gzhan yang spos mchog dam pa thogs nas/ bcom ldan las la mngon par gtor te mchod pa byas so// gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo dbang phyug thob pa brgya
260a5(dkon brtsegs): stong dus mu tig dmang po dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma thogs nasade bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dag rabs mngon par gtor ro// lha ba yin mang po dang / gzhan yang lha mang po rnams rin po che
260a6(dkon brtsegs): gdugul gas dang / 'angul gyis rab du 'dun pathogs nas/ ba snang ma 'jug ste/ de bzhin gzhags pa'i phreng du 'bas par g.yogasas// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi thams
260a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis tsan dan gyi ljon shing dang / gser gyi ljon shing nga rin pa cha'i snong nga / gsal sogs pa'i sngon shing chad me dpag tu med pa rin po che rnams kyis brgyan pa/ mi tog dang / lamathun sum chogs
260a8(dkon brtsegs): shing rgyas pa/ sems can tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thun mong du mngon par grub pa rlung gi ngang langs pa tsam gyis spos mchog dam pa'i dris/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chad med pa rnams su
260b1(dkon brtsegs): khyab par gang ba mngon par sprul to// sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang ngus cig du me tog thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// de bzhin du sems can dang / sems cad pa yid
260b2(dkon brtsegs): pa tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mngon par sprul pa sha stag go// gang dag ci dang ci smon pa de dag kyang rdzu 'phral gyi dbang gis de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du re ba yongs su
260b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe/ 'khor 'dus pa thams cad nam mkha' las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sgras bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par ston pa'i sgras thos par
260b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang // de gang nas byung ba shes par yang ma gyur la/ tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong du mas kyang // chos rnams yang dag par bstan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha'
260b5(dkon brtsegs): las sgrani 'di skad grags par zur// lo chags zad mtha' stong dben/ gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i me/ mkhara' las sgra ni 'dis
260b6(dkon brtsegs): grags par gyur// 'dod chags skyes thar stong ben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang dub 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par
260b7(dkon brtsegs): grung/ 'dod chags mthar ni stong chen gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'od
260b8(dkon brtsegs): chags rab zhi stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags 'jug pa
261a1(dkon brtsegs): stong dben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ mkhara' las sma ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags skye
261a2(dkon brtsegs): med stong ben gang rtogs pa// yang dag nyid rtogs byang chu thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur// 'dod chags skye ma dbyung chen
261a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa// yang dag nyid drugs byang chub thob par gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las smani 'di gang grags par gyur// 'dod chags rab 'gog song chen gang rdzogs pa
261a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag nyid rtogs byang chubathob par 'gyur// zhe sdang gti mug kheng khro 'chab sar sna// g.yo sgyu sems dang nga rgyal mya ngan dang // drug bsngal kun 'thung 'gog pa lam sems can/ khye'u dang bu mo bung
261a5(dkon brtsegs): med dag dang ni// skyes pa gso ba dag dang dbang po drug/ yul dru ga 'byung chen bzhi'i dbang po dang // 'jig rten sdug bsnga/ la phung po khams rnams dang // 'jig rten skye sgra ming sogs
261a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang de bzhin// chos rje ngas pa'i chos ni bstan pas na// sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha'i 'jig rten kun bya chos gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg la gnas par mos
261a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mnga' las sgra ni 'di skang grags par gyur// bcom ldan sbyin stobs dgu la rab mos pas// sbyin pa'i stobs kyis byang chub ba rnyes par gyur// bcom ldan
261a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkhara' las sma ni 'di na grags par gyur// bcom ldan tshul khrims rnams dag rab mos pas// tshul khrims rnam dag stobs kyis byang chub brnyes// bcom ldan 'das ni/ 
261b1(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di ska dgrags par gyur// bcom ldan bzod pa dag la rab mos pas// bzod pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs
261b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe/ mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// bcom ldan brtson 'grus ngag la rab mos pas// brtson 'grus stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i
261b3(dkon brtsegs): tshemakha' las smran 'di skad grags par 'gyur// bcom ldan pasam gtan ra la rab mos pas// bsam gtan stobs kyi byang chub brnyes pa 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/ 
261b4(dkon brtsegs): mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur// bcom ldan shes rab dag la rab mos pas// shes rab stobs kyi byang chub brnyes par gyur// rdzu 'phrul mngon shes yon tan gnas shes stobs
261b5(dkon brtsegs): thabs dang gzugs kyi stobs dang grags pa'i stobs// las dang / rten 'byung yan lag dang dang thos// gtong dang 'thun pa'i/ stobs dang rab zhi stobs// rab dul yang dag mtha' dang bden
261b6(dkon brtsegs): pakhas stobs// gzigs dang dga' dang phan 'dogs la mos dang // byams dang snying rje dga' snyoms bzod che med// stong dang mtshan ma med sogs kyang de bzhin// stobs bcu 'phags pa'i mnga' bdag lnga'i
261b7(dkon brtsegs): gtso/ yon tan grags pa dang zla ma mchis pa// grong khyer mchog gshegs zhabs ni bzhag pa'i tshe// sems can rnams la rgya cher phan pa mdzad// bsngon chad srid gsum las dge rab bsgrubs pas
261b8(dkon brtsegs): lnga'i dge ba sna tshogs 'phel bar mdzad// 'jig rten thams cad kun ni rab tu bkur// nga'i bstan pa 'di thos thams cad dga'// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs nas zhabs bzhag ste// grong khyer sa tshan dang ni
262a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yos// bcom ldan snam dag 'od zeng mthong bas na// ngo mtshar mi 'dzin mi dga' gang yang med// bcom ldan grong gshegs pan pa chen pa la/  mi'i 'khor rnams sems ni
262a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar 'gyur// sa dang kha 'gro dag gis srid gsum na// bcom ldan shin tu bde zhes bsngags par gyur// bcom ldan zhabs kyi 'khor los bzhag tshe// rnam dag 'od zer kun gsal ngo mtshar
262a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur// rtani cang shes grong khyer sgra snyan byung // bya tshogs dag kyang mkha' las rab tu dga'// gzhan yang rab dang bud med mang po'i// lag dang rkang gi gdub 'khor phreng ba dang // de bzhin rin chen rgyan
262a4(dkon brtsegs): ni sna tshogs las// ma bkrol bar yang rang nyid su kun zung / so song ba tshun dga' ba'i gtam brjod cing // skad 'gyu kra shis mtshag gis bsngags pa brjod// 'on long yang pom changs
262a5(dkon brtsegs): bathob/ thams cad bcom ldan khyad 'phags 'bras bu dang // bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs che kun dga' bas// lha mis me tog mngon gtanam mchod pa byas// mkhar las kun tus
262a6(dkon brtsegs): spyan byung bas na// lha tshogs chad med rab tu dgar bar drung // gzhan yang sems can dran pa nyams pa da// spros 'khrugs rab zhi phan nun gtam stan 'arjod// bud med gang snu mya na 'jigs gyu pa
262a7(dkon brtsegs): 'od cing byin gyis bde ba thob par gyur// skyes pa bud medang ma ma bcas la// dri ma spangs pa'i chos dag rab bgad pas// thams cad dga' nas dag pa'i sems bskyed// thugs mchog zhabs la spyi btud
262a8(dkon brtsegs): phyag byas nas/ kha cig btsam la bla med lam rab tshol// kha cig byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos mtshol// bcom ldan grong khyer mchog tu gshegs pas na// bcom ldan zhal du lta zhing rang nyid dga'/ 
262b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan mkhyen pas sa'i spyod rtogs pas// 'jig rten rjes 'thun pan par btu mdzad// chos kyi nor mchog byang chub sems dpa' byin// rin chen mchog ni sems can rnams la btang // bcom ldan no
262b2(dkon brtsegs): khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skang byung // gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa la// sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung
262b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa// sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung // gang zhig mig skye mthar sred pa// sangs rgyas la ni du
262b4(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ gang shig mig pang mthar sred pa// sangs rgyas yid ces mi 'jigs 'thob// mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na// shin tu nga ba rkun mo 'chang // gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa// chos la zhing
262b5(dkon brtsegs): ches mi 'jigs 'thob// mig za mtha' ni lta bas na/ shin tu dang brgyun mi 'chad// rkang zhig mig za mtha' sred pa/ dge 'dun yid ches mi 'jigs 'thob// mig zad mthar ni lta bas
262b6(dkon brtsegs): naHshin tu dang brgyun mi 'chad// gang zhig migazad mtha' srad pa// tshul khrims 'dzin med 'thob par 'gyur// mig zad mthar ni lta bas na// shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chad// gang zhig mi gzang
262b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' sred pa// ngan 'gro'i 'dod chags spong bar 'gyur// mig zad mthar ni lta bas na// 'dod chags rgyun ni spong bar byed// gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa// ngan 'gro'i zhe sdang spong bar 'gyur/ 
262b8(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na// zhe sdang rgyun ni spong bar byed// gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa// ngan 'gro'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur// mig zad mthar ni lta bas na// gti mug rgyun ni spong bar byed/ 
263a1(dkon brtsegs): gang shig mig zad mthang sred pa// byang chub ye shes dag la gnas// mig zang mthar ni lta bas na// byang chu ye shes rgyun mi 'chang // mig skye mtha' dang mig gi mthar// 'jun
263a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ni rab dben dang // yod pa nyid du mi 'gyur dang / mi skye rab tu zhi ba dang // 'di las sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyang // thams cad mig zad 'dra bar bstan// gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa// de ni rtag tu tho tsom med// de
263a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar be tshom med pa'i phyir// sa su rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig skye mtha' phred pa// de ni rtag du the tsom med// de ltar ba tsom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig ni
263a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' sred pa// de ni nag tu bcor med// de ltar the tso med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig la rdum sred pa// de ni rtan tu ji tsam med// de ltar rje tshom med pa'i phyir/ 
263a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'job par 'gyur// gang zhig mig den rang/ sreng pa// de ni rtag tu ba tsam med// de ltar the tsom med par byir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig mi skye snying pa
263a6(dkon brtsegs): doni rtag tu bcom med// de ltar bcom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// gang zhig mig med la sred pa// de ni rtag tu bcom med/ tshu la sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// ga
263a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig mig zhi la phred pa// de ni rtag tu ba tsom med// de ltar the tsom med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur// rna bsna lce lus dang yid// gzugs snga drir rig byanas// sgra dang ming gi rkar
263a8(dkon brtsegs): yang / thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// mig skyed dpag med gang byed ga/ ye shes dpag med skyed par byed// ye shes dpag tu med pa'i phyir// chos 'di bstan parang de bzhin no// mig zang phrag med gang shes/ 
263b1(dkon brtsegs): mig la sgrib pa med par 'gyur// de ltar sgrib med pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thogs med thob// rna ba sna lcelus dang yid// gzugs smra dri rag byangs// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin byar
263b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bya// bcom ldan grang khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// ma par las chos bshad sgra thos pas// sangs rgyas yon tan the tsom med/ kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang // sangs
263b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ye shes 'jigs med byed// gang zhig 'dod chags sems byung yang // sangs rgyas yon tan stor ma gyur/ kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang // bla med ye shes tshol byed cing // ma 'dres chos ni
263b4(dkon brtsegs): sgrub pa dang // nyan thos theg pa mos mi byed// byis pa bsam tha/ tran sgom byed kyang // bsam gtan bde la mos pas na// mdo na pa nga rgyal rab bskyed nas// dge sbyong 'bras bu thob snyam sems
263b5(dkon brtsegs): byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang // mig zad mtha'i shes me dan// bskal pa brgya stong sgom byed kyang // de la rnam gro la ci yang med// skye ba len pa thams cad na// de la zhen chags skyed
263b6(dkon brtsegs): par byed// gal te skye nyid stong rig na// mthong ba rnams ni rnam dag 'gyur// gang zhig bsam gtan bzhi bsgrungs kyang // mig zad mthar shes med gyur na// bskal ba brgya stong lon kyang ni// bsam
263b7(dkon brtsegs): gtan yongs su dag mi 'gyur// gang zhig nye bar bsdogs thob gyur kyang // zad mthar shes pa 'thob mi 'gyur// bad pa thob pa ma shes phyir// zag pa thob la dag tu spyod// gang zhig 'du shes zhen
263b8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa/ 'du shes zad mtha'i shes pa med// 'du shes zad pa ma shes phyir// rtag tu 'du shes zag la spyod// gang zhig 'jig rten zhen chags pa/ 'jig rten zad mtha' ma shes med// 'jig rten na
264a1(dkon brtsegs): zangs tha' ma shes bying // rtag tu 'jig rten zag la spyod// gang zhig zag bcas sems la gnas// sems cadam pa'i shes pa med// sems cad ba ni ma shes phyir// rtag tu sems
264a2(dkon brtsegs): ni zag la spyod// gang zhig zag bcas chos la gnas// chos zang mtha'i shes pa med// chos rang pa ni mi shes phyir// zag tu zag bcas chos la spyod// smras pa'i chos la gnas byung kyang // mig zang
264a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha'i shes med na// mig ba ngapa ni ma shes phyir// yang dag sbyas la gnas pa min/ kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos bsgos kyang // mig zang mapa'i shes medan// mig zad mtha' nim shes phyir// yang dgarjes
264a4(dkon brtsegs): gos bgos ma yin// ya rabs rig su skyes gyur kyang // mig zang ma pa'i shes med na// mig zang ba ni ma shes phyir// de ni dag pa'i rigs ma yin// 'khor ma gu ni bdog gyur kyang // mig bdam tha'i shes
264a5(dkon brtsegs): ngas byung dungan 'grod chung 'gyur te// 'khor bdag ni snom/ nus// sgra'i rig mkhas cung nga // mig daH/ 'ashes ma na// mig pad pa ni ma shes byed// rtswa'i rig pa rtogasas
264a6(dkon brtsegs): yin// bajornams la ni mkhas gyur byung // mig zang ma 'i shes med na// mi gzang pa ni ma shes phyir// da ni bkrol mkhas pa min// 'dri ba mngal ma khas gyur cing // yi gcig gis rnam 'byed kyang // 
264a7(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' shes med na// de ni don mthun bshad ma yin// mkhas pa'i rjesu slob byed kyang // gsang dang gsang min mi shes shing // mig zad mtha'i shes med na// chos ni rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// 
264a8(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa sna tshogs rgyang ban dang // chos rnams rab tu shes gyur kyang // mig zang mtha'i shes me na// 'khri shing thug por ltung ba 'dra// sgra'i rig pa mkhas gyur cing // dge dang mi dge'i rtags ston dang / 
264b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'bru'i yi ge sgra skad dang // klog dang 'don pa'i mthar thug kyang // mig zang mtha' ni ma shes na// de dag rnams ni shes med yin// bud med dag ni mtshan ma dang // tshig mkhas rmongs pa'i byed pa dang // lus
264b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyes ngal mos chos rnams dang // mkhyung pyad dag la mkhas gyur kyang // mi zad mtha' nim shes na// de dag rnams ni shes med yin// gzhung lugs brgya mang sngon byed cing // yi ge 'bru cig mi brjod kyang // mig
264b3(dkon brtsegs): zad mtha' mi ma shes na// bshad pa de ni don med yin// de bzhin mig skye mtha' dag dang // mig mtha' dang ni 'jug pa nas// rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par gyis// rna ba sna lce lus dang
264b4(dkon brtsegs): yid/ gzugs spri dri ro rag bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// sgra'i rig pa klog 'dod ci dang // de'i don ni rtogs gyur kyang // mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na// de
264b5(dkon brtsegs): ni rnams kyang dman pa yin// spang bzhi dag ni 'dod byed cing // ga sang sngags dag ni rtogs byur kyang // mig rbad mthar nim shes na// de ni rnams kyang dman pa yin// de bzhin mig skye
264b6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dag dang // mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas// rab tu ni ba'i bar du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par gyis// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra drir reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi rab tu yang // theng
264b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sbyar bar bya// / bam po bzhi pa/ bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems can dag ni tshad mad rnyed// mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas// mig
264b8(dkon brtsegs): zad mtha' ni shes pa thob// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems can dag ni tshad med snyed// mkha' las chos stan sgra thos pas// mig gi rang bzhin rtogs par gyur// stong dang bdag med rab rtogs
265a1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ thams cad rnams dag migazo krung // rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri dag nas// snang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// zhe sdang gti mug kho
265a2(dkon brtsegs): dang nga rgyal khengs dang g.yo spyanas// bag med pa'i bar du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par gyis// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// sems can dag ni tshad med snyed// seng gi na mkha' dag las ni
265a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mtshan ni sna tshogs thos/ kha cig 'dod chags 'jigs pa'i// dab zla med pa'i ming yang thos/ kha cig zhe sdang 'jigs byed cing // 'jig rten phan 'dogs ming dag thos/ kha cig gti mug ra
265a4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs shing // nga rgyal bdul ba'i ming yang thos/ kha cig 'jigarten dag la ni// rab gi ston pa'i 'dren ming thos/ kha cig shes rab dag bstan nas// 'jig rten phan 'dogs ming dag thos// kha cig
265a5(dkon brtsegs): thabs dgar ba bstan nas// sems can pan 'dog pa ming dag thos/ kha cig bdudadu ni rab btul kyang // 'khon la/ dzin med pa'i ming dag zos/ kha cig gsung bar chos dag gis
265a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam grol bstan pa'i ming dag thos/ kha cig sems can sdug bsngal ba// rgya cher sgrol ba'i ming dag thos// kha cig mi ri gtso bo yis// 'jig rten sgrol ba'i ming dag thos// ming ni de dag thos gyur nas
265a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rnam dag mig thob gyur// namakha' dang ni rgya mtsho'i chu// ri rab lhun po bar du yang // thams cad gzhal du rung srid kyi// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thug mi 'gyur// gang zhig zad nges pa thob gyur
265a8(dkon brtsegs): na/ chos sku mngon par grub pa dga' mi 'gyur// gang zhig chos sku mchog ni grub gyur na// kun 'dzin ye shes dpag mede 'thob par 'gyur// gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thog// des ni mdo sde ga
265b1(dkon brtsegs): me go bar 'gyur// gang zhig ma sdeng bag med go gyung pa// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob pa dgar mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig skye nges pa 'thob gyur na// chos sku mngon par 'grub pa dkur mi 'gyur// gang zhig
265b2(dkon brtsegs): chos sku mchog ni grub gyur na// kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob par 'gyur// gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob// des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go gyur pa
265b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rdzu 'phral thob pa dka' mi 'gyur// de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya'i chos dag nas// sgra snams dang ni ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin du ni sbyar bar bya// de
265b4(dkon brtsegs): tshes chen dag ni rab tu g.yos// rgya mtsho ri rnams kyang ni de bzhino// lha ma yin dang lha ni mang po rnams// thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyed par byed// bdud dang bdud dpung g.yo sgyu rab bcom nas
265b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sangs rgyas bkod pa bsgrub par mos// lha rnams so song gzhal med khang zhugs nas// phan tshun dga' ba'i gaHma ni 'di skad smras// 'dren pa dang ni 'jig rten byung bas na/ 
265b6(dkon brtsegs): mi thams cad la ni phan pa mdzad// sa bla'i lha 'khor gzhal med khang gnas nas// dang pa'i sems kyis dgara' nas 'di skad du// 'dren pa 'jig rten deng byung shin tu lags// 'jig rten kun bde rgyu ni rab tu
265b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ mkhar la spyod pa'i lha rnams dathos nas// thams cad dga' nas rab tu dang bskyes/ khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pan mdzad zer// rgyal
265b8(dkon brtsegs): chen ris bzhi'i lha ni de thos nas// thams cad dgar nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ khyad 'phags smra gnasangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pan mdzad zer// sum cu rtsa gsum ldan
266a1(dkon brtsegs): de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas shin tu nga bskyes/ khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pa na mdzad zer// 'jab bral lda dag de gang thos nas
266a2(dkon brtsegs): ri/ thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang bskyes/ khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pan mdzad zer// bdag cag byang chub sems ni rab bskyud nas// bcom ldan bla med
266a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nye bar bgyi// lha mi gtso mchog la ni brten nas su// sems can thams cad sgrol bar bgyid ces zer// dgar ldan lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang // thams cad dgar nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ khyab
266a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'dzi gra rten phan mdzad zer// bcom ldan 'das pa'i bskal pa bye bar ni// spyod mchog khyad 'phags dpag med mngon pa sgrubs nas
266a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can sdug bsngal ba la bde lam bstan// 'khor ba bsgral nas mya/ ngan 'das la bkod// 'phrul dga' lha rnams de skad thos nas ni// thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/ bya
266a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pan mdzad zer// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha ni de thos nas// thams cad dga' nas rab tu dang ba skyes/ khyad 'phags smrasam
266a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pan mdzad zer// de bzhin gshegs pa skye shi 'das pas na// bdu dang bu skegs mang po pham par mdzad// bla med byang chub dag ni yongs
266a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs nas// skye dgu drangs nas pha rol 'jog ces zer// tshangs ris lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang // thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyas/ khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas
266b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pa na mdzad zer// de bzhin cig nas cig tu sgra thos pas// tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' nas 'di skad du// 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan pa mdzad// bdudu lung 'jigs skrag mya
266b2(dkon brtsegs): ngan byed ces zeng // srid pa'i rtse mo'i lha'i bar du yang // sangs rgyas byung nas 'jig rten pa na mdzad thos// de bzhin sgra ni kun tu grags pas na// lha ma yin dag 'gribs shing lha rnams 'phel// bdud rtsi
266b3(dkon brtsegs): khang pa dag ni yongs stong shing // lha rnams 'khor ni rab tu rgyas par gyur// mi 'jig stobs kyis log tshogs rab bdul nas/ byang chub chen po mchog na myur du brnyeg// de bzhin dang cig yud tsam lha rnams kyis
266b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan byung nas pan mdzad thos gyur nas// 'jig rten 'dren par mdzad pa shin tu legs// rnam dag mig ni sems can byin zhes zer// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// 'dod pas yongs
266b5(dkon brtsegs): su garus pa rnams// mi gtsang bskams pa bshad thos pas// 'od chags ni stem lus sbas// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// zhe sdang dag gis gsus pa rnams// bya
266b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan pa'i chos thos pas// zhe sdang gi stem lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// gti mug dag gis gdungs pa rnams// shes rab chos ni bstan thos pas// gti mug zhe sdang ma lus spangs
266b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// nga rgyal dag gis gdus pa rnams// nga rgyal spangs pa'i chos thos pas// nga rgyal zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// phrag dog pa
266b8(dkon brtsegs): gis gdus pa rnams// phrag dog spangs pa'i chos thos pas// phrag dog zhi ste ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i// khong khro dag gis gdungs pa rnams/ khong khro spangs pa'i chos thos
267a1(dkon brtsegs): pas/ khong khro zhi ste ma lus spag// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// ser sna dag gis gdus pa rnams// ser sna spangs pa'i chos thos pas// ser sna'i sde ma lus
267a2(dkon brtsegs): spangs/ gang zhig dul ba'i spyod sgrub pa// dbrag med chos ni 'di thos pas// mang du thos pa'i mtshor zhus nas// kun 'dzin sgo ni sgrub par byed// gzhan yang mkhar las sgra thos pas// me tog dag
267a3(dkon brtsegs): gis sangs rgyas mchod// yon tan khyad par 'phags sdub cing // snying rje chen por rdzu 'phrul rton// gzhan yang mkhar las sgra thos pas// bcom ldan sku dang skye gnas dang // gdu rgyu dang ni gsungs
267a4(dkon brtsegs): / rnams/ khyad par 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod// sems can 'gro ba ji lta bar// rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci rigs bshad// mig dang rna bsna lci lus// gzugs dang sbrul sogs pa
267a5(dkon brtsegs): dang // banum pa dang ni brkyang ba dang // ston par mdzad pa khyadang/ ra 'phags// bcom ldan 'jig rten lasapas na/ 'jig rten smon ma rab mdzad cing // gzugs ni mang ba na pa
267a6(dkon brtsegs): yang / thams cad langs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yin// sdod dang snod min de rjes su// mi 'thun chos ni ston mdzad pas// sems can che rabs chad med nas// sangs rgyas mchod pa ma byas shing // dbu rgod
267a7(dkon brtsegs): gdul bar dkar ba la// sems can dmyal ba bshad par mdzad// gang zhig las lam rmongs gyur cing // lha la brten nas spros dga' ba// bcom ldan de dag lta ba dang // spros bzhi zhing sgra thos
267a8(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// gzhan yang mkha' las ngo bo nyid// nges pa nyid du stong pa dang // 'gro 'ong med cing mtshan med dang // ci yang med pa'i sgra yang thos// gzhan yang sems can brgya stong dag/ mkha' las sha
267b1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab spyan// de bzhin chos kyi spyad par du// yang dag smon pa'i sgra yang thos// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul rlobs kyis ni// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab sla// rnam grol rnam grol mthong ba'i sgra
267b2(dkon brtsegs): ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur// sems can dag ni ji snyed pa// ji bzhin rdzu 'phrul rab bstan nas// ji ltar rjes mthun sgra skad kyis// yang dag chos ni bstan par mdzad// sems can la la gang
267b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis// sbyin pa tshul khrims ji snyed pas// rdzu 'phrul mos pa ji lta bzhin// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sgra ston// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// sems can dbang po ji la
267b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rgya cher yang dag 'byed mdzad pas// lan 'dzin ston la 'a grod par mdzad// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi ni/ phung po khams dang skye mched kyi// bcings dang grol dang nye ring da
267b5(dkon brtsegs): sa'i gnas skabs bye brag gi/ mtshan nyid ston pa thos par gyu/ ra// gzhan yang sa dang ye shes kyi// 'od zer tshad me nga ston pa dang // nyon mongs bag chags spangs pa dang // spangs
267b6(dkon brtsegs): mi ston pa thos par gyur// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// lha dang mo'i ngo bo nyid// las dang 'bras bu mi mtshungs pas// skye len tha dad thos par 'gyur// ras 'ga' bud med mdun pa
267b7(dkon brtsegs): du/ bud med brgyan pa'i lus sprul nas// mkha' las skyo ston sgra thos pas// gang thos 'dod chags sel mdzad pas// shi ro bu ni ji lta bzhin// shin tu dang ba skyes par gyur// thugs
267b8(dkon brtsegs): rjes mos pa ji bzhin du// bla mo de chos ni ston par mdzad// mo ru 'gal dang 'od bsrungs dang // kab pin dang kun dga' dang // 'od srungs chen po dag da ni// kun shes ku ru lingadi ru la sogs// de
268a1(dkon brtsegs): / dag mos pa ji bzhin du// nyan thos chos ston thos par gyur// lha rnams dang ni lA ma yin// gnod sbyin dag ni mang po dang // be ro ka ni 'khor bcas dang // grul bus dag ni
268a2(dkon brtsegs): med rnams// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// gzungs sngags sgrani thos par gyur// i di si/ bingi si/ i ra su e / oM na si/ ma na si/ u khyi/ a no khyi/ a khi tshal mang nang ye/ dang ma
268a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ni mi/ dAka ni/ i mi man tra// ni mAr/ a bu rme/ b+hud d+he/ nir/ a khi Nar/ bi la ki ri sa te/ a khin ra bar mi ta/ ka la ba ti ni/ mtho 'jig ning d+he bon/ bar sha sa de/ shas te/ par
268a4(dkon brtsegs): sadata/ b+hu mi a ma b+ha ra/ a ma b+ha ra/ li la b+han/ giHtsid ta/ bi ba mita/ tsing ta a nan ta/ o Te ra ga ba mi ta b+hU mi/ nAn ma ka ni bi b+ha mid ta/ sha ri ngi shwA/ a ma la ni ma la/ bu li ten
268a5(dkon brtsegs): shi tsa/ ha ri/ ma ma li/ b+ha ra ni/ ti shwa/ tsakru ni ra// ud+hi ri ta ba tsi/ a na da dri/ ku ti ri/ ke du/ su pa ra~M// kar ni/ ku su ma ni ye/ ka ka ri/ ka Sha ri/ u pa la mu ra/ 
268a6(dkon brtsegs): !/ dar ni nag ni ba re/ bar lad taMti/ a ti pa ra ya te/ an tar b+han d+he/ an ta sh+tsa ti shiH/ has ri/ ma kha li/ i nes ma b+ha re/ tai shwa si tA ni/ ku d+hu mo tsa te/ 
268a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang rgyal po rnam thos bu// yul 'khor srung ni la sogs pas/ khyad 'phags sgra ni grangs med kyis// bden pa'i sngags tshig rab tu smras// tshad med sgra ni de dag kyang // bder gshegs
268a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul dbang gis byung // rdzu 'phrul dag ni tshad med pas// bstan pa dag kyang tshad med do// res 'ga' sangs rgyas med zhi dang // rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i stobs dag gis// 'khor skor sangs rgyas sku snyan
268b1(dkon brtsegs): bas da ltar mthong ba'i bzhin no// bsam gyis mi khya ba zhing dag tu// sprul batshad meng ston mdadapas// bltam nas gom pa bducu gshegs dang // rgyal srid spas nasar 'byung dang // byang chub snying po
268b2(dkon brtsegs): sas rgyas nas// brnyes pa'i chos dag ba dgos te// chos kyi 'khor mo bskor mdzad dang // mya ngan 'das pa ston par mdzad// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs dag gis// sna tshogs chos ni ston mdzad pas
268b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag ni tshad med dmas/ khyad 'phags ye shes grub par mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// byams chos bsgos pa bshad bstan pas/ 
268b4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i sems ni 'phel bar mdzad// der thugs rje chen po yis// lha rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas// bsdu ba'i dngas rabazhi bshad bstan pas// bsdu pa'i spyod bzhi 'angal bar mdzad
268b5(dkon brtsegs): ri tshe thugs rje chen po yis// klu rnams kyis ni yongs bcwo/ ra nas// ke bAng nyes dmigs pashad bstan pas// zhe sdang sems ni spangs par gyur// dri tshe thugs rje chen po yis// bano
268b6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor nas// rnam tshe nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas// rnam 'tshe sems ni spangs par 'gyur// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lha ma yin gyis yongs bskor 'thab pa'i nyes
268b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs bshad bstan te// bzod pa bsgom pa'i bsngags pa brjod// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// namakha' lding gis yongs bskor nas// 'gal byas nyes dmigs bshad bstan te/ 'dus pa'i
268b8(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis bsngags pa mdzad// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// dri za'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// dga' ba'i tshig ni dpag med kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags brjod bstan// de tshe
269a1(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen po yis// sngo 'bye 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// mu sgegs chos la smod mdzad cing // com ldan gsung rab bsngags brjod bstan// de na thugs rje chen po yis// 'dun phran
269a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mchog/ rgya cher bsngags pa brjod par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig zang mthar bstan
269a3(dkon brtsegs): thos pas na// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// drugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya blong snyed// mig skye mtha' ni bstan thob pas// mthar phyin do ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen
269a4(dkon brtsegs): nges 'phrul brtan pas// sems can dag ni brgya slong byed // mig gi mtha ni ba stan thob pas// mthar byin na ni rtogs par gyur // thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan papa// sems can dag ni brgya gang stes
269a5(dkon brtsegs): mig 'jug bstan pa thos gyur nas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs pa ra gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/ da sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig ben bstan pa khros pas na
269a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' phyin don ni rtogs par gyur // zugs rje chen pos 'phrul/ bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya dong snyed// rmA gal skye med bstan thos pas// mthar byin don ni rtogs par gyur
269a7(dkon brtsegs): rmugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig med bstan par thos pas na// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems
269a8(dkon brtsegs): can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig ni nyir zhi bstan thos pas// mthar byiphyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la bdag med bstan thos pas
269b1(dkon brtsegs): mamar phyi don na rtogs par byung // drugs rje chen pos 'phrul brtan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong rnyed// mig la gang zag med thos pas// mthang byin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul
269b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong rnyed// mig la sems can med thos pas// mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong steng // mig la
269b3(dkon brtsegs): srog med thos pas na// mthar phyir don ni rtogs par gyur// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// mig la gso ba med thos pas// mthar phyir dad ni rtogs par gyur/ 
269b4(dkon brtsegs): drugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya ni// 'jig rten shes rab smad de ni// zhen pa mi skyed nyid dus dzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems can rnams la rgya
269b5(dkon brtsegs): cher ni/ 'jig rten snyed par ba smang de// 'dus ma byas kyi bsdu/ gas brjod mdzad// thugs rje chen ngos 'phrul bstan pa/ sa// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// zag bcas shes par bslang
269b6(dkon brtsegs): de/ zag med shes rab bsngags par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// 'jig rten bsam gtan rab smad de// 'jig rten 'das pa'i ting 'dzin bsngags
269b7(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// zad bcas tshul khrims rab smad de// zag med bslab gnas bsngags par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas// sems
269b8(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la rgya cher ni// sems brgya chung ngu'i skyon brjod// sems rgya chen po ri yon tan bsngags// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// lus kyi tshul khrims sems shes rab// zag med
270a1(dkon brtsegs): / rjed pa med pa'i// bsngags pa dag ni brjod par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i lam bsngags shing // spros la dga'al zhing zhen pa dag/ sangs rgyas
270a2(dkon brtsegs): spang bar rab tu bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// ming cang spyod ni rab 'byed cing // rang ni mtshan nyid bstan par byed// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid // gzugs smang
270a3(dkon brtsegs): reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad nga bzhin spyang bar bya// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// ngar la bab cing gzhon pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par
270a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan// zugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnam/ sa la rgya cher ni// tshe rigs dag ni bsnyems pa la// nyas ni/ gas dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan
270a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// longs spyod pag med gyur kha la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod bar bstan// thugs rje/ chen pos 'brub bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya che ni// 
270a6(dkon brtsegs): yang bag med gyur ba la// nyes dmigs dngag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pas 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// gzugs kyis bag med gyur ba la// nyes dmigs dathag med yod pa
270a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// bud med pag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can
270a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams la rgya cher ni// gos kyis bag med gur ba la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// chang gis bag med gyur pa la// ces
270b1(dkon brtsegs): darigs dag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// rgyal po dag med gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dngag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan
270b2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// tshul khrims bsnyems par gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can rnams la rgya cher ni// shes
270b3(dkon brtsegs): rab bsnyems par gyur pa la// nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan// de bzhin rtogs dang rdzu 'phrul dang // bsam gtan mkhas pa'i nga rgyal dang // nor dang bshad dang rig dang 'khor// rol mo glu nga lce rung
270b4(dkon brtsegs): dang // grags pa phun tshogs bsngag pa nas// bkur sti dang ni rnyed pa/ dang // mdzes dang g.yo sbyang rgyal dang // ngo tsha med dang khrel med dang // khengs dang phun tshogs nga rgyal dang // bag med 'dod chags de
270b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can/ gang zhig sems dang yid// dman par gyur pa de dag la/ khyad par lalags da'i 'du shes bstan// drugs rje chen pos 'phrul
270b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan nas// sems can gang zhig rang zhum zhing // rtsol bar mi byed de dag la// brtson 'grus stobs ni ston par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can gang zhig nor drags la// chags
270b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa de dag la// chog shes chos ni ston par mdzad// gzhan yang spos kyi dri gtsang khang // me tog dag gi gzhal med khang / khang pa brtsegs ma mchog sprul nas// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas zhugs par
270b8(dkon brtsegs): bstan/ gzhan yang lha'i bu mo rnams// me tog tsam pa khang pa na// gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas// me tog phreng thogs mchod byed bstan gzhan yang lha min bu mo dag/ me tog ma li khang pa na// gnas
271a1(dkon brtsegs): / ba lus phyed bstan sprul nas// me tog phreng thogs mchod byed stan// gzhan yang lha'i bu rnams dag/ pad+ma sngon po khang pa na// gnas pa lus byed bstan sprul nas// sangs rgyas yon tan
271a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa bstan// gzhan yang tshangs pa rnams kyi lha// gser gyi gzhan med 'ang ba na// gnas pa lus kun bstan sprul nas// sgra stan sas rgyas bsngags pa stan// gzhan yang ste'i bu mo dag/ sna tshogs rgyan ni lu
271a3(dkon brtsegs): brgyan cing // rgyan ni phan tshun reg pa las// sgra snyan dag ni rab byung nas// 'dus byas rnams kyi chos dag ni// 'gyur zhing mi brtan yin na yang // byis pa mi bden rtog pa yis// yang dag ji bzhin mi shes zer
271a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyan gyi rgyuni ga cang // lus pa sems las byung ba yin// 'grob med cing 'ong ba med// phyogs kyang yod pa ma yin te// gzugs dang sems kyi bang du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyang bar bya// byis pa
271a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis mi sems pas// 'di la the tsom skye bar 'gyur// rgyan gyi rnam pa de dag las// sgra snyan byung ba de yis ni// sang sa rgyas zhing kun grags pas ni// sems can tshad med grol bar
271a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur// de lta bas na khyed rnams kyi// 'dren pa'i rang byung ye shes dang // yon tan dpag med sku dag ni// srad pa'i spros las 'das pa dang // rab dben skyon ni med pa dang // lta bral sems mi rab sbyangs dang
271a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang dpa byang brgyan pa dang // glu dang thugs ni dag par bltos/ khyed kyis bcom ldan grong gshegs che// gom pa dag ni seng ge 'dra// gshegs stas dang pa glang chen 'dra// sems can rab bskong bar mdzad
271a8(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams khyad 'phags so su rdzogs// yang gamatshan gyis rab tu brgyan// sems can dag ni thangs cad kun// ska bas mi ngoms nyid du ltog// khyed kyis dang gnyis gtso ba'i mchog/ zugs rje chen
271b1(dkon brtsegs): po ldan pas na// pos po chung sa mchod byas kyang // yon tan tshad med 'thob mdzad pas// sems can dag ni mang po rnams// bskal ba brgya spong mang por ni// mya ngan 'das pa 'thob bar du// rnam smin thub pa
271b2(dkon brtsegs): med par ltos/ khyed kyis rkang gnyis gtso mchog ni// zag med tshul khrims rdzogs pas na// sems can dag ni mang po rnams// gus pas spyi bos phyag byed dang // lha'i 'khor ni mang po rnams// so sor gzhal med
271b3(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas// rtse ba dag la chags med par 'dren pa la ni sten byed ltos/ khyed kyis bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor// bcom ldan 'das la dang bskyed nas// gsar gyi rlung yab dag thogs te// g.yas g.yon du ni
271b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khod pa dang // bdud kyi bu ni lnga brgya yis// lha'i me tog yid ngabs// de bzhin gshegs la mngon gtor nas// bla med ye sho sa chol la ltos// las pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la ni// bsnganas
271b5(dkon brtsegs): brjod cing mchod pas na// deng ci bcom ldan phrad gyur nas// so sor dga' bar gyur pa yin// spobs pa dag ni tshad med kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod// de'i tshe na bdud kyi bu
271b6(dkon brtsegs): sred pa spangs pa zhes bya ba// thog mar bcom ldan bsngags brjod nas// mig zad mtha' ni shes par gyur// mig gi skye mtha' shes pas na// rab zhi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs// gzhan yang mig zang la sogs pa'i
271b7(dkon brtsegs): ming don tshig ni dpag med rtogs// des na tshig mkhas dag gis ni// sems can rnams la yang dag bstan// ming dang don rnams la yang ni// zhen dang the tsom med pas na// 'gro 'ong med par rab rtogs shing
271b8(dkon brtsegs): bla ma med ba nyid du gyur // rang bzhin dag ni slong len pas// ye ge rnams ni sbas pa dang // len dag zung dang klog pa dang / kha ton 'dod cing bsgrub byed drugs// 'das pa'i de bzhi gshegs pa rnams
272a1(dkon brtsegs): sngon yang ba tu bye ste bstan// 'artags pa'i mi cam yin pasan// yang dag brjod du ci yang med// rang bzhin stong pa de dag ni// phung po khams dang skye mched las// brdzun pa med cing bden
272a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang med// gnas dang gnas pa yod pa mid// tshig gis smra ba'i lam chad cing // sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu zhi// skye bo'i mtshan ma zhen pa'i phyir// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs par mthong // bcom
272a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan mtshan ma yongs spangs kyang // byis pa yang dag ma yin rtog/ bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// gang zhig dga' ba skye 'gyur ba// mya ngan gdung dang bcas par 'gyur// gang zhig mtshan
272a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i chog sbas pa// grong khyer gshegs pa mthong mi 'gyur// gshegs shing bskyed pa'i mtshan ma la// rnam rtog med pa'i shes rab 'thob// gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthong
272a5(dkon brtsegs): des ni grong khyer gshegs pa mthong // skye zhing 'khor ba'i cha sa dag la// rnam par rtog pa skyed par byed// gang gis sa rgyas mtshan mar mthong // dga' bdag ni skye 'thur ba// de ni
272a6(dkon brtsegs): bdud kyi spyod la gnas// bdud kyi spyod yul snang ba yin// gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthong // de ni 'gyur ba mthong ba yin// de ni mya ngan ga dus bcas pas// mkhas pas snying brtser bya ba yin/ 
272a7(dkon brtsegs): chos la thob par gang lta ba// de la chos sngon mya ngan yod// sangs rgyas mthong ba skyes pa la// mya ngan 'das pa'i sdug bsngal yod// bskal pa mang por gang bsgoms pa// mtshan ma thams cad rtogs pas
272b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'dar ba'i 'du shes med// gang gis de ltar ba shes pa// sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong 'gyur zhing // ngo bo nyid kyang stong rtogs par/ mthar ni skye 'gag ci yang med// bcom ldan bskal pa dpag med nas
272b2(dkon brtsegs): gar ba rnams ni rab spyad nas// ngo bo nyid ni spong mkhyen na// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtog so// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// 'khor ni brgya stong mang gis bskor// mi dang mi ma yin la
272b3(dkon brtsegs): sogs/ dang ba'i sems kyis mchod pa pas// gang gis skad cig tsam du ni// mig zang mtha' ni rab sems shing // mtshan ma rnams ni stong tshogs na// 'dri'i bsod nams de bas 'phags// bgrang ba dang ni
272b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs kyi cha// rgyu tsam du yang mi bzod do// de bzhin mig gi skyem tha' dang // mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas// rab tu zhi ba'i bang du yang // de bzhin du ni rig par bya// rna ba sA lce lus dang yid/ 
272b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang // thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// zhabs ni
272b6(dkon brtsegs): sa la reg tsam gyis// sa ni kun tu rab tu g.yos// ri rnams gang yin de dag kyang // thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phyogs// lha dang mi ni chos kyi phyir// thams cad longs nas gus mchod byas
272b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// lha'i dbang po mi'i rgyal// lha ma yin mang po dang // gnod sbyin dag ni mang po rnams// rang gi grong khyer spyongs nas ni// bcom
272b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan sbyar 'dus 'gyur te// rab tu dga' bas mchod pa byas// de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// gzhan yang rnam pa tha dad pa'i// bya'i tshogs ni tshad med pa// 
273a1(dkon brtsegs): co ba ni rma bya dang // ka la bing ka byi'i rnams// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa'i// yon tan mchog ni mthong bas na// thams cad ra mkha' dag la ni// rab tu dga' bas
273a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtse// thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// sgra snyan dag ni rab tu phyung // de nas de tshe bcom ldan las// grong khyer ni gshegs pa'i tshe// bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dang // rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs
273a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis// sems can chad med btu stong zhid // mangs pa dag ni mthong bar gyur// 'od pa rnams ni thos par byur // dang po ma chang gang yin pa// thams cad dang po tshang bar gyur// sdug bsngal la ni
273a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dag/ thams cad bde ba thob par gyur// de nas de de bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du dri gshegs pa'i cha// namakhar brar snang dag las ni// 'di skad smra ba thos par gyur// gang
273a5(dkon brtsegs): gis mtshan ma rnams kyis ni// de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs byed/ ga/ de yis bcom ldan 'as la ni// mdzadza' bya zhes brjod mi bya// mig zangs na mang bamaud// rtogs
273a6(dkon brtsegs): bar yang ni mi 'gyur ro// mtshan ma rnams ni gang smras pa// yon tan bzhi'i ni bsags pas na// mig zad pa tha 'ong ba nyid// rab tu rtogs par yang 'gyur ro// 'di ltar mig ni zid pa'i ma
273a7(dkon brtsegs): rag tshugs par gyur bar byi// sas rgyas rnams kyi yon tan yang // rab tu rdzogs par khor chud// mi ni da pa'i mtha gas// de 'dzin rnyed pa me pa dang // rig m+bu pa'i gal
273a8(dkon brtsegs): rten cing gnas pa med pa dang // g.yo ba'i b.lam pa med gyung pa// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig ni skye ba'i mthar dgal// rnam par rtog pa med pa dang // mig gi
273b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ni gang yin pa// de la yid kyi rtog med dang // mig ni rnam par 'jig pa la// bstan par bya ba med gyur pa// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig ni med par gyur pa
273b2(dkon brtsegs): la/ mngon par zhen pa med pa dang // mig ni skye ba med pa la// yongs su sdud pa med pa dang // mig ni rab tu zhi ba la// 'dzin pa dag ni med gyur pa// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin
273b3(dkon brtsegs): mig ni zad par shes pa'i phyir// mtshan rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang // mig gi mtha' ni shes pa'i phyir// dbang po dag ni nges gyur dang // mig ni skye ba shes pa'i phyir// dbang po rang dbang thob gyur pa/ 
273b4(dkon brtsegs): des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin// mig ni med par rtogs gyur nas// gzugs ni khong du chud ba dang // mig ni 'jigs par rab shes nas// chos la so ma
273b5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa dang // mig ni skye med shes gyur nas// lam ni sgrub par ga/ nga byed pa// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig zad mtha' ni gang yin pa// yang
273b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i byor// las kyi bye brag zad pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// las kyi bye zag zad dpa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
273b7(dkon brtsegs): mthong banyid dur gyur po yon// mi'i skye pa ni gang bad pa// yang dag/ je bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// sdug bsngal byesas pa da pa// da yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// sdug bsngal bye brag zadad
273b8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu chags par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yod// mig gi 'jigs pa gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtags pa'i phyir// sdug bsnga
274a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// sdug bsngal 'jigs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// 
274a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig gi med pa gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// mtshan ma spangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// mtshan ma spangs pa gang
274a3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid 'gyur ba yin// mig gi skye med gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// bag chags
274a4(dkon brtsegs): spungs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ dpag chags sbas pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyu dpa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong
274a5(dkon brtsegs): nyidu 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang mig gi mi rtag nyid// ya nga dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// bsgrib pa sbas pa ga / yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// bsgrib pa
274a6(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang mig la yi ge med// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i
274a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir/ sangs rgyas ye shes stobs dag kyang // rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas ye shes stobs dag ni// rab tu stogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong
274a8(dkon brtsegs): ba nyid 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang mig gi mi 'ong nyid// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// 'dod rnams spangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// 'dod rnams spangs pa gang yin pa// 
274b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu brtags par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang bsam gtan sgom padag// yang dag / ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// nyon mongs sbas pa
274b2(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa// yang dag rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// nyon mongs spangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni bzhin gshegs pa rnams// mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gang zag des ni
274b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du// mig gi sngon mtha' shes pa dang // mig gis mi gnas shes pa dang // mig mi skye ba'i shes pa dang // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul shes pa dang // mig gi man pa shes pa dang // mig ni khyad par lags
274b4(dkon brtsegs): shes dang // ye shes dman pa shes pa dang // rnam dag ye shes te sa pa dang // tshul khrims rnam dag shes pa dang // lus kyi sdom pa di shes pa dang // rnam ngag sgra'i shes pa dang // ngag gi sngo pa'i
274b5(dkon brtsegs): bdang / rnam dag sems kyi shes pa dang // gnas kyi bye bragashes pa dang // sems kyi chos kyi shes pa dang // sems spyod ma gas padang/ rnam dag las kyi shes pa dang // sems kyi sdom
274b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i shes pa dang // nyes dmigs shes pa'i shes pa dang // rnam dag sgra'i shes pa dang // phung po bye brag shes pa dang // phu mo'i rgyu rkyen shi bo dang // mig ni yongs shes pa dang // sdug bsngal 'thung gdas shes pa dang / 
274b7(dkon brtsegs): zag med tshul khrims shes pa dang // tshul khrims rgyu rkyen shes pa dang // sdug bsngal rgyu rkyen shes pa dang // sdug bsngal zang po'i rgyu shes pa dang // 'dug byas rnams kyi shes pa dang // zad mi zad pa'i shes pa dang / 
274b8(dkon brtsegs): yo su rdzogs par byed pa yin// gzhan yang rgyu rkyen bcu gnyis kyi// spyod dang bcas pa'i shes pa dang // spyod med pa'i shes pa dang // mtshan ma bcas dang mtshan ma med// 'dus byas dang ni 'dus ma byas/ dam/ 
275a1(dkon brtsegs): par bzhag yongs sdu dang // dag gnan gyi las shes pa// yang gang zhi shes pa yin// gzhan yang mig pang skye mtha'ang // mig gi mtha lad pa med pa// 'dug pa ra ni med pa
275a2(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba dang nyer gi cing // yang ga ji bzhin shes pas na// sems can dag ni mang po rnams// rnam par dag pa'i ye shes dang // 'thung bcas pa'i ye shes dang // brtson 'grus ye shes 'thob par byed// gzhan yang cig pa
275a3(dkon brtsegs): tha dad shes// sems can dag ni thams cad kyi// mos pa'i shes pa gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi// mos pa khyad par 'phags pa dang // rnam dag sems kyi shes pa
275a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / las dang rnam smin shes pa dang // dbang po khams kyi shes pa dang nga// sems ni 'gyur ba shes pa dang // shes rab mos pa'i shes pa drang // shin tu rnam grol shes pa dang // spobs pa mchog gi shes pa
275a5(dkon brtsegs): dag/ yang ga/ ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang sems can ma lus dang // chos la mos pa med gyur pa// yang ga ji bzhin shes pas na// mos pa'i shes bskyed par byed// gzhan yang do kyi
275a6(dkon brtsegs): tshul dag ni// yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na// le lo med pa'i shes pa dag/ dus shes sgrub par byed ba yin// gnan yang rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gas// chos rnams rab tu byed pa dang // thog pa med pa'i ye shes
275a7(dkon brtsegs): dag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang rgya chen don dag dang // tshig gis bstan pa gang yin pa// rjes su shes pa'i shes pa dag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang grogs bzang 'thun
275a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang // gos dang zas dang btung ba dag/ tshod shes pa'i shes pa rnams// yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang bya ba med pa'i// gzungs kyi chos ni gang yin pa// nan tan bsgrub pa'i shes pa dag/ 
275b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag dri bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang lu sems skyon med cing // blol bus srung le la yos sa nag/ bla pe shes ga col pa// yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul dbas pa/ 
275b2(dkon brtsegs): gis nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni// sprul pa'i sku ni rab bstan nas// sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed// yongs su smin par mdzad pas na// thams cad rab tu dgar gyur nas// ngang ba skyes pa'i shes pa
275b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang // mos shing gus pa'i shes pa dang // 'dod chags spangs pa'i chos dag la// rab mos sgrub pa'i shes pa dang // 'phags pa'i dge 'dun tshogs la yang // mchod par
275b4(dkon brtsegs): mos pa'i shes pa dang // byang chub chen po dag la yang // rab mos bsngo ba'i shes pa dang // gzus rnams kyi ni slong gi la/ rab mos ston pa'i shes pa dag/ mos pa rnams ni gang yin
275b5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ so sor rab rtogs shes pa dang // 'phags pa'i ting ra dzin gang yin pa// legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang // bsrung dang rjes su dran rnams la// nges par byed pa'i
275b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang // dpag tu med pa'i sems dag la// legs par 'jug pa'i shes pa dang // tshigs su bcad pa tshad med rnams// yang dag ston pa'i shes pa dang // 'dod pa'i mtshams sbyor gang yin
275b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rtogs shing go ba'i shes pa dang // 'gro ba dpan pa de dag tu// ltung bar mi 'gyur shes pa dang // mi dge ba shes nyen gang yin pa// yongs su spongs byed shes pa dang // dge ba'i bshas nyes gang
275b8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa// bsten par byed pa'i shes pa dang // 'dri zhing lan ldon gang yin pa// rab tu rnam 'byed shes pa dang // gnas dang gnas min gang yin pa// legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang // sa dang sa min
276a1(dkon brtsegs): mang yin pa// legs pa rtogs pa'i shes pa nga// rang khri mam gang yin pa// rnam par 'byed pa'i shes pa da// 'du rgyas shes pa gang yin pa// 'brum rgyab rgyags
276a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam padan rdzas gyi shes/ ngom nas min shes pa dang // yos su bye gas pa dang // ya mu ba mi gas pang // man par rgyu gas pa nga // ya na rgyu mau sa pa
276a3(dkon brtsegs): mig dang mig min gas pa dang // migang kun cig shes pa dang // mig gi bye bra gi shes pa dang // mig gi rang bzhin shes pa dang // yang dag jibi ni ni shes pa yin// rna ba sA hU~M lus nas ni// sna
276a4(dkon brtsegs): mam ma nga// ma rna \u0f7f/ ma gi sa su// shAn // ya ga ga sa chen // sa
276a5(dkon brtsegs): yong sa yin papa// sems par rgya gang yin pa/ ga / dani de bzhin du// yang gas na ni//  yin pa yin pa// so su rdzags pa skyed chu
276a6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig na don 'brel dang // mig dag pa'i man dgo// sa pa ti du drugs 'thu nas// sems par byed pa dang sri ga/ gang gas ni na du// tshig rkyen dang ma
276a7(dkon brtsegs): mthar ni yod pa ma yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs par 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/ smad ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa ti shun+de// thams cad de bzhin sbyar ba
276a8(dkon brtsegs): bya/ de'i tshe de na bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// zhibs ni sa la reg tsam gyis// rdos pa mchar ba bstan pa// deng 'di bdag gis mdar bsdus nas// maud tan
276b1(dkon brtsegs): drag chu cad // sems ma ga bskyed pa'i byud// sa ga pa ni can pa cu// ritshis mi dzin pa sgre// 'i lu rgya gas na//  rdzun pa na/ 
276b2(dkon brtsegs): bkye bar gyur bas na// 'od zer dag ni re res kyang // zhing ni tshad med gsal mdzad nas// sems can mang po kun gyi phyir// sangs rgyas mdzad pa rab tu mdzad// gang zhig ladas pa'i dus su ni
276b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang // yun ring sbyin dang tshul khrims dag/ mngon par bsrungs pa gang yin pa// de lta bu'i gang zag dang // des ni ji skad bstan pa'i// rdzu 'phrul dngos pa thos chu
276b4(dkon brtsegs): na/ rab tu dga' zhing ngos par 'gyur// gang zhig sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnams// nyan pos dang ni rang rgyal gyi// spyod yul min par rab shes nas// de lci ba'i gang zag ni// des
276b5(dkon brtsegs): ni ji skad bstan pa'i// rdzu 'phrul dag ni thos gyur na// mos pa dag ni skyes 'gyur zhing // ngo mtshar 'dzin pa'i sa mas kyang bskyed// lha dang mi ni 'dren pa yis// bsam
276b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab mthu dag gis// de lta bu la sogs pa'i// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rab bstan pas// sems can dag ni brgya stong dang // tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni
276b7(dkon brtsegs): bsted cing rim gro mchod pa byas// lha dang mi ni 'dren pa yis// bsam gyis mi khyab mthudag gis// ma sde dag ni brgya stong dang // chad med grangs med rab bshad pas// sems can dag ni mang tsha
276b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ bstan pa de ni thos pas na// thams cad dang bas rab blas te// sems ni rab tu dga' bar gyur// de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das// gong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni 'ju
277a1(dkon brtsegs): dag gis// namakhar las ni 'di skang du// mi zad mtha' ni shes banas// mig ni nye bar zhi ba dang // mig nyid rgyu'i bar du yang // 'gro ba med cing 'ong med dang // mthar ni
277a2(dkon brtsegs): stong dben shes pas gyis// de skad du ni thos par gyur// rna ba sna lce lus nas ni// sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// de'i tshe na
277a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe// nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni// sgra snyan dam pa mchog byung nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sna tshogs// bsngags pa brjod par gyur
277a4(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ 'khor ni 'dus pa chen po rnams// thams cadad dad mos sems kyang skyes// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i // mi'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni bdud dang bdud dpung
277a5(dkon brtsegs): // pam mdzad cas kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'dzin/ bu'i mtshan// thos par gyur ba de dag ni// log pa lnga ba'i tshogs thams cad// rab tu 'dul bar dus zhes

277a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'dod chags gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// de ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i// mi'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni zhe sdang gzhon pa dang // zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes
277a8(dkon brtsegs): bya/ gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// zhe sdang dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i// mi'i seng ge gang yin pa/

277b8(dkon brtsegs): gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// lta ba dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i// mi'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni spros pa

278a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i// mi'i seng ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni 'du byed gang yin pa// rab rtogs chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu'i mtshan// 'dzin pa
