303b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhug so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la dong gsum gyi stong chen po
303b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog gi tshogs chen pos pus nub tsam du gang bar gyur to// sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra yang byung // 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan bsgreng bas kyang legs
303b8(dkon brtsegs): bar brgyan par gyur to// sbos mchog gis kyang ma ga par gsus te/ gzhan 'phrul bar byed kyi ltar longs spyod dang / khyad par med par gyur // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems tha' chen pochom/ 
304a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste/ 
304a2(dkon brtsegs): lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'as la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma dag la 'khor du bcas te/ phyogs gcig
304a3(dkon brtsegs): tu 'khod ngo // yang de'i tshe lho phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA ri klung dgu cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa zhes bya ba de na// de bzhin
304a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ste/ nga ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pas yongs su
304a5(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ga thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams med// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing den byang chub sems dpa' sems dbu' chen po lag na rin po che zhes byab
304a6(dkon brtsegs): zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ci'i phyir/ lag na rin po che zhes bya zhe na/ yang rigs kyi bu de nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du sems can rnams la chos ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe/ lag pa g.yas pa
304a7(dkon brtsegs): brkyang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du yod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed lag gis byugs nas/ lag pa de las sangs rgyas rin po che'i sgra 'byung // chos rin po che'i sgra dang / dge 'dun rin po che'i sgra 'phyo
304a8(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab rin po che'i sgra 'byung // byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms rin po che'i sgra
304b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung // de ga nga gzhan ma rtsa ma rin pa ma'i skam tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya gong 'gyu ste/ de byir rigs kyi bu de la gang rin po ma zhes bya'o// byang chu ba sems dpar la gang ri pocas snang
304b2(dkon brtsegs): de yang mthong / gsung gsal ba'i sgrang yang thos te/ mthong cing thos nas kyang / bcom ldan ladas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rgyal gyis bskyis pa gal ba der song de byin nas/ bcom ldan 'as kyi 'dus
304b3(dkon brtsegs): la mgo zas phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'gro/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ bcom ldan las de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i
304b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gyim skyem ba de la yi sad kyis gsom te/ ldan pa sngo sde bachen po 'di'i jigarten du rgyu shing / dngagasal ba'i kutsun po yang bdang ba li ni rgyu gang lags/ 
304b5(dkon brtsegs): gang lags/ bcom ldan las nges bkara' stsal pa/ riH/ sa kyi bu byang phyog su sa sa rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrigs N+DI'i klung gu cu rtsa drug kyi
304b6(dkon brtsegs): dasteng 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces byab yong / den de bzhin ga shegs pa dgu bcom pa yang ngag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya cu thub pa zhes bya ba ma yang bathunas pa/ 
304b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing gzhes lachos kyang rjon to// de bzhin gshegs pa des/ gang 'i byigs 'gyu 'jig rten gyi khams cad ma grangs med pa ga ma/ bying nutha sems dpa' bsdub dang / 'ang sa bre/ dang
304b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos bsgrag pa'i byed/ baspu'i khung bu thams cad nas/ 'od 'didag sa tubakye zhing / gsung gsal ba'i sgra zung // yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pashA kyi thub pa de/ sangs rgyas kyi
305a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed de/ der byang chub sems dathar dzag tu med pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yo su 'dzin parar gyu
305a2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po chos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der// 
305a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub ses dpa' 'dus pa de la yang blta
305a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod der song ste ci rung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
305a5(dkon brtsegs): gis khebs pa'i sems can rnams dang 'phrad pas na/ 'ji/ garten gyi khams de ni sdug bsngal ba'o// de skad ce/ sa bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
305a6(dkon brtsegs): bo lag na rin po ches/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
305a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des/ don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa gzhan dag kyang / mchis bzhin du de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs
305a8(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des/ nga ci nas sems can ngan pa rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang / 
305b1(dkon brtsegs): pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub bangon pa sa bya/ chos bskrun par bya zhes yun nga pon sa smon lam 'dab par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ni kur drugs rje chen po dang ldan no// des
305b2(dkon brtsegs): ma ldan las bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rgyal gyis bskyes pa del/ byang chub sems da' sems pa' chen po lag na rid panas 'di ces zhes me // bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi
305b3(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed deng / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slang du mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thugs rje chen po bskyed
305b4(dkon brtsegs): de/ de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhib na pa yong su bzung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de nga/ ra ba mdzad pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gra bcom pa yang dag par
305b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bu ni 'byung bar dka'o// de mthong ba yang rnyed par dga'o// bcom ldan las de/ sa bkar stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i su la dbab par shes na
305b6(dkon brtsegs): song la rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnga rab tu bsgrim pa gyi shig/ smras par gyur ta re/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rjer skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni bsnyen par dga' bo
305b7(dkon brtsegs): der sems can gzhan dag kyang gtum zhing khro ba go// de skad ces bkar stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ bcom ldan 'alas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i
305b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gyis bskyis pa de la 'di nad ces gsam to// bcom ldan 'das gang rjesu chags pa dang / khong khro bar 'gyur ba de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sbas par 'gyur gyi/ bcom ldan 'das bas
306a1(dkon brtsegs): / la ni rje su chags pa'ang ma mchis/ khong khro ba'ang ma mchis na/ bdag ci'i slad du smras par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'as bdag la sems can thams cad kyis phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par gshe
306a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing spyos te/ bsdigs shing btsogs nas bong ba dang / mtshon gyis btab kyang bzod par spro ste/ sems can gang la yang gnod par bgyi ba'i sems mi bskyod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal
306a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis bsgyings pa des rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed las gang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ba de rigs kyi bu 'di dang lhan
306a4(dkon brtsegs): cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der deng shig/ bcom ldan 'das nges tshig de skad gsus ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis/ dbyangs
306a5(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems par lag ni rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o zhes gsol
306a6(dkon brtsegs): to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems ya' chen po lag na rin pa tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdang te/ lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa cig gis sangs rgyas
306a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ding gnaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu'i bcom
306a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro zhing sems can tshad med pa la ji ltar bde bar bya snya mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong
306b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas/ lag pa de las bza' ba long pa rnams la bza' ba 'thung ba dang / btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btud pa dang / de bzhin du bzhon pa dang / gos
306b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / mun shel dang / byi ru dang / su dag ci 'dod par gyur pa thams cad de las byung bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang chos don du gnyer zhing chos
306b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa de dag gis kyang lag pa de las chos thos par gyur pa dang / den sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis kyang chos mngon par rtogs par gyur ba dang / sems can gang nad rnam sna tshogs kyis btab cing mu
306b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bar gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang mchog tu ba ba ldan par gyur ba del bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya bas don par byas// de nas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa che gyi
306b5(dkon brtsegs): lag na rin po nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnams pade lta du 'di bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang ldan tu/ gdu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gal ba
306b6(dkon brtsegs): der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma de dag la 'khor dang
306b7(dkon brtsegs): bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod // yang de'i tshe nur phyog su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'ang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya spong gad+hI klung dgu cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i snying po
306b8(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nang bubargyags brgyal po zhes bya ba lar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kya ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sa brgyas ci'i re ni/ baDUrgya bang po mtshan
307a1(dkon brtsegs): las mngon par grub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis yongasu
307a2(dkon brtsegs): ga ngo // yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang 'gro yang rung / 'ong yang rung 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung ldan yang rung 'chag kyang rung ste/ de dag gi bai DUr+ya'ili sa chen po de las/ bcom ldan
307a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rtsegs pa rgyal po de mthong ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ shin tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bai DUr+ya'i sa
307a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po de las de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas chos kun 'dri ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang de dag lung ston to// de dag kyang chos thos nas bzod pa thob bo// 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi
307a5(dkon brtsegs): smon lam gyis/ bcom ldan las de'i smin mtshams kyi spu'i dbus su yang nong bu ri po che chen po mngon par grub ste/ no ra'u rin poH/ de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad snang bar
307a6(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni me tog kha zub pa dang / me tog kha bya ba las nyin mtshan bgrang ba ma gtogs par/ nyi ma dang rna bar mngon pa yang med/ nyin mtshan du mngon pa yang med do// yang de bzhin gshegs pa
307a7(dkon brtsegs): nor bu rtsegs/ rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros shes bya ba zhig gnas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis snang / 
307a8(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rtsegs rgyal po dag la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo zos
307b1(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig su dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems la' chen po smon lam khyad par blagros kyis bcom ldan las de bzhin gshegs pa nong du rtsegs rgyal pod padzad
307b2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan las snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsungs bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gang ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan las des bka' stsal pa/ rigs
307b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu shar phyog su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ga'i klung gu cu rtsa gnyis kyi byem snyed 'as pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs
307b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub ba de/ bya ba ltang yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang mun to// de na bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'i daphyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis
307b5(dkon brtsegs): khams bye ba khrag khrig tshad me dgrangs med pa gnas byang chubs ma/ sa dbang bsdu ba dang / 'di ga ste chos bsgrag pa'i phyir/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od 'ding ga rab tu bkye zhing gsung bas la
307b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgra byung ngo // de skad ces bkar stsal padang / byang chub sems thar smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di sad tsas gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bangag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
307b7(dkon brtsegs): deng/ bcom ldan 'das nga bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta bang
307b8(dkon brtsegs): ches bstan pa de la nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan las des bkar stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i su la dbab par shes na song shig/ de das byang chub sams dpar smon lam khyad par blo gros byang chu sems rapar bye ba drag
308a1(dkon brtsegs): / khrig brgya grong bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yo su bskor ba'i mdun du bu dang te lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'ding
308a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bus bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
308a3(dkon brtsegs): shAkya bub pa de'i bang du 'gro bar bya snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis/ de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
308a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i se mas can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i/ me yang rab tu zhi bar
308a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang / sems can gang ga bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa yi dgas dang/ dung 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dgang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad bkres pa dang / skem
308a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bral zhing bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dge slong bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba bzhin te/ skad cig de nyid la/ sems can de dag bde ba rnam pa 'di lta bu skyes nas/ skad cig de nyid la sems can
308a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag 'dod chags sam/ zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug gam/ khro ba 'am/ nga rgyal 'am/ 'chab pa 'am/ 'tshig pa 'am/ phrag dog gam/ ser sna 'am/ g.yo 'am thab la/ gnod sems kyi gzir ba med pa dang / 'gro/ 
308a8(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de nyid la/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
308b1(dkon brtsegs): 'du byas te/ deg bu 'i 'i 'dzin la snyoms par nug so// de nas byang chub sems dpa smon las khyad bar blogras kyis/ rdzu 'brus kyi cho phrul rnam pa 'dis bu' bstananas/ byang chubya sems pa sems dpa
308b2(dkon brtsegs): chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gal ba de do ste/ lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo zas phyag 'tshal
308b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma de dag la 'khor ra bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// / yang de'i tshe byang
308b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig sa/ dA'i klung dgu cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs
308b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su la'i dbang por rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhings zhes la chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der khyim bgos
308b6(dkon brtsegs): dkar ba gyon pa med de/ byang chub sems de dag thams cad kyang / gos dung smrig 'chang ba sha stag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing den bud med kyi ming yang med cing / mngal gyi gnas kyang mi sheso// byang chub sems dang 'den
308b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig yoni pa/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas par rdzus te 'byung // bcom ldan las de yang / byang chub sems dpa' de dgu la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par
308b8(dkon brtsegs): rab du rtson to// de lasangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ gang ring byang chub du dang bsems bskyed de/ de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa yong su rdzogs pa/ bya chub
309a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug pa/ gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i gnas/ sems mi g.yang ba/ gtong ba rje su gtong ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rje su 'jug pa/ mtshan ma med pa la yang dag par sgrub pa/ smon pa med pa
309a2(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rab tu rtogs pa mdun pa'i bya ba rgyud chags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa de la mngon par dad pa chos thams cad rab tu
309a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa de dag la yongasu rtog pa med pa/ rtog pa yang dag par chad pa de yang mi mthong ba 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyi
309a4(dkon brtsegs): brgyan paskar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de'i smon lam gyi khyad par ni 'di lta ste/ sems can ji snyed kyi sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthong ba de dag thams cad
309a5(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa ra 'gyur ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung
309a6(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das stsa la'i dbang po rgyal po 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de
309a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'jug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos
309a8(dkon brtsegs): bam ldan las de bzhin gshegs pa sAla'i rang por rgyal po 'gyu la la 'dzin cas gsal to// bcom ldan 'das sdang bachen po 'di nga / gsung bas la pa'i rnachen po 'di/ 'jig rten du byung ba'i chu
309b1(dkon brtsegs): gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa su la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba des/ rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu ma phyogs
309b2(dkon brtsegs): sas rgyas kyi zhing 'di ras/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing garnyi klung drug khri sum stong gi bye ma snyed las pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
309b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba nga ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des/ gang 'ang
309b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrag pa'i phyir spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'ang dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung
309b5(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba'i sgra byung // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i sgra/ du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bgyi/ bcom ldan/ 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi
309b6(dkon brtsegs): khams den sems can 'dod chags la mi mjed/ zhe sdang la mi mdzad/ ma gti mug la mi mjed/ sdug bsngal la mi mjed de/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
309b7(dkon brtsegs): las sems can de dag las la la spyod pa dang mi snyan par rjod pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / bstegs pa bzod cing dong du len par bgyid pa mchis sam/ 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sal tam/ de bzhin du zhe sdang
309b8(dkon brtsegs): gi sems dang gti mug gi sems sal ba mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams den// sems can de dag las gang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa ni ru // rigs kyi bu sen de dag las pal
310a1(dkon brtsegs): cher ni/ gnod sems dang thab dang zhe sdang mang ste/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gti mug gis kun tu dkris so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab po// 
310a2(dkon brtsegs): gal te sems can de dag bzod par gyur na ni de'ang rung ra/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi bzod pas na deri sladadu/ bcom ldan 'das mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab po// bkar stsal pa// rigs
310a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la
310a4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byas/ bzod pa dang / dul ba dang nges pa dang ldan pa dag yo/ dre/ de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi spyod/ bsdig mtshon gyis pa trab kyang ji snyam mi mjed de/ 'dod chags dang zhe sda dang / gti mug/ 
310a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis mi 'phrog so// rigs kyi bu das pa de dag gi ming gis la jig rten gyi khams mi mjed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yang de na sems can kha cig sdig pa'i
310a6(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan pa mu tshor smra ba/ khro ba gtum pa sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnasu gzhol ba/ ngan 'gro'i spyod yul pa/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mi gus pa/ brag deg la ngon
310a7(dkon brtsegs): par dga' ba'i sems can ngan pa de dag gis de tsam du spyod shing smad de gnod par byas shing / skur kyang bcom ldan 'das de snying rje bas bzod cing dang du len te/ sa dang mnyam pa'i sems rje su chags pa dang / khong tshe
310a8(dkon brtsegs): bamed pas bsti stang du byas kyang khes par mi byed/ bsti stang dum byas kyang 'dru bar mi byed/ de spyos shing brgyab kyang mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ mi 'phrogs/ mi chags mi skyo ru
310b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bu la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan bskar ma
310b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag 'jig rten gyi khams der / de tsam du smang pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du pa skyes pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnye // bcom
310b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang dang shar gyi mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
310b4(dkon brtsegs): der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa rba rgyas yang phyug chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnaso// rigs kyi bus sa rgyas kyi zhing der/ sems can
310b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab tu bde ba dang ldan// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong gi bde ba bzhin te/ sems can rnams kyang bde bde lta bu dang ldan no// yang rigs kyi bu 'dzin
310b6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa der lo bya ba brgya stong du tshungs par spyod pa spyad pas ni/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du than sa gol gtogs pa srid tsam du sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyang na/ de
310b7(dkon brtsegs): bas na 'di bsod nams ches mang du bskyed na/ gang nyin mtshan du yo su dag par gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po rgyal po 'byung ba de la/ byang chub sems
310b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa sang ma rtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di gad ces gsol to// bcom ldan pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dang / bcom ldan las de bzhin gshegs pa 'gra bcom
311a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang chos bstan pa de yang nyan du
311a2(dkon brtsegs): mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dusu la dbab par shes na song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po// byang chub sems
311a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongasu bskor cing lhan cig tu/ sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
311a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems tre/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro snyas
311a5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ de de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon pa/ byas nas/ snong gsum gyi gong chen po 'jig rten gyi 'a/ mas 'di rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur pa
311a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab/ sil snyan brgya stong yang 'khrol mu tig gi rgyan phreng brgya stong yang mngon par 'byang / gdags dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba nga
311a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong yang mngon par 'phyang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dus pa/ dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
311a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
311b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa shes pa/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul man papa dru bya ba mngon par bya'o// dedes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa man gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu'i
311b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag deng ldan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub ga la bde ngo ngo ste lhags nas/ bac+doMs
311b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la go bos byagra 'tshas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsub skong babyas nas/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba nyid dag la 'kho nga bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod// de bzhin du sbyar daphyogs bcu kun
311b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'argya slong cang meng gras ma dab ga tu yang byang chub ba dam sa da' chen po tshod me dgras med pa rnams kyis/ snang bachen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i slad yang thob sa
311b5(dkon brtsegs): ra rang gi bzhin gshegs pa la yo su nus te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di lpags nas/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang / bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa grab tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sus
311b6(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skongar byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod// gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin pa
311b7(dkon brtsegs): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam par ldi dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de ma yin pa lnga'i bu ga zi brjid che ba gzi brjod che pa de dag zeng
311b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'ong zer gyi snang ba chen po yang mthong gsung gsal ba'i sbeng yang thos nas/ bcom ldan las de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thu pa ga la bad nga ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan las kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsha
312a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan las la lan gsum slong 'byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu mdzang // de sabacom ldan 'as kyis de'i tshe/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ phyogs
312a2(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig bcwa stong tshang med gras med pa ji rnyed pa de dganas/ byang chub sems dpa' chad meng gas med pa lacu pa de da thams cad kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad yi ma nga gi
312a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med cing / khyad ma zhugs par mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog dang / chu zheng ci 'dra bar bcom ldan
312a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku yo su grub pa yang de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / nyan thos chen po phun sum
312a5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa ci 'dra ba dang dir yang byang chub sems dpa' dag gis so so nas shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyang maphang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug pa snya du shes pa
312a6(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad// de sa byang chu sems dpa' sems pa chen po byabs pas/ byang chub sems 'i 'khong rgya chen por mthong nas/ sman las la sa te bla gras phrag pa
312a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ldangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan las ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// phyogs bcu rnams
312a8(dkon brtsegs): grags pa mtha' yas blo// 'jig rten lhar bcas 'di ni lam me ste/ thub pa'i thugs ni sems cad thams cad kyis// tshad gzung mi nus de phyir khyod bsam yas// phyogs bcu dag nas rgyal sras dpag med
312b1(dkon brtsegs): ba/ chos tshol sbrang du de mi 'ding lhags shing // bcom ldan la sal ku kyang gus bcas gnas// smra ba'i mchog gis chos rnams rab tu ga sus// phyogs rnams ma lus par ni brjod grags pa// tshul brims
312b2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus ting 'dzin blo rnams kyis// seng ge ltar ni 'jigs med khyod mdzes te// namakha' dgu la nyi ma bzhin du gsal// lha dang klu nga l+h+wa ma yin gsang ba pa// dge bsnyen po mo dge slong dge slong ma/ zang
312b3(dkon brtsegs): gus bcus thal mo sbyar gnas kyis// bcom ldan par bzhed chos ni bshang du gsol/ khyod ni 'damam khyen de bzhin ma los dang // da lcar yang ni yin tu nganges par mkhyen// lus can momo pa ji bzhin myongs sa
312b4(dkon brtsegs): la/ the tsom chen posel ba'i chos bshad gsole// thub pa rgyal bras ji ltar spyad pas na/ gong rnams dag pa rdul med 'thob pa/ 'gyur // ji ltar smon lam 'grub ba 'thor 'gyur ba// de'i len
312b5(dkon brtsegs): sa bku' byung ba ga gsol// jig sa 'i drings mnang // ji ska dus drim pa mnyams 'grung ba dang / bsdigs pa da ni bzhin sru dang // sa padag kyang
312b6(dkon brtsegs): ljar bzod// sdug bsngal dums rab tu gzing ba yi// 'jig rten dag gis sdug bsngal bzlog slang du// bskal ba bye ba mang po rgyal sras rnams// ji ltar brtson 'grus rtsom zhing spyod par 'gyur// rtag tus ma
312b7(dkon brtsegs): ni rtse gcig mnyam gnag cing // bsam gtan gnas pa spyod yul rnam dgaste// pad+ma chu yi dri mas mi gros ltur// ji ltar 'dod pa dag gis gos mi 'gyur // thub pa ji ltar zang mo'i chos smra zhing // mkhas pa
312b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten las pa'i blo ldan 'gyung // brtan pa ji ltar bdud sde bcas bcom nas/ byang chub rdul bral bla med reg par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems da' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la
313a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdang shongs shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang na de la bzhugs nas// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon ngan bkod pa'i spyod pa la yang Ta/ 
313a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa'i tshul la mkhas pa sgrub pa dang por bsam zhing nan tan bya ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi
313a3(dkon brtsegs): dbang ci zhig gzigs na/ bdag gdan gding du bcug ste/ gnas brtan kun dkara' po dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bkar ma stsal/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' gdan 'ding du bcug pa las na/ gtan 'di
313a4(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' 'bar zhig gi phyir brtsams nas/ nyan thos padra/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongasu spangs pa'i gtam zhig 'thung s+ye/ nyan thos dang sangs rgyas rnams ni chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin pa
313a5(dkon brtsegs): lta zhig snya mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par byas pas / de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri 'phang du lag tshad bzhi 'bum pa/ 
313a6(dkon brtsegs): rin po che du mas spras pa/ lha 'iri ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba/ shing bal ltar 'jam zhing / reg na bde ba bshams nas/ khri de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po ri 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas so// 
313a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das khri sda ma las bzhes te/ seng ge'i khri de la bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das seng ge khri de la bzhugs ma thug tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu gsos
313a8(dkon brtsegs): so// de nas bcom ldan las kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bkar stsal pa// shA ri'i bu ches pa ni dang ldanan/ byang chub poda'i seMng nga chen po smon lam mo su rdzogs par 'gyur // bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
313b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sems can la snying rje ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos bzhi po dadag dang ldanan/ byang chub se de sa dang chen po smon lam
313b2(dkon brtsegs): yo su rdzogs par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gcig dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpar se ra chen po smon lam las mi nyams shing / sang sa rgyas kyi zhing phun sum chogs pa yo bu sbyong bar 'gyur // chos gcig
313b3(dkon brtsegs): po gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob cing long ba dang / 'dun pa skyed pa ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sdod
313b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na tshig 'di skad ces gal te bdag skye ba thams cad du rab tu ma byung na/ sangs rgyas thang la bslus par gyur cig ces smras te/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas de bzhin na rgya
313b5(dkon brtsegs): ba mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rje su bslab pa/ dbyor// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems la de ltar sprob pa ni skye ba thams cad du ru tu 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byu
313b6(dkon brtsegs): yang rung / ma thung yang rung / gang na mi za ba khyim gyi gnas nas 'thung // de ci'i phyir she na/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'gyu ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnyeng pa'i mchog yod
313b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir// shA ri'i 'u rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu yong su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa la chags par mi 'gyur ba dang / dgon pa'i gnas la
313b8(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba rnyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yang 'thob pa dang / de rlung ma dang / bu bo dang / bu mo la sred par mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos rnam par spong ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba'i ches la brten pa dang / 
314a1(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yong su mi nyams pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba dang / de la lha rnams dga' ba dang / de la mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i
314a2(dkon brtsegs): bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod
314a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sems can thams cad dgrol bar 'dod pas/ rgyun tu rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba la shin tu dga' bar bya'o// shA ri'i bu chos gcig po de dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las ma
314a4(dkon brtsegs): nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang yongasu spyod bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi
314a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu yong su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ gnyis ga shen/ shA ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa 'i chos mi ston/ gzhan yang can thos kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du
314a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jug cing / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang de bzhin pa dang / gang ringasangs rgyas kyi chos yo su bsgru ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o// shA ri'i bu la
314a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gnas bcu yong su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
314a8(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi dge 'dun rab tu rnyed pa dang / de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i tshul yongasu sgrogs shing chos ston pa dang / 
314b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dis ste/ de ba rgya byi dings/ mangs panyid kyi phyir sems dasems las nga ba rgyachen po skyed pa dang / ming mur na yang 'chang los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyung ba dang / sas rgyas tho bar bral bar mi 'gru ba dang / 
314b2(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi rnam dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / g.yog 'khor mi byed par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med gras med pa yong su 'dzin pa'o// shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang stong gsum gyi song chen po'i 'am
314b3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa dang / rangs su rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa pas gang rigs kyi bu ma rigs kyi bu mo bcis
314b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la gzhag na/ do ni bas bso rnams ches mong du skyed // shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rangasas rgyas skyes pas ni/ sas rgyas kyi rigs mi
314b5(dkon brtsegs): 'chang bar mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba medan/ 18/ dang / rangs sa rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ dri'i dus ngas rgyas 'byung ba yod na/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad cing / 
314b6(dkon brtsegs): thos dang / rang sangs rgya su ga gras pa yod par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems dpa' rab tu 'god pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu po de dag yong su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu chos gnyis po dang nga/ 
314b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi mnyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongasu 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
314b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa dang / 
315a1(dkon brtsegs): pa cing med par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / mug khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur pa'o// shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu 'job ste/ bcu
315a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ gang ridi mi 'jigs par grong du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par 'khor la chos ston pa dang / mi 'jigs pa kha zas za ba dang / mi 'jigs par gtsug lag khang du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par dag 'dun
315a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi nang du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par lung 'bog pa dang / mi 'jigs par slob don dang / mkhan po'i drung du 'gro ba dang / mi 'jigs par byams pa dang ldan bstan pa 'khor la rjesu ston pa dang / mi 'jigs par gos dang / 
315a4(dkon brtsegs): zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad la spyod pa dang / des smras pa gzung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu po de dag 'thob po// 
315a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chu ba sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu yo su 'dzin te/ cu gang zhe na/ gang 'di de sdig pa mi long pa yin/ de shes kyi khe mi
315a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa yin/ de grags pa 'i 'ad pa yin/ de kyi ma chum mamatshan yis med pa yin/ dgos dang / zas dang mal cha ngan pa'i gsos sman dang / yo byad ngan don tsam gyis chog shes pa yin// des smras pa/ gzung bar 'os pa yin/ lgang/ 
315a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang de'i drung du 'gro ba yin/ de tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa yin/ de sangs rgyas kyi sems la sems skyed pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub
315a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po dag yo su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpar yon tan gyi phan yon 'acu yongs su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di 'du yi/ 
315b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par spong ba dang / rab tu ben pa la brten pa dang / de bsam gdan la sems dmigs par 'gyur ba dang / bya ba mang por mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams yod pa dang / de'i lus bde ba dang / mi 'phrul ba dang / de'i mas
315b2(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa par chad du mi 'gyur ba dang / tshegs chung ngus ting 'dzin thob pa dang / ches tshig dang / yi ge bstan pa rnams chung mi za ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas
315b3(dkon brtsegs): ba lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po dag yong su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu chos gsum po dadag dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpar smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
315b4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan pakod pa ji lta bu la du ba de lta bu yong su 'dzin to// ri 'i bu gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpar smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
315b5(dkon brtsegs): ngan bkod pa ji lta bu yong su 'dzin te/ bzhi ga she na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dbu bden par smra ba yin/ dzi na smras pa de bzhin bye cing / nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ nga rgyal chur ya
315b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir zhugs shing / phrag dog dang sar sna yongasu spangs pa yin/ pha rol 'byor pa la yang yid dga' ba yin no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni bden par smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 
315b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ de'i kha nas ud pa la'i dri da 'thung ba dang / lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mthar yo su dag par 'gyur ba dang / lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad mar gyur cing / tshig 'khrul pa med par 'bru
315b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung phun sum tshogs pa yong su 'dzin pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub
316a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi ga she na/ gang 'di ngas 'gror skye ba rnam par spong ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ rngo mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / rta'i skye gnas dang / de bzhin du gzhan smad par skye
316a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par spong ba dang / mi smad par 'gyur pa dang / gzhan byir rgol ba dang / mi mdzad pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur pa dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de
316a3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni/ nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni/ phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste de gtong ba'i sem
316a4(dkon brtsegs): la mi rmongs pa dang / mu ge 'byung ba'i dus na sbyin bdag tu 'gyur pa dang / de tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'ongs na khyims kyi sgo gcod par mi 'a gyur pa dang / de'i gtong ba dang / len pa la su yang phrag dog mi byed pa ste/ 
316a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni drag dog dang/ sar snga yongs su sbas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu bani bo 'di dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dgar ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ngan
316a6(dkon brtsegs): yon te// bzhi gang zha na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag bzung ste/ bdag yidi dag gi ched du go cha bgos nas/ 'odi dag la bde bar sbyar ba bya ba yin na/ sems can 'di dag rang gi mthus bsgrubs pa'i
316a7(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod kyis/ bde bar 'tsho'o zhes dgar ba rnyed pa dang / de'i longs spyod rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / me dang / chu la sogs pa dang / bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba dang / 
316a8(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe/ de la rgyal po yang dga' bar 'gyur na/ sems can gzhan lha smos kyang ci dgos/ de longs
316b1(dkon brtsegs): nga nga /  tu skyong ba rgya chen po la sems 'jug paste/ shA ri'i bu ban pa dag ni/ pharob 'byor ba la dgar ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i pan med do// shA ri'i du chog bzhi po dag dang ldan na/ byang chu sems da
316b2(dkon brtsegs): smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yo su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpar smon lam las mi nyams shing
316b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu lod ba de lta bu yongasu 'dzin cing / longasu sbyong ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa
316b4(dkon brtsegs): so mu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir / chos kun tshu tshol zhing dgapa mchos can pa de la byang chub samos dpas/ ji lta yon tan 'di dag yo su bsgrubs pa de kun 'dri zhing de chos de thos nas/ de bzhin dun tan byed
316b5(dkon brtsegs): badzo// shA mI'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sang / sa rgyas kyi zhing yo su ga par skye bar smod cing / de tshul nas yo su ga par mgyung bste/ de nus khrims so su dag pas dang
316b6(dkon brtsegs): dang gang du smon pa der der skyes te/ de der skyes nas/ de sangs rgyas kyi rkang yong su dag pa la sems shing rtog ste/ nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ longs spyan
316b7(dkon brtsegs): da kun spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa mtshan mor 'dzin te/ des de dag mtshan mar bzung nas/ gus pa dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas zhing thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das
316b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas ji ltar spyad/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yong su 'dzin ces kun zhus nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang / de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen te/ gang rnams kyi
317a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yong su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag ston cing / yang dag par rab tu 'chad de/ de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o// shA ri'i bu
317a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan zhing bya ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de mi shes pa yongs su sbyong zhing bya ba ma yin pa yo su spong ngo // de la ye shes ni gang bya ba ni gang zhe na/ ye shes shes bya bani
317a3(dkon brtsegs): gang dmigs pa la dmigs pa ni ye shes te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang bral ba'o// bya ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang
317a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rgyu dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ de la chu ni gung / 'byung ba ni gang zhe na/ rgyu zhes bya ba ni gang 'di tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste gang las
317a5(dkon brtsegs): phyin ci log bzhi la sems can rnams gnas par ra'agyur pa'o// de ni tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin te/ de la tshul bzhin rgyu rab gang zhe na/ gang 'di chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste/ 
317a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba yang de nyid yino// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes/ zhing gi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu sheso// de la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang / zhing gi ngo bo
317a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsa mo// zhing gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de yang ming tsamo// gang ming tsam pa de dben par shes shing / ji ltar chos gang yang mi dmigs pa de ltar shes pa
317a8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ shA ri'i bu chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi g.yo zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod ba de lta bu yong su 'dzin cing yongasu sbyang ngo // 
317b1(dkon brtsegs): shA'i thum nan rangachos dru gang ldadran/ bya chung se par 'gyur du blan med pa lang grapa rdzogs pa'i byang chub mno pa pa cang rgya zhing / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'dags pa'i sas rgyas kyi ni mo su yin te/ 
317b2(dkon brtsegs): bru gang na/ shAri'i bu la bya na sams da 'di/ sbyid papo spyod pa gsu 'gyur te/ debum pa gang sa pa yid du la mamangon par mang bar 'gyur ba de su mo su matong mang nub par mi 'gyu shing / ngas
317b3(dkon brtsegs): dadang / dgrub dang / ras pa dang / yi ci bsgyesal nas/ 'di kyang gang ying blan med pa yang ga par rdzogs pa'i byung chub mngon par spyo pas/ bdag gis sbyin pa chen po dang / theg pa chen po dang / bya bachen pa yong su rdzogs
317b4(dkon brtsegs): bar byong // kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ni/ bla med pa la ga pa pa/ gas par byang chu bsgrub par mi rdzo/ ska du rdeg go// de de ltar ba dgas nas/ 'dog pa thams cad ma su gtong bar 'gyur te/ del
317b5(dkon brtsegs): gi lum dang bran mang su btang yang / yid mi bde ba mi 'gyur na/ gnad nar gyi rnam pa dang / mu ma dang / bu bo dang / bu moH/ smos kyang ci dgos/ shA ri'i bu 'di la ji skams du sems
317b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di bstan pa jil bu zhe na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad ba spyod cing / bdog pa thams cad mo mu gtang ba yin te/ de'i phyir de
317b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chubazapa pas na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// shA bi'i bu gzhan yang 'dis bya chu bya bems dpar khyim par srung ba sung du / rasu byung ba ra 'byiste/ chub khrims kyi rlom pa lamag par 'dzin pa la bsums
317b8(dkon brtsegs): ba yi / de srog gi phyi yang brlab pa las mi ladong // gang chus khrims kyi sdom pa yang ga pa ga chu ba de yang / sems ca thams cad mun mong du byas nas bu med pa la phag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu du sa
318a1(dkon brtsegs): su bsngos/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes dga' ba rnyed cing mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ mngon par dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod/ de tshangs par spyod cing bde bar nyin mtshan 'dar ba
318a2(dkon brtsegs): byed do// de bde bar chos mngon sum du 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa yang dag par sa sor rtog par 'gyung // yang dag par so sor rtog pa la gnas pa ni zab mo la bzod pa skye'o// zab mo la bzod pa skyes pa
318a3(dkon brtsegs): ni lta ba drang por 'gyuraro// lta ba drang ba ni yang dag par nan tan byed par 'gyuraro// yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas pa ni khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// de khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bas
318a4(dkon brtsegs): skrag par 'gyuraro// skrag pas 'byung ba tsholo// 'byung ba mthong nas dri 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bdag sdug bsngal ba ltar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams
318a5(dkon brtsegs): cad khung khyer la/ nye bar zhi ba ma gtogs par 'di dag gi bde ba'i d+hu gzhan med do ga so// de de lta bamasong rtog na/ snying rje chen po 'thobabo// de cher snying rje bas thams cad mkhyen pa mthong
318a6(dkon brtsegs): bar du/ mgo dang / gos la ma 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus mi 'ang ngo // shA li'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems pa' de bzod de'i go gyon cing / 'azod pa'i rlabs dang ldan pa yin gying rgyal gyi spobs
318a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ma yino// de spyos brgyab/ brdegs/ bsdigs kyang bzod pa sgrub ste/ pha rol mi 'khrug gnod par mi sebaso de'adi snyam du sems bskyed// gal te bdag la sems can de dag gis ri rab tsam gyi rdobs
318a8(dkon brtsegs): brdegs shing / bskal pa bye ba'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad par shes yang bdag gis gnod sems da tha bar she sdang gi sems bskyed par mi'i bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni mi bslabs pa/ bdag ni sangs rgyas
318b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'as rnams la slob par 'ang pa'o snyam nas/ de ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyis smyos pa dang / brgyab pa dang / brdegs pa de ste lta bur snying rje chen po babyed de/ bag gis sems can 'di dag bskyang par
318b2(dkon brtsegs): byaro// bdag sems can 'di dag gi don du go cha bgos nas/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag gzung ba yin te/ bdag gis 'di dag 'khor ba las yongasu gyur par byar/ bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems dang / tha
318b3(dkon brtsegs): dang zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o snyam mo// de de ltar bzod pa'i go cha bgos pas/ phun sum tshogs pa bcur thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa
318b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzugs phun sumatshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor phun sumachog sa pa dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos nyan pa phun sum tshogs pa
318b5(dkon brtsegs): dang chos la nan tan byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / shi 'phos nas/ kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa dang / mthong nas kyang dpa 'thob pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzod pa'i go cha bcos
318b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ phun sum tshogs pa bcu po de dag 'thob pa// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i chos yongs su bsgrub ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams shing yi ma la brtan pa yin
318b7(dkon brtsegs): no// de 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gal te bdag gis sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar yang 'khor bar bya'o zhes tshul 'di dag dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa 'di dang / spyod pa
318b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di dang / sems zhi ba 'di dang / yid sa 'di dang / dge ba'i bsam pa 'di dang / snying rje'i sems 'dris sems can thams cad kyi ched du bskal ba de sted du 'khor bar bya ste/ de ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag
319a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su mi ga ngon ma nas/ brtson 'grus rtsom po// yang shAla'i du byang chu sems pa' d+hU krung gi bye ba rked kyi phyogs btsungs sa rgyas kyi zhing / ri pon snga bdun gyis yongs sun
319a2(dkon brtsegs): bar byas te/ sems bskyed pa sems bskyed pa tsam la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin babyin te/ tshul 'di dang / stobs bskyed pa 'dis/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskul pa bye ba
319a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa byin pa pas byang chub sems dpa' gang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa snying rje chen po la gnas pas/ 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyi go tshar sems bskyed na de de bas bsod dmas ches mang du bskyeng ngo // shA ri'i bu brtson
319a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi chos bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ des byis pa'i spyod pa sbas dpa yin/ des sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yo su bzung ba yin/ des
319a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba la nyes par 'du shes bskyed pa yin/ des snying rje chen bo yongs su bzung ba yin/ sngon dam bcas pa las mi ra gyur pa yin/ nad nyung ba yin/ las pa dang / ma byon pa
319a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan las rnams kyi bka bzhin byas pa yin/ la chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rlung ba yin/ ji ltar bstan pa'i tshig dang / yi ge rnams kyi don
319a7(dkon brtsegs): tu shes pa yin/ nan tan gyis yang dgu par sgrub pa yin te/ shA r-i'i bu brtsod 'grus brtsabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag 'thob bo// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sa
319a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni thugs rtse gcig pa rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa'o snyam nas
319b1(dkon brtsegs): de yang 'di skam dus pas te/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhung pa'i rjes su 'gro bar byas na/ sems g.yengs pa dang brjengs pas na/ gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas te gdas 'di thob par mi rus so// skam ras dachags pa thams
319b2(dkon brtsegs): cang dang / sangs su 'dzin pa thams cad dang / 'tho ba dang / bkur bsti thams cadad/ grong dang grong khyer nga/ grong rdal la chags pa thams cad dang / grogs po dang / grA mi dang / khyim la sred pa
319b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su btang ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ sems can thams cad ni bdag gis yongs su mi btang ngo snyams nas/ dgon pa rab tu dgon pa la mngon par ga' ba yin te/ bse ru ltar
319b4(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu spyod cing / dgon pa rab tu dgon pa dag tu gnas nas phyog/ sa gcig tu sems can rnams la byams pas khyab par byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du chud med pa
319b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ sems can thams cad la byams pas/ khyab par byed do// byams pa la gnas nas/ ba/ sam gtan la bsam gtan par 'gyur ro// yang
319b6(dkon brtsegs): ri ri bu byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gajigs gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas ba rnams la gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bde bar sbyar ba
319b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba na/ rab tu dben pa yodod cing dgon pa log su phyogs te/ gom pa bdun por na 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du spyang
319b8(dkon brtsegs): / ches myur du byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu bcu po 'di dag ni dben pa na gnas shing / bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
320a1(dkon brtsegs): / lha ste/ dran pa dang ldan pa yid blo thos nga ldan pa yin/ rtogs pa ldan pa yin/ mos pa nga ldan pa yin/ myung du spangs pa rab tu thob pa yin/ gsus sgrub pa yin/ skye ba nga 'jig pa la
320a2(dkon brtsegs): mangs pa thob pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi phung po las mi 'ams pa yin/ lha rnams kyis de la rim gro byed pa yid/ gzhan gyi 'byor pa lo mi long ba yin te/ shA ri'i bu bcu po de dag ni dben pa la gnas shing / 
320a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rgyu 'thun pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de 'di ltar shes rab gang nas byung snyam du nye bar
320a4(dkon brtsegs): rtog cing de 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab ni tshul khrims kyi sdom pa'i gnas las byung ste/ shes rab byung ba las chos dkar po thams cad rngam par 'phel lo snyam nas/ de shes rab la slob ste/ gang 'jig
320a5(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas dang / sngags kyi gnasang / nga / smad gyi gnas dang / ga byang garab dang / bsgru ga 'i las de thams cad la slob bo// bslabs nas kya de
320a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar sems bskyed de/ gang 'jig rten pa'i shes rab 'di ni/ yid 'byung bar ma yin/ lod chags dang bral ba ma yin/ 'gog par ma yin/ zhi bar ma yin/ mngon par shes par ma yin/ mngon par rdzogs
320a7(dkon brtsegs): par byang chub par ma yin/ dge sbyong du ma yin/ mya ngan las 'dar bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyis/ 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab gang gis shin tu zhi bar 'gyur pa'i bzo'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang / sngags rnam pa 'di lta bu
320a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / sman rnam pa 'di lta bu dang / shes rab rngam pa de lta bu yos su btsalo snyam nas/ de chos thams cad kyi thog pa yos su tshol lo// de chos thams cad kyi thog ma langs su tshol ban/ chos gang yang chos gang sa
320b1(dkon brtsegs): yage bar 'jog pa'i chos degang yang / yang ga par rjes su mi mthong ngo // yang ga par rjes su ma mthong bas/ rab tu zhi ba la gnas par 'gyur ro// rab tu zhi bar spyod pa la gnas nas yongs su yi mi 'chang ngo // 
320b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su yi mi 'chad pas/ de sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal ba tuzhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ bsam bzhin du srid ba 'dzin te/ shA ri'i bu chos drug po dag
320b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang ldan/ byang chub sems dpa byung du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya zhing smon lam las minyams la 'jig rten thams cad las mngon pa
320b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ning gi yon tan bkod pa phur su mchog/ sa pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nga bu gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldadan/ byang chub sems
320b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing rgyun thams cad kyi sa brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyong ngo // bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdog pa thams cad
320b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gtong zhing / sbyin pa de yang mi dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyang skyon med pa la tshul khrims de la rlom sems kyang med pa dang / bzod cing nges la/ sems can de yang mi
320b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la/ lus dang ngag dang / sems de yang mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan yang yongs su sgrub la de yang mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan la
320b8(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan pa dang / shes rab kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed la de rtog pa yang med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyang rjesu dran la/ de mtshan ma yang sel pa de// shA ri'i buchos dun po dag dang
321a1(dkon brtsegs): // ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / rgyan thams cad kyis brtan pa yang yongasu 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu chos brgyad dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / 
321a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi ring yang yongasu spyod ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ phrag dog med pa dang / rgyar sbyin pa dang / sems rgya che ba dang / chos smra ba la bsti snang byed pa dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa dang / 
321a3(dkon brtsegs): kun 'ged pa'i ngang tshul can dang / bdag la mi bstod cing / gzhan la mi smong pa ste/ shA ri' bu chos brgyad pong dag dang ldan ma/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi ning yang
321a4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu sbyong ngo // bam po gsum pa// shA ri'i bu chos dgu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam la sra mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu dag par
321a5(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lus sdom pa dang / ngag sdom pa dang / yid sdom pa dang / 'dod chags bsal ba dang / zhe sdang bsal ba dang / gti mug gsal ba dang / slu ba meng pa dang / 
321a6(dkon brtsegs): mdza' ba brtan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brnyas pa med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos dgu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas zhing yang yongs
321a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par byed do// shA ri'i bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yong su dag par byed do// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal
321a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sdug bsngal thos na/ mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thos na/ mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thos na/ mi 'jigs
321b1(dkon brtsegs): shing snying rje ba dang / lha rgud pa thos na mi 'jigs shin rje ba dang / mi rgud pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / dbul ba dang / mu ge dang / rkun po dang / rang rta dang / dmags gi gnod pa thos na mi 'jig
321b2(dkon brtsegs): shing snying rje ba ste/ de 'di snyam du ci nas kyang / bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dwags kyi yul med cing / bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang / 
321b3(dkon brtsegs): btung ba dang / bgo ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / sems can rnams kyang tshe dngag tu med par gyur te/ nga yi ba med cing yong su 'dzin pa med la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa/ de lta bu'i
321b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yong su dag par ma byas kyi bar du brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos bcu po de dag dang / ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing
321b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongasu dag par byed do// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' me tog khyer zhing / de bzhin gshegs/ pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du song nas
321b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ me tog 'di ji ltar dri zhim la kha dog bzang zhing blta na sdug ste yid du 'ong ba dang / mdzes pa de bzhin du bdag byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nga yang me tog sna tshogs kyis yosu
321b7(dkon brtsegs): gang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pas rab tu brgyan par gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ phye ma dang / gdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gzhon pa
321b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul dang / be DUR+Ya dang mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel lam/ byi ru'i bar dug rtsi
322a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dul yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkong pa bsgrub pa'i don du yongasu sngo zhing / tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrim
322a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sdom pa la gnas pa de'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni su la yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig mi brjod cing / yid du 'ong ba'i tshig sha stag rjod de/ de byang chub
322a3(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sems can gang gis kyang yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi thos te yid du 'ong ba'i sha stag thos par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gnan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bde ba yongasu mi tshol zhi
322a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan bde bas dga' bar 'dzin te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo'i sems can rnams bde ba'i dam pas tshi pa 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dag
322a5(dkon brtsegs): babacu'i las kyi lang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yang dag par blangs shing sgrub ste/ dge ba'i chub de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen
322a6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du bsngo ste/ de byang chub thong ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing / 'byung ba'i shes rab can du 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la
322a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' yul gang na 'dug kyang rung ste/ yul der skyes pa'am bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ sems can gang ji snyed cig des mthong ba de thams cad byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cings
322a8(dkon brtsegs): la'ang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi zag pa'i gtam mi rjod kyi gzhan du na/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam sha stag brjod de/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/ sems can
322b1(dkon brtsegs): gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad bla ra meng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas med cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yong su gang ba'i sangs rgyas
322b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing de thong bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi rnyed pa mi 'drogs cing / gzhan gyis thob na dga' bar 'dzin te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dar
322b3(dkon brtsegs): sems cad gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de thams cad mi 'phrogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos kyi 'thob pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma
322b4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ su'ang rung ste zhes pa byung bas mi rgol la bdag nyid kyang dam pa'i chos la sbyor te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi ning den nyes pa'i ming yang ye med par 'gyur te/  ci'i
322b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ sems can de dag ni nyes pa med pa'i chos can yongasu dag pa/ ra 'gyur ro// shA ri'i du gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos 'dod cing / chos don du gnyer la yongasu mi
322b6(dkon brtsegs): 'chang ba med pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ ji skad du thos pa'i chos la nan tan byed pas de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad chos 'dod cing / 
322b7(dkon brtsegs): chos don du gnyer ba dang / longasu yi 'chang ba med pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ ji gang du thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rdza
322b8(dkon brtsegs): che dang / dung dang / rnga rnga dang / 'khar rnga dang / bi wang rgyud gcig pa dang / sgra brnyan dang / khar dkror dang / gling bu dang / bi bang dang / bal ki dang / kim pa la sogs pa rol mo sil snyan gyi
323a1(dkon brtsegs): yo byad ying du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byed cing / dge ba'i rtsang de yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bsgrub pa'i don du yongs su
323a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngo ste/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sil snyan bcu stong ma dkrol ma brdungs par snga 'byin par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i du gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjing ngas pa'i sems can
323a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la/ dran par 'gyur ba'i gdam ngag gis 'dems te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams bsam gtan gyi zas can du 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
323a4(dkon brtsegs): gi yon tan dkod pa phun sum tshogs pa las brtsams te/ bskal po 'am/ bskal ba las lhag par chos bstan kyang / de bzhi na gshegs pa'i spongs pa la mtha' thug pa med mod kyi/ mos pa
323a5(dkon brtsegs): dang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/ byang chub sems dang / 'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag gis gang thos na/ de yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ba mdor
323a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan to// shA ri'i bu chos gsum dang ldanan byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / ji ltar bsams pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par
323a7(dkon brtsegs): 'grung bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag yod par gnas pa dang / ji skad du thos pa'i chos las byed pa dang / smon lam gyi khyad par te/ shA ri'i bu chos gsum po de dag ldan na/ byang
323a8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' myur du bla na meng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / ji ltar bsams pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
323b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad ni nga
323b2(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa la gnas so// byang chub ni nan tan la gnaso// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis 'grub bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
323b3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad ni ngag yod pa la gnaso// byang chub ni nan tan la gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dkong pa phun sum tshogs pa ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyi
323b4(dkon brtsegs): 'grung bo// shA ri'i bungs sngon ji ltar smon las btab pa de bzhin du sa sa rgyas kyi zhing yongasu grub po// shA ri'i bung bag yod pa la gnas pas/ smon lam yongasu rdzog so// shA ri'i bungs nan tan byas
323b5(dkon brtsegs): bas byang chub thob bo// shA ri'i bu dag med par gnas shing tshig gi las lhur len pa dang / nan tan med pas ni nyan thos kyis yang spud par mi nus na/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
323b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub lta ci smos te/ shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i ming du gdags par dam 'cha'angar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la bslab par bya'o// de nas
323b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong so so'i stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas kun gyis kyang mgrin gcig tu/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis
323b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la bslab par bgyi'o// nan tan gyis yongasu bsgrub par bgyi'o// bag mchis par gnas par bgyi'o// smon lam rnams yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// 
324a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// ji ltar bsam pa'i smon lam yong su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod paspyad par bgyi'o// de nas bco
324a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom
324a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'di skad du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
324a4(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'di dag thams cad bskal pa brgya phrag stong 'das nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa dar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu dper na/ se
324a5(dkon brtsegs): ge zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sha stag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang / gzhan du 'byung ba/ ngas gzigs pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ming smon lam bdon
324a6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba sha stag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan du 'thung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
324a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'od dpag med kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar/ lhag tshad med par 'gyur te/ tshe'i tshad ni ma gtog so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi tshe'i tshan
324a8(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re zhing tshe'i tshad bskal pa bcu bcur 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge
324b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra zhes bya ba/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
324b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das ga la bde log su thal mo sbyar ba bdung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis brjod
324b3(dkon brtsegs): cing bsngags la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di/ yun ji srid cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ji lta
324b4(dkon brtsegs): bu zhig tu 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
324b5(dkon brtsegs): / rigs kyi bu'ajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'didzi nyid la dz+hai ga/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dgo'i rgyal gyis mngon par bzhugs pa'i sgras 'jam dpal ban
324b6(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji srid gcig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod
324b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis kho bo la ci khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs sam/ 'on te ma zhugs shes de dris shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi du gal te kho bo byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na ni
324b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'chang yang rgya/ kho bo yang dag par zhugs pa med pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ji ltar 'gyur/ smras pa 'pha dpal khyod sems can rnams kyi don du/ bla na med pa
325a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rang dag par ma zhugs sam/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can darig su med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gal te kho bos sem
325a2(dkon brtsegs): can zhig dmigs na ni/ de'i phyir kho bo yang de dag gi don du byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug na/ rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir sems can yang med/ srog kyang med/ gang zag kyang med pa de'i phyir/ kho bo 'jug pa med do// ldog
325a3(dkon brtsegs): pa med do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos lam zhugs sam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pa ste/ 
325a4(dkon brtsegs): chos gang zag pa med cing khongasu gtogs pa med la mtshan ma med cing / mtshan nyid med pa de ni/ sangs rgya su zhugs pa yin te/ chos thams cad kyang / sangs rgyasu zhugs pa de dang 'drangs/ sangs
325a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya su zhugs pa de dang mi 'dra ba med do// rigs kyi bu gang yang khyod bya sa 'di skad du khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don du ma zhugs sam/ zhes smras pa/ de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa
325a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du lung ston cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji skad du sems/ gzugs kyang byang chub tu smon tam/ 'on te gzugs kyi rang bzhin nam/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dam/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/ gzugs
325a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi stong pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub tu smon/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on te gzugs kyi
325a8(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin nam/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dam/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ 
325b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa/ 'angam dang 'angon pa yid de/ gdugs byang chub tu spyon pa med do// gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / gzugs kyang bcad dang / gzugs kyi stong pad dang / gzugs

325b3(dkon brtsegs): mi rgya'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub tu smon tam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub tu sngon
