325b5(dkon brtsegs): rnas pa 'am pa la ngo ma yin te/ tshor dang / 'dugs pa/ 'du byed rnas dang / rnam pa gas pa 'ini byang chub sto do// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi pa nga byang
325b6(dkon brtsegs): smin pa med do// rnam par shes pa ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chung mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam
325b7(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ phung po lnga po ga las pha rol tu bdag gam/ bdag gi zhes bya bar gdags par nus sam/ 'jas dang la de ni ma yin no/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu des yin na// byang chub tu smon pa'i chos de gang zhig yod/ 
325b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chung mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyaba'ang gang shig yod/ snas pa lam nga la khyod la du bya chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnang dag gi dang du gyur pa/ chang sa gyur pas/ khong byang chub slo sa
326a1(dkon brtsegs): / med do// kho bo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes bshad na/ bstan de thos pas/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams skrag par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ rigs kyi bu
326a2(dkon brtsegs): / chos thams cad ni/ skrag pa med pa ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni skrag pa med pa'o// skrag pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'ang chos ston te/ gang skrag pa de ni skyo bar 'gyur ro// gang skyo bar gyur pa de ni 'dod
326a3(dkon brtsegs): chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gang 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni rnam par grol ba'o// gang rnam par grol ba de ni bcing ba med par 'gyur ro// gang bcings pa med pa de ni chags par mi 'gyur ro// gang chags pa
326a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa de ni 'gro ba med do// gang 'gro ba med pa de ni 'ong ba med do// gang 'ong ba med pa de ni smon pa med do// gang smon pa med par ni smon lam 'debs pa med do// gang smon lam 'debs pa med pa
326a5(dkon brtsegs): de ni log pa med do// gang ldog pa med pa de ni phyir ldog ste/ ci las ldog ce na/ bdag tu 'dzin pa las phyir ldog go// sems can du 'dzin pa dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa
326a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / chad par 'dzin pa dang / rtag par 'dzin pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa las phyir ldog go// rnam par rtog pa las phyir ldog go// nam phyir ldog pa de'i tshe/ 'gyur da med pas phyir mi ldog ste/ gang las byir ma
326a7(dkon brtsegs): ldog ce na/ stong pa nyid las phyir mi ldog go// mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog go/ de la gang las phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
326a8(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams gang zhe na/ bral ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam so// khongasu gtogs pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam so// dmigs pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam so// len pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
326b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam so// dor ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam so// rgyu ba med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa dang / mi tsam du zad pa dang / spong ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gag pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba me pa dang rnam
326b2(dkon brtsegs): par byang ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rdul med pa dang / rdul dang bral ba dang / bdag gi ba med pa dang / yid la bya ba med pa dang / me ldan pa med pa dang / zad pa med pa dang / blangs pa med pa dang ma
326b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa de dag ni chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la gang las 'di dag ni/ sas
326b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnam so zhes bya bar brjod pa'i gnas mi dmig so// rigs kri bu byang chub sems dpa' las nga bo ba gang gis bstan pa la di thos nas/ 'jigs par gyur pa dag ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
326b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang 'jigs par ma gyur pa de dag ni/ ci'ang mngon par rdzogs parar tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro// smrab pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsams shing
326b6(dkon brtsegs): de skad du son/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang 'jigs par gyur pa de dag ni/ rnam par rtog par 'gyur te/ gang rnam par rtog pa de dag ni/ 'di snyam du bdag cag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// 
326b7(dkon brtsegs): snyam pas/ de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pa/ ji snyed du skyed par gyur pa de snyed du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang dag de lta bu'i sems mi skyed ba de dag ni/ byang
326b8(dkon brtsegs): chub tu dmigs pa med cing / sems kyis rlom semasu mi byed de/ byang chub kyi semasu dmigs pa med pas rnam par rtog pa med do// gang gi tshe rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe/ ci'ang mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha
327a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyang med // ci'i phyir ci'ang mngon par 'tshang chub med ce na/ byang chub de mi dmigs pas de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa'i khams
327a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das kyis/ chos thams cad nama'a' dang mnyam par bstan mo
327a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bung lnga bas na nam pa' jilta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/ byang chub ji lta bar namakha' yang de bzhin te/ mamakha' dang / byang chub
327a4(dkon brtsegs): de ni gnyi su med de/ gnyisu dbyer med ngo do// gang gis de lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid shes pa de ni/ cung zad kyang shes pa rang la/ des ma shes pa gang yang med do// bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dge
327a5(dkon brtsegs): slong khri nyis stong nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems/ rnam par grol lo// lha dang mi khri ba ni stong chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing / dri ma med pa rnam par dag go// srog
327a6(dkon brtsegs): chags dgu khri drug stong gis/ sngon ma bskyed pa las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
327a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal khyod kyis yun ring po
327a8(dkon brtsegs): ji srid cig nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kha rog chos ma skyes pa la bdag rnam par rtog tu ma bcug/ rigs kyi bu gang la
327b1(dkon brtsegs): la zhig 'di skad du/ bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyad par bya'o zhes zer na/ de nyid de'i log par lnga ba chen por 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dag gis ni/ sems gang byang
327b2(dkon brtsegs): chub tu skyed par bya ba de ltar rang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ de ltar dag gis sems can de yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas/ byang chub tu yang sems ma ngaskyed do// smras pa/ 'jam dpa' rjes ma mthong nas
327b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i tshig de 'dzin gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi du yang dag par rje su ma mthong zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid bstun pa'o// smras pa/ 'jam dang 'i ci'i phyir mnyam nga nyid ces bya/ smras pa
327b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni/ gang la tha dad pa med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid nges chos thams cad 'di lta ste/ dben pa'i tshul du/ tshul gcig tu bstan nas/ rogacig tu brjod cing kus
327b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / chad pa me nga ba dang / rtag pa med pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mi 'gag pa dang / ngayi ba med pa dang / yong su 'dzin pa med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i
327b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos ston cing mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos de lta bu mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ye shes ni mnyam pa nyid ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos nyid
327b7(dkon brtsegs): khongs du chud ba de ni khams la tha dad par yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong // gcig tu yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba 'di ni mnyam pa nyid do// mnyam pa nyid gang yin de ni/ mi mnyam pa mang pa'o// ri ma
327b8(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa gang yin pade ni gzod ma nas dag pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad
328a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni/ ji srid cig nas ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// zhes bgyi bar mi ston te/ 'khor 'di dag ni nyan par 'tsha'o// bcom
328a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni/ zang mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ de yang ji tsam du byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ sems kyang mi dmigs pa de tsam du/ zab pa'i bzod pa
328a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan te/ des byang chub kyi sems mi dmigs pas ngas 'di ji srid cig nas/ byang chub tu sems skyed do zhes bya bar mi stod na/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yun ring po ji srid cig nas/ bla ra mang pa
328a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba sa pa'i dus brgal ba grangs med pa brgya song gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed brag bdun 'das pa de'i pha rol gyi
328a5(dkon brtsegs): yang ches pha rol/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i du ngas kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ bde bar
328a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na me dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi stod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar phyogs
328a7(dkon brtsegs): log su sangs rgyas kyi gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po zhes bya bar gyur te/ de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dubya
328a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba de chos ston to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos 'dus pa ni/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa ni de'i nyis 'gyur du gyur te/ 
328b1(dkon brtsegs): de re rgyal po namakha' zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i rin po che bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/ rigs kyi bu rgyal po ramakha' zhes bya ba de/ bu dang chung pa dang / gnyer 'dab dang 'khor du bcas
328b2(dkon brtsegs): ngas gnad med cing / skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug zla'i dbyangs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du bcas pa de la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong du zhal zas kyi rna
328b3(dkon brtsegs): ba khar ma thob med pa gnan dang gzhan dag dang / na bza' sar pa sa rang gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / pho brang khang pa brtsegs pa sa rab sa rang / gzhar dang gzhan dag dang / rim gro pa kha na ma tho ba mngang gnad dang
328b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyi rim gror byas par gyur to// de lngar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu/ deg cig tu dben pa na gnyi su med par 'dug 'dug pa'i yid la/ rnam pa
328b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i sems skyes par gyur te/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po mngon par 'dus byas kyang / de dag nges pa med pa'i se mas kyis 'dus byas na/ nga ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang yong
328b6(dkon brtsegs): sngobar bya'o snya nas/ de 'di snyam du sems kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du bsngo'am/ tshangs par bsngo 'am/ 'khor lo sgyur bar bsngo 'am/ nyan thosu bsngo 'am/ rang sangs rgya su bsngo 'am/ gang du sa
328b7(dkon brtsegs): skal pa dang / rigs kyi bu rgyal po de'i sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu/ seng gi bar snang la lha mang pos sgra bsgrags pa/ rgyal po chen po de ltar dma' ba'i sems ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyis
328b8(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams kyi phung po yangs pa byas kyis/ rgyal po chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig ces byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu de'i tshe/ rgyal po mamakha' de dga' ba dang
329a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes par gyur te/ des 'di snyam du bsam so// bdag ni byang chub las phyir mi ldog// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lnga rnams kyi bdag gi sems yongasu shes te/ sla bsgragasos mo/ 
329a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de ras rgyal po namakha' de srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cus yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'drug sla'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste
329a3(dkon brtsegs): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan gsum skor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po na mkha' zhes bya ba des/ 
329a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga la bde log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ khyod kyi spyad sngar chos dam 'u/ 
329a5(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu'i dam pa mchog skye bar// rnam pa gang gis 'gyur ba de// rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsungs// rnam 'dren khyod lam don sum du// mchod pa yangs pa dgyid bgyid kyang / ma nges sem
329a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bgyis gyur gyi// gar yang yong su bsdo ma bgyis// bdag ni gcig pu dben gnas tshe// 'di 'dra'i sems shig skyes par gyur// bdag gis bsod nams che bsags na// ji ltar yongasu de bsngo snyam/ 
329a7(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par bsngo 'am brgya byin nam// gling bzhi'i dbang phyug thob par ram// 'on te nyan thos dngos por 'am// rang rgyal thob pa'i phyir bsngo snyam// de ltar sems skyed de ma thag/ lha rnams sgra 'byin brjod
329a8(dkon brtsegs): pa ni/ dma' ba'i sems kyis bsod nams 'di// rnam par chud gson ma byed cig/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// smon lam rlabs chen gdab par gyis// byang chub sems rab bskyed byas shing // 
329b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rnams kyi dor kyang gyis// de bas chos kyi dbang phyug gtso// rdzogs ngas rgyas la bdag zhu ste// thub pa ji ltar sems bskyed na/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub skye bar 'gyur// ye shes de ni gang gis 'thob// de dod
329b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag la bstan du gsol// byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyis shing // thub pa khyod 'drar bdag kyang smon// de yi tshig de gsan gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen pos shes par gyis// ri
329b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis khyod la bsdar bar bya// chos rnams thams cad rkyer bzhin te// 'dun pa'i rtsal la rab tu gnas// rang gi smod lam ci btab pa// de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// rgyal po ngas kyang sngan chad ni// rdzogs pa
329b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems bskyed gyur// sems cad kun la phan dor du// ngas ni smon lam ngam pa btab// smon lam ji ltar bang tshul du// ngas ni 'bras bu thob par gyur// byang chub dam ngangs thob pas// nga'i
329b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa rdzogs par gyur// rgyal po chen po brtan gyis la// mi 'gyur sems ni bskyed par gyis// gal te spyod pa spyad byas na/ khyod kyang yang dgasangs rgyas 'gyur// thu nga'i gsung de thos gyur ma/ 
329b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po de ni dga' bar gyur// 'jig rten kun gyi mngon sum du// seng ge'i nga ror tshig 'di brjod// 'khor ba'i tha ma med pa yi// sngon gyi tha ma ji srid pa// de srid sems can phar don du// spyod pa dpag yas spyad
329b7(dkon brtsegs): par bya// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga 'dir// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// 'gron pa thams cad mgron gnyer te// dngul zhing phongs las dkrol bar bya// de ring pan chad gal te yang // bdag gis 'dzi
329b8(dkon brtsegs): chags sems bskyed na// phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par 'gyur// byang chub nas zhig thob par du// tha ba'i sems dang gnod sems dang / phrag dog dang ni ser sna yang / de ring pan
330a1(dkon brtsegs): chang de bya'o// tshas pa'i spyod pa bdag gis spyad// sdig pa'i 'dod nga yong su btang // tshul khrims sngo dang nges pa la// sangs rgyas rje su bslang par bya// bdag ni byang chub rings tshul du// 'tshang chu
330a2(dkon brtsegs): mos shing sprong meng // phyi mthar thug gi bar du yang // sems can gcig phyir spyad par bya// tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas zhing ni sbyang bar bya// phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad du// bdag
330a3(dkon brtsegs): gi ming ni thos par bya// bdag gis bdag la lung bstan te// sangs rgyas 'gyur bar dogos pa med// bdag gi lpags bsam rnam par dag/ bdag dang 'din 'dren pa rnams// lus dang ngag gi las rnams kyang
330a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa kun tu bdag gis sbyang // yid kyi las kyang sbyang bar bya// mi dge'i las ni spyad mi bya// ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas te// 2jig rten mgon du 'gyur zhe na// bden pa des ni sa 'di yang // rnam
330a5(dkon brtsegs): pa drug tu g.yos gyur cig/ bdag gi bden tshig gang brjod pa// ma nor yang dag smras shes na// bden pa des ni mkha' dbyings/ las// sil snyan dag gi sgra grag shog/ bdag la gal te
330a6(dkon brtsegs): g.yo med cing // de bzhid thab med cen/ mnang ranga'i me tog bzang // bden pa des ni char du po'o// yeng dag do du nges pa yi// tshig bded nga skad rjo pa dang / phyogs bcu mtha' las thams cad kyi// bye ba la
330a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// de'i mod la mkha' dbyings nas// sil snyan bye ba'i sgra yang byung // me tog man da rab dag/ mi 'greng bdun srid bab par gyur// rgyal po de'i rjes bslabs te/ srog chags
330a8(dkon brtsegs): bye ba nyi shu yis// 'dren par bdag cag 'gyur smon ces// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang bsgrags// de ltar srog chags bya ba'i brag/ nyi shu po rnams thams cad kyang // rgyal po mchog gi rjes slob cing / 
330b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par zhes bya bar byung de gnan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/ khyod kyis de thar ma bcu'o// de ci'i
330b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gnor nur gyur pa 'di nyid/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mamakha' zhes bya bar gyur pa ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis byang chub tu sems bskyed phyir
330b3(dkon brtsegs): chang / bskal pa gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das par gyur to// mi skye nga'i chos la bzod pa thob nas kyang / bskal ba gang ga'i klung drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das par gyur
330b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas nye bar bzung nas/ 'di bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongasu rdzogs so// 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu thams cad yongasu rdzogaso// ring sangs rgyas kyi sa yongasu rdzogaso// 'dis
330b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yong su rdzogs te/ bar 'ga' ya nga nges bdag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'a gyur ram/ mi 'gyur snyam pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par
330b6(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur to// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar/ rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu po nga dag
330b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can tshad meng grangs med nga'i don du sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas nas/ 
330b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas yongasu mya ngan las 'daso// de dag thams cad kyang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis/ sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang / 
331a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la yang dag par btsud de/ thams cad la yang bsnyen bkur dang / yong su spyad par byaso// thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos bzung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa
331a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gad+ma'i klung khri ba ni stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ de ni de bzhin ga
331a3(dkon brtsegs): bsa'i lha zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshad med pa dang / sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu meng bar bzhugs pa ste/ deng lngar 'ang bzhugs shing 'tsho'i gnaso// sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ srog
331a4(dkon brtsegs): chags brgya stong phrag bdun bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam
331a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal gal to// de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang yo ngasu rdzogs/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yang yong su rdzogs/ 
331a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi sa yang yongasu rdzogs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongasu rdzogs na/ ci'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyang skad ces smras pa
331a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos yong su rdzogs na/ yang dang yang
331a8(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des byang chub thob par gyur pas/ thob zin pa ni gzod thob par mi bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu
331b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs shes bya ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid yong su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongasu rdzogs pa'o// na mkha' yong su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
331b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams yongasu rdzogs pa'o// de ltar na na mkha' dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni/ gnyi su med de gnyisu dbyer med de/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs
331b3(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs pa gang yin zhes de skad zer ba la/ gang gzugs yong su rdzogs pa dang / gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yong su rdzogs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam
331b4(dkon brtsegs): longasu rdzogs pa'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal gzugs yongasu rdzog/ sa ni ji lta bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yong su rdzogs pa ni ji lta bu smras pa/ 
331b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gzugs kyi rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa yang la/ par rje su mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal ma mthong ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos gang ca/ 
331b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang ma yin/ mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa de la/ yongasu rdzogs pa 'am/ 'grib par 'gyur ba yod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni med do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar chos ga
331b7(dkon brtsegs): yongasu rdzogs pa yang med// 'grib pa yang med pa de ni yong su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ chos yongasu rdzogs shes bya/ smras pa/ des chos ji ltar shes pa de ltar ye shes 'jug par 'gyur
331b8(dkon brtsegs): / gang gi tshe ye shes 'jug par gyur pa de'i tshe/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// gang gi tshe mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe yong su rdzogs pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa med de / gang yongasu rdzogs
332a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/ 'brib bapa med pa de ni/ mnyam pa'i dang // rigs kyi bu debs na/ gzugs kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de 'ini gzugs yong su rdzogs pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
332a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge 'iri rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags
332a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam yal de ltar khyod yun ring po nas bzod pa thob kyang / bdag gis byang chub thob par bya'o zhes bya ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang skye ba med na/ 
332a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod kyis nga ji ltar sems can gzhan dag byang chub la yang dag par gzung bar bya/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems can gang yang byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
332a5(dkon brtsegs): can med pa dang / sems can dben pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu ga ni/ sa sems can dmigs pa des ni/ byang chub kyang dmigs// gang gis byang chub dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub la sems can
332a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams yang dag par 'dzud par byed kyi/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis ni byang chub kyang ma dmigs sems can yang ma dmigs pas/ de ltar byang chub ses mas can rnams 'jug par mi byed// mnyam pa nyid ni byang chub tu
332a7(dkon brtsegs): smon pa byed pa'ang med/ de las ldog par medado// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam pa nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pas/ de ltar mnyam pa nyid la smon pa med do// ldog pa mdo// de'i phyir 'du byed rnams la gang nas kyang
332a8(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba 'am/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/ de ni mnyam pa nyid do// rigs kyi bu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig ste/ stong pa nyid la smon pa gang yang medo// rigs kyi bu gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad
332b1(dkon brtsegs): du/ de ltar yun ring po nas bzod pa thob na/ ci'i phyir bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byo'o zhes bya bar sems mi skyed ces zer ba ni/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems gang gis byang chub thob par bya ba de lta bu yang
332b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdza su mthob ma/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems la gzugs med cing bstan du med pas byang chub kyang mi tsam ste/ yid las 'byung ba yin pas/ byang chub ces bya ba
332b3(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ sems shes bya ba ni ming tsam ste/ ming gang yin pa de ni dben zhing byed pa'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de las bsams nas/ bdag gis byang chub ji ltar thob par bya snyam du sems skyed pa medo// zhes smras pa
332b4(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems de ni ma skyes pa ste/ ma skyes pa/ la skye ba med do// gang skye ba med pa de la/ thob pa dang mngon parartogs par bya ba gang zhig yod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal mon
332b5(dkon brtsegs): bar rtogs pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang chos tham sa cad la rlom sems med cing / mnyam pa nyid du khong du chu/ dpa 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// ji ltar rdul
332b6(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyis 'du shes kyang mi skyed mi 'gog pa de ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ni/ rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ de ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// yang dag pa'i lta bas
332b7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs te/ mnyam pa nyid la chos gang yang mi dmigs shing ma dmigs pas/ gcig pa 'am/ tha dad par mi byed cing / rlom sems su mi byed pa 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// chos thams cad gang
332b8(dkon brtsegs): 'ang mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu lus kyis mngon sum du byas shing shes kyang lus la'ang mngon par zhen pa med/ sems lang mngon par zhen pa med pa 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa thob pa zhes bya'o// smras
333a1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jab dpa 'a thob pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni rgyub med pa'i tshig ste/ de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o// de'i rgyu ba khams gsum na/ tha skangad du'adi yin nas bstan
333a2(dkon brtsegs): du med de/ 'phags pa rnams kyi thob pa gang yin pa de ni brjod par mi nus// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos deni gnas med cing rgyu ba med pas/ de'i phyir brjod par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ni thob ba med pa
333a3(dkon brtsegs): las thob pa'i sgrar brjod pa ste/ de chos gang yang thob pa yang ma yin ma thob pa yang ma yin pas/ de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o// bar ngo ba / de nas bcom ldan 'das la
333a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis ma ngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
333a5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa sa legs par bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid
333a6(dkon brtsegs): la dris shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis/ mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyi sangs
333a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta zhig tu 'gyur/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang byang chub la mngon par dgar bde la dris shig/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub la mngon pa dga' ba ma yin nas/ smras pa
333a8(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang mngon par dga' ba de ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'o// gang 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de ni sred pa'o// sred pa gang la yod pa de ni skye bar 'gyuraro// skye ba
333b1(dkon brtsegs): gang la yod pa de la tshor ba yod do// gang la tshor ba yod pa de la 'byung ba med de/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ kho bo byang chub la mngon par dga' ba med de/ byang chub tu dmigs pa med pas/ der phyir mngon par sha' bamed
333b2(dkon brtsegs): ngo/ rigs kyi bude la mod kyi 'on kyang gang khyod kyis 'di skang du/ khyad kyis sa rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa jis bu zhig tu 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ de la bdag gis bdag bsod par mi nus te/ de tsor byu
333b3(dkon brtsegs): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad thug su chung ba mngon du bzhugs bzhin du/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bdag nyid kyis brjod na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bas
333b4(dkon brtsegs): bstod du 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 2mngapal khyod kyis khyod nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan pa kod pa'i lam ston cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnang // de ci
333b5(dkon brtsegs): byi zhe na/ khyod las smon lam de ga thos na/ byang chubs/ sadapa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag kyang / spyod pade// bu rdzogs par byeng// 'jam bral gyis gsol pa/ bca ldan
333b6(dkon brtsegs): 'angs pag ning bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' slang po zlog ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bstan par bgyi'o// de nas 'jam dbul gzhon nur gyur ba stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzang te/ bus
333b7(dkon brtsegs): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan las de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la bde log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
333b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i slad du/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer bdag bdag la nyan cing smon lam de dag thos nas kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid la de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid na/ bdag gis bstan par
334a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ro// de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bcugs ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de la phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams gaN+DI klung gi bye ma snyed rnam
334a2(dkon brtsegs): ba drug tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya snying grangs med pa ma
334a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag gis smon lam btab pa ni nam bdag gis phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas bltas na/ sangs rgyas bac+doMs gang
334a4(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdag gis byang chub la yang dag par btsud pa drang / bdag gis byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa dang / bdag gis sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud pa dang / de bzhin du bdag gis
334a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsamapa/ tan dang / shes rab la yang dag par btsud pa dang / bdag gis bskal pa dang / bdag gis rje su bstan par gyur par
334a6(dkon brtsegs): mi mthong ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'o// nam bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas/ phyogs bcur rnam par bltas
334a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang / bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid lam bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de lta bu gang yang mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
334a8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab bo// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la la 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as
334b1(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed cig mthong bar gyur snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa/ thugs kyis thug su chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po song
334b2(dkon brtsegs): go'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di su sbed yan/ skyes bu gang la la zhig skyes par gyur te/ des slong gsum gyi sgong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
334b3(dkon brtsegs): ba rdul phrang ba tu dgas shing bshig ste/ zil bar byas na/ rigs kyi bung ji ska pa mas/ rngub phrab gyi rdub da ga rtsis shes pa'am/ rtsis la shin tum khas padag gis/ brgya brag 'di byed cin yang
334b4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ stong phrag 'di skad cig yod do na 'am/ brgya sring 'bum tha ga'adi skad cig yod de'i 'am/ bye ba phrag 'di snyed cig po don 'am/ bye ba brgya phrag 'di snyed cig ya 'am/ bye ba
334b5(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do'i 'am/ bye brgya dang 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod de na 'am/ bgrang ba'am/ gnas pa 'am/ cad gdung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
334b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ni ma lag so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni/ ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyad sgrib pa med pas rnam par bltas na/ phyobs
334b7(dkon brtsegs): re rer yang de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis na/ bdag gis sangs
334b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gcig gaN+DIr klung du ma'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tsam gyi/ mthar grung yangs par yong su ma grub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i phyir rin po che brgya stong 'bum phrag du ma las/ grub pa dang / rin po che brgya
335a1(dkon brtsegs): stong 'bum phrag dums smras pa/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam du ma gyur gyi bar du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyid par smor lam btab bo// 
335a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nger / stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i// tshad tsam gyi byang chub kyi shing skyes te/ byang chub shing de'i rod kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de// thams cad
335a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas shing khyab par gyur cig/ ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab po// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis/ byang chub kyi shing de'i drung du/ bdag 'dug pa'i tshe/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
335a4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du/ byang chub kyi shing drung de nas ma langs kyang / bdag gi sprul pa phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig/ phrag
335a5(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnam sa la chos ston par gyur cig/ ces bgyi bar smon lam de ska dang / tab po// bcom ldan las gzhan yang bdag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
335a6(dkon brtsegs): der/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi ming tsam yang ye med par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang da/ za ba dang / 'chab pa med par tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongasu dag par spyod pa sha stag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gang la/ 
335a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang mi grag cing / mngal du skye ba med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang / gos ngur smrig gyon cing / skyil mo dkrung bcas par rdzus te byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ni
335a8(dkon brtsegs): shin tu dag par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med par gshegs shing sems can rnams la chos ston pa de dag/ theg pa gsum las brtsam/ 
335b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ mos pa'i tshul bzhin du/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas med cing byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smod lam
335b2(dkon brtsegs): de skad btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur
335b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba byang chub mang par rdzogs pangs sa rgyas na/ ming driskad ces bgyi bar 'gyu/ bcom ldan las kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya bar 'dzung // mi
335b4(dkon brtsegs): kyibu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de/ ci'i phyi kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs pa des/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
335b5(dkon brtsegs): ba khrag khrig brgya stong / tshad med grangs med pa kun gyis sargya/ sa bcom ldan las rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / sems kyi ni gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bar gyur pa de dag zangs
335b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu da ltar byung ba'i dus sam/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
335b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa de mtshan gang gis thos pa de dag ni mi 'gyur ba la zhugs pa dang / mos pa chung ba'i gang zag rnams ma gtogs par thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
335b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
336a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis dga' ba'i zas dang ldan par 'gyur bar smon lam mdzad pa lta bu'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni
336a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag kha zas kyi 'du shes shig skyes par gyur na/ de ma thag tu skad cig de la de dag gi lag pa g.yas par ro bro ba brgya phrag du ma dang ldan
336a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i kha zas kyis gang ba'i snod mngon du byung bar gyur la/ snod de dag byung ma thag tu de dag 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as rnams la ma phul/ sems can dbul zhing
336a4(dkon brtsegs): phongs pas sdug bsngal ba dang / mgon med par gyur pa dag dang / yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa gang dag lo stong phrag du mar yang mchil ma'i thal ba 'ga' yang mi rnyed pa de lta bu dag yongasu tshim pa ma byas par
336a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyis bza' ba'i tshul pa mi 'dra'o// zhes bgyi bar dran/ pa thob par gyur cing de'i mod la de dag mngon par shes pa la yod su grub par gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan gong rnam pa' la mchib
336a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rlung ltar thogs pa ma mchis pa'i shugs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang chad ma mchis pa dag tu phyin nas/ kha zas de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang phul/ 
336a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can phongs shing ltogs pa dang / mgon ma mchis pa rnams dang / yi dwags kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa rnams kyang yongasu tshim par bgyis nas/ de dag la chos bstan te/ skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
336a8(dkon brtsegs): slar mchi bar gyur cig ces smon lam de skad btab bo// bac+doMs gzhan yang bdag gis ni bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ bdag gis dus kyi zhing deng byang chub sems dpa' gang ji skad cig skyes pa de dag gos rin po
336b1(dkon brtsegs): che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mongs spyod dang ldan par gyur te/ bsams pa tsam gyis ci la dgar ba'i gos rin po che/ dge sbyong gi tshul dang 'thun par du ba dag byung bar gyur la/ gos rin po che de dag byung ma thag tu 'di ma ma du
336b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar bdag cag gis gos 'di lta bu phyogs bcu ri sangs rgyas bcom ldan ladas rnams la ma phul bar bdag cag nyid kyis yongasu spyad pa ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o snyam pa'i dran pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag gi sems
336b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar skyes ma thag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag tu mchis shing gos de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bkab ste/ slar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mchis
336b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ ci dga' ba'i gos rin po che la spyod par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skang btab bo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
336b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po de dag gi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyad pa gang ji snyed cig/ mchis pa de dag thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan las nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dag la phul nas/ slad
336b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bdag cag yongasu spyod par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ mi khom pa brgyad ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni ma dge ba'i sgra ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing den/ sdug bsngal gyi
336b7(dkon brtsegs): sgra ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ skyon du 'gyur ba'i sgra ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa yid du mi 'ongs pa ma mchis par gyur cig ces
336b8(dkon brtsegs): bgyi bar smon lam btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen blo/ seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang du/ 
337a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ming ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin
337a2(dkon brtsegs): du yong su rdzogs shing dag la rdul med pa bsags pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu 'gyuraro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de phyogs gang logs shig tu 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
337a3(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de ni lho phyogs log su 'byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid kyang de'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal
337a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon dur gyur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni smon lam ji ltar btab pa ste/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du bas gang
337a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing nor bu rin po du mas spras pas nor bu rin po che kun tu bstan pa/ 'dra la/ rin po che de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bkod bsngan chad ma mthong zhing / mi srid pa sha stag ste/ de dag gi ming
337a6(dkon brtsegs): brjod na yang lo bye ba brgya stong thogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nor bu rin po che dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su gang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de la byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi
337a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing gser las grub par mthong bar dgaro snyam na yang des gser las grub par mthong ba dang / dngul las grub par mthong bar dga'o snyam na yang dngul las grub par mthong la gzhan gyis gsar las grub par mthong ba ma
337a8(dkon brtsegs): mchis par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du bai DUr+ya las grub pa dang / shel las grub pa dang / mu tig dmar po las grub pa dang / rdo'i snying po las grub pa dang / sU las grub pa 'am// de bzhin du rin po che sna tsho
337b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyu las grub pa dang / tsan dan las grub pa 'am/ a ka ru las grub pa 'am/ ta ga ra las grub pa 'am/ ta ma la'i lo ma las grub pa 'am/ tsan dang sbrul gyi snying po las grub pa 'am/ tsan dan dmar po las grub pa
337b2(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ su rnam pa ji lta bur 'dod pa de dag gis de bzhin du mthong ste/ phan tshun nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par mthong bar yang ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub kyi shing da las 'od byung ba dang / 
337b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rang rang las 'od byung bar snang zhing gsal ba ma gtogs par nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi mngon/ skar ma dang / rin po che dang / zhugs dang / glog gam/ sems can gzhan gang gi 'od kyang mi mngon
337b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gang dag ji tsam du 'od kyis khyab par dga' ba/ tha na sa sa rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum de snyed du de dag gi 'od kyi sa gsal bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems pa
337b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par gyis me tog kha bye ba dang / khazu ma par 'gyur ba dang / gang su tshod rnam pa ji lta bu yo mu s+thA dpapar tshal bde bzhid du de'i grub pa ma gtogs par nyin mngon
337b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi ming yang ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ grang ba dang / tsha bal ma mchis/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'ang ma mchis te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar
337b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mchis shing dgar ldan gyi gnas/ tshe bas par bgyis nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de stang gi bar snang las/ sil
337b8(dkon brtsegs): bAr ltar mi da 'bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag tu rkun mi 'cha par sgra 'byin pa dang / sil snyad de dag las kyang 'dod ba dang ldan pa'i sgra 'i 'byung gi/ gzhan dun pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi snga
338a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos kyi sgra nga / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam gras kyi sgra 'byed par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji lta bung bos pa'i sgra de lta bu thos par 'gyur ba
338a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa blta 'tshal na/ 'chag gam/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ngam/ sdong dang / mchis kyang rung ste/ gang dag der sangs rgyas lta ba'i yid la bgyi ba skyes pa thag tu dag
338a3(dkon brtsegs): gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa de/ de nyid na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur cing / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de
338a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ma thag tu de dag gi the tsom 'am nem nur ram/ yid gnyis sam/ chos kyi som nyid gang ci mchis pa yongasu chad par 'gyur te/ bsta/ da mi 'tshal bar chos kyi tshig de'i dod yongasu 'tshal bar gyur cig cem ldan
338a5(dkon brtsegs): lam btab bo// de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' bye/ ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du pas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ gang 'di kun du gzigs pa zhes bya ba mtshan de ni tshul dang 'dra ba ste/ 
338a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag gis bcom ldan las de bzhin gshegs bku na tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag kyang / rnyed pa legs pa legs par rnyed pa yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur pa lta ci
338a7(dkon brtsegs): smos te/ gang bdag gis lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / gang dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming thos pa de dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong bar blta'o// de skad
338a8(dkon brtsegs): ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhino// ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dag gang gis sangs rgyas bye ba
338b1(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi mtshan brjod pa bas ni/ gang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming brjod na/ 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs
338b2(dkon brtsegs): pade'i mtshan brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bskal pa re re zhing sems can gyi dor ji snyed du byas pa'i sems can gyi don de ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag
338b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bum gyis kyang ma mdzad do// de nas 'khor de'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bru

338b5(dkon brtsegs): mongal srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems skye sa par gyuro// sems can tshad med pa dag kyang / dge ba'i rgyu
338b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yongasu smin par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to// 
338b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
338b8(dkon brtsegs): tan bkod pa'i rgyan dang / smon lam gyi rgyan dang / mtshan nyid dang / mtshan ma dang / spyod pa dang / gnas kyi rnam pa'i rgyan gang ji snyed cig mthong ba las nyan thos kyi bkod pa dang / snyigs ma lnga'i sangs rgyas
339a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams ma gtogs par de dag thabs cang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gi mang du 'dus pa dang / kho su chud par bya'o zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das bag

339a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par dbang du gyur pa gzhan gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas thug su chud do//

339a6(dkon brtsegs): kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur pas/ rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de bkod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sa

339a8(dkon brtsegs): gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis thug su chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo
339b1(dkon brtsegs): brgyar gshegs pa'i chas/ rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thig pa gcig blangs na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ chu blangs pa de dang / byin las pa de gnyis gang mang bar 'gyur/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

339b3(dkon brtsegs): du ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o// rgya mtsho chen po na chu'i thigs pa ji snyed cig yod pa de tsam du ni/ bcom

340b8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ byang chub sems dpanga' sems dpa' bo lus dang gang ba ni sranyis stong tsam du gyur ba gsug gas panor cing mdun gyis byis te/ byang chub kyi shing gi yon tan bkod pa dums rab tu btur

341b8(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yo su rdzogs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po 'od kyi tog dang ye shes bla ma dang / zhi ba'i dbang po dang smon lapa blo gros dag kyang phyogs ba'i das khang pa brtsegs pa bai DUr+ya'i
342a1(dkon brtsegs): mngag tu 'dug pa ma mus pa med par bzang ba dag gi nang du zhugs te/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dungs yongasu bskor cing mdun dubu dang te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed/ me
342a2(dkon brtsegs): ga gi char chen po ni rab tu 'bebs/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum ni sgra 'byin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis 'od ba snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan las la byang chub sa dar sangar chen po
342a3(dkon brtsegs): byams pa 'di sa ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ 'jig rten du gas cher g.yos par gyur pa dang / phyogs bzhi nas khang pa brtsegs pa ba ni mchis par gdar bar gyur/ bcom ldan las kyis
342a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' ba'i po dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bskul nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la/ dbalta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ong bar gyur to// de skad ces bka'
342a5(dkon brtsegs): stsal nas/ ring po ma lon par der mong la/ byang chub sems da bzhi po de dag lhags te/ lhags nas kyang khang brtsegs pa de / nas babs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
342a6(dkon brtsegs): thub pa ga la der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan las kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun skor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag
342a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khod ma thag tu tha dang ldan pa'i 'khor phyogs bzhi nas/ snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi budag skyes rjes pa
342a8(dkon brtsegs): los pa bzhi po 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go gyon pa/ 'jug pa chen pos yang dag par zhugs pa yin gyis// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis skyes bu ngas la rim gro skyed la/ chos dris regs
342b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu dag skyes bu ngas pa 'di dag gi smon lam nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu das pa 'di dag gi smon lam ni rnam pa 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang su dag gis bdag
342b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de dag thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shur 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar gyur cing / pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongasu rdzog @#
342b3(dkon brtsegs): cig/ bud med gcig gis bdag cag gi ming thos na yang myur du bud med kyi lus las 'gyur bar shog shig ces bya ba de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pa dgo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi/ nga de bstan
342b4(dkon brtsegs): de/ rdzu 'phrul de dag phyir brtul ba mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nga yang mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs chos zad ni sgyu ma lta bu
342b5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na snum mkhan ni sgyu ma sprul pa/ yang bgyid/ sgyu ma mchis par yang bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'a ngas de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang skye yang skye 'gag kyang dag
342b6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ gang la skye ba dang 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do// bac+doMs mnyam pa nyid la slob pa'i byang chub se de'i se dar chen po ni myur du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
342b7(dkon brtsegs): rgya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal byang chub ji lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis
342b8(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ gang sus kyang ma thob ma bshig cing gang la yod pa 'am/ med par chags pa dmig su med pa'o// byang chub se der ye shes bla mas smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub de ji tsam du yod pas kyang mi 'thob/ 
343a1(dkon brtsegs): med pas kyang mi 'thob bam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa ste/ yod par ma gyur mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'thob par 'gyur
343a2(dkon brtsegs): ba mdo// smras pa/ 'jam dpal tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pas/ de skad du ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba gang yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal
343a3(dkon brtsegs): gang phung po rnams kyang mi mthong / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyang mi mthong la/ dmus long yang ma yin/ sha'i mig can yang ma yin/ zhing chos gang la yang mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa dang / chos gang
343a4(dkon brtsegs): yang 'phel ba dang / 'grib par mi mthong ba 'di ni chos kyi tshul gci ga tu bstan pa zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid dang / 
343a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gal zhing chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'di dag ni song / so'i skye bo'i choso// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 2de dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya bar tha dad du mi 'byed ni/ 
343a6(dkon brtsegs): gang 'di dben pa'i tshul gcig la 'jug pa 'di ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid la yang zhugs la/ de bzhin nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu mi byed cing
343a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni zab po zhes bya bar mi rtog pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mi zad pas smras pa/ chos thams cad kyi zad pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu zad pa ste kang
343a8(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mi zad par chos ston pa de'i chos nyid las 'gal bar mi byed pa ste/ de ltar bstan pa 'di gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa legs par sems
343b1(dkon brtsegs): pas smras pa/ gang bsam pas bsam du med pa la yang 'jug la/ bsam du med pa des kyang rlom semasu mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub se s+ya
343b2(dkon brtsegs): rdul dang bral bas smras pa/ gang 'dod chags dang shin tu bral ba de ni mtshan ma thams cad la 'dod chags pa yang med/ 'dod chags dang bral ba yang med/ rje su chags pa yang med/ khong khro ba yang med rgyas
343b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang med/ gcig tu byed pa yang med/ gnyi su byed pa yang med/ byed pa yang med/ mi byed pa yang med/ len pa yang med/ 'dor ba yang med/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu
343b4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos smras pa/ gang rgya ma tshe lta bur zab ci gting dpag dkar ba'i chos la zhugs pa de/ sa la'ang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la/ ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin
343b5(dkon brtsegs): du chos ston cing / bdag dang gzhan du rlom sems mi byed pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// zla ba'i bla ma gzhon nur gyur pas/ smras pa/ gang sems cad
343b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis/ zla ba lta bur gyur kyang sems can de dag la yang rlom sems med pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan gyi
343b7(dkon brtsegs): mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/ gang mya ngan thams cad rgyun chad pa de ni mya ngan med cing zhum par 'gyur pa mdo// sems can rnams ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa'o// de la mya ngan gyi rtsa ba gang
343b8(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ gang 'di ngang 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa ste/ gang ra 'dzin pa dang / nga yid 'dzin pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing chos ston pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
344a1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa med pas smras pa/ gang long pa'i khams la yang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang rangasangs rgyas kyi chos la yang mi dpan
344a2(dkon brtsegs): bde ltar bstan pa gang yid pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun du lta bas smras pa/ gang chos ston na gang 'di stor pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid du ston la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sengs
344a3(dkon brtsegs): su mi byed/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yo su dag pas smras pa/ gang chas ston pa'i tshe/ 'khor gsum
344a4(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'khor gsum gang zhe na/ bdag ming mi gas pa dang / chos mnyan pa mi dmigs pa dang / chos la yang mdo na par zhen pa med pa'o// 'di ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i
344a5(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro/ ba grub pas smras pa/ gang chos thams cad 'du ba med par ya
344a6(dkon brtsegs): shing ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du yang sngon la 'di lnga ste/ chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i phyir le ge gcig kyang mi rjod par de ltar bstan pa gang yid pa ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems na
344a7(dkon brtsegs): zab mor spyod pas smras pa/ gang chos thams cad kyi zab pa nyid kyang shes la/ chos de yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong / gang ston pa dang / gang la bstan pa dang / gang bstan pa de yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba de
344a8(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po gzi brjid chen po dag gis so so nas rang rang gi spobs pa
344b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// tshul gcig tu bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpar bye ba phrag bdun nu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad
344b2(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// dge slong bdun stong ni nye bar len pa med pas zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lha dang mi'i skye dgu las khrag khris
344b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa drug ni chos la chos kyi rig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon por bsgrags pa'i sgras la
344b4(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ga zigs pa de'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni/ ji snyed cig/ tu 'gyur/ de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ 'jam
344b5(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ji srid cig na/ bla na med pa yang wa/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'jam
344b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyidadi la dris shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge ri rtsal gyis mngon par sbags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 
344b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod ji srid cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'ajam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe/ na mkha'i khams gzugs can du gyur pa
344b8(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang
345a1(dkon brtsegs): gi tshe dgra bcom bzag bzang pa/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang gi tshe rmi lam gyi skyes bu dang / brag cha
345a2(dkon brtsegs): dang mig yod dang chu zla dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// gang gi tshe nyi mi bya chen por thung ba la
345a3(dkon brtsegs): zla ba'i 'od kyis nyin mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu de lta yin gyis/ su byang chub tu smon pa de la dris shig/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub
345a4(dkon brtsegs): du mi smod tam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal nyid kyang byang chub la/ byang chub nyid kyang 'jam dang lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang 'di

345a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'iri rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
345a7(dkon brtsegs): med kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / nyan thos 'dus pa mthong ngam/ zos sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong ngo thos so// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ji
345a8(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// bde bar gshegs pa de ni bgrang du ma mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper ra
345b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi nga nas til gyi 'bru cig blangs na/ rigs kyi bu til gyi 'bru gcig po ji lta ba de lta bur ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / 
345b2(dkon brtsegs): til gyi lhag ma las pa ltar ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus par blta'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ stong ga
345b3(dkon brtsegs): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thal bar blags te/ rdul phra rab tu byas pa de la rigs kyi bu/ rdul phrag rab ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de bzhu
345b4(dkon brtsegs): byas kyang / brgya'i char yang smos par mi 'gyuraro// stong gi cha dbye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang / bye rab khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang cha dang
345b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyur yang stongs par mi 'gyur// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan la su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i tshe'i tshang
345b6(dkon brtsegs): ni tshad med grangs med par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab tu blags te/ thal bar byas pa la/ 
345b7(dkon brtsegs): de las skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul cig khyer te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ der rdul phra rab kyi rdul cig gzhag ste/ skyes bu des tshul
345b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du/ shar phyogs log su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag zang zad zad du bkod par gyur la/ de bzhin du skyes bu gnyis pa zhig skyes te/ des kyang lho phyogs log su de snyed rdul phra rab kyi rdul re ra nas tshul de bzhin du
346a1(dkon brtsegs): 'o te/ de bzhi du phyogs bcu kyis bu dus bu ris chul de dang 'dra de na kyi dru phral kyi rdus pa du nas pad na rigs kyi bu ji sna du sems/ so gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
346a2(dkon brtsegs): khams de dag brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// stong drag ni 'di ste cigayod// 'bram phrag ni 'di stod cig yong // bye ba'i drag ni 'di snyed cig yod// bya ba brgya thag ni 'di na tshig mang // bya ba stor blag di ni
346a3(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig yod do// bye ba 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod// bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod// gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod// dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod// mi 'khrugs pa'i phrag ni 'di skad

346a5(dkon brtsegs): gi gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang / gang ga tu phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul ded/ gabor ba dang gang dag las 'das te/ rdul phra rab ma
346a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad brtags te/ rdul phra rab tu blags na/ rigs kyi bu da ji snyam du sems/ rdul phra rab de dag rtsis shes pa 'am/ rtsis la mkhas pas brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig
346a7(dkon brtsegs): phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod// 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod// bye ba phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod// bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod// bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod// bye ba 'bam
346a8(dkon brtsegs): yod// bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig stedo// dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod// mi 'a khrugs pa'i phag ni 'jis
346b1(dkon brtsegs): 'am gzhal ba 'am/ tshang bzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpe de la ni sems can rnams mos par 'gyur gyi ngan 'chal
346b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ rdul phra rab de dag bgrang ba'i tshul gyis brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yong // stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yang //

346b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa thang du thug su chud // de nas bac+doMs la byang chub se der sang 'a chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lnga na 'das gal te/ ye shes chen po de lta bu'i slad du rgya
346b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' seng chen po phyi ma'i mtha'i lur thug par skyed dmyal ba chen por 'dregs kyang bac+doMs de ni byang chub se sa de chen po des bzod par bgyi'o// de la bu'i ye shes chen pa ni yo su btang ba ma
346b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams bde bzhin// ji sa smras pa de bzhin te/ man mos pa chung ngungungul mche ba dang / brtson 'grus rung ba ma gtogs pa da su khrig de lta bu'i ye shes chen pa la les
346b8(dkon brtsegs): ba mi skyed/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ srog chags khri byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags
347a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rna la 'dis rtses pa 'gyul to// rigs kyi bu ra byos bcud/ skyes bu nu ba dag gis song gsus kyi stong chen par 'jig rten gyi khams ji zhe cig 'as pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
347a2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag tu phyin te/ rdul phrag rab kyi rdul bor ba dang / gang dag las 'as te mthor bde cang rdul brar 'du blags pa de dag pas kyang mang ba'i bskal bar du 'jam da la gzhon dur gyur ba byang chub kyi spyad ba spyod par 'gyur// ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
347a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyung po'i smon lam ni bsam gyis mi bya ba/ yang ga par 'jug pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang bsam gyis kyi
347a4(dkon brtsegs): khyab par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan ladas 'di ltas/ 'jam dbul gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ltar bskal pa 'di ste du lang / 
347a5(dkon brtsegs): ba mi skyed pa'i 'jug pa chen po dngo mtshar lag so// bcom ldan 'ad sa spyod pa chen po mtshar lag so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di'i snyam du sems nam pa'i khams 'di snyam du gag dang rim dku byed
347a6(dkon brtsegs): dus dang lo dang bskal pa brgya dang / bskal bstod dang / bskal pa bye ba dang / bskal ba khrag khrig dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dang / gtams dang dkrigs dang mi 'khrugs pa zhig la so snyam du sems sam/ smras pa/ dpal de/ 
347a7(dkon brtsegs): nim yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ namakha'i khams la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phying// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis/ chos thams cad nam khar lta bu pa khong du chud// cinas kyi / papa'i
347a8(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa de ltar khong du chud pa de ni 'di snyam du zhag gcig las par gyur to// nyi ma gcig 'das par gyur to zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du lo 'di snyed cig 'das par gyur to nas rnam par mi rtog/ khro yang
347b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i 'du shes gang yang 'jug pa medo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ namakha'i khams ni bskal pa gad+hI'i rlung gi bye ma snyed pas lhag pa zhig 'das par gyur kyang / skyo zhing lo su yi 'chang pa meng / 
347b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ tshig pa 'am/ 'gyes par 'gyur ba medo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ namakha'i khams la dngos po med pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad ngos po med par shes pa
347b3(dkon brtsegs): slo ba dang yo mu yi chad pa'i sems mi skyed // rigs kyi bu gang namakha'i khams shes bya ba de la ni 'tshig pa med skyo ba med/ yi 'chang ba med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ rga ba med/ nab med/ 'chi ba med/ 'pho bamed 'byung bam
347b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba meng / 'gro ba mdo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang la 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i ming 'di la yang 'tshig pa med/ skyo ba med/ yi 'chad pa med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ rga ba med/ na ba med 'chi ba
347b5(dkon brtsegs): med/ 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba ma do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ming de shin tu dben pa'i phyir// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dang
347b6(dkon brtsegs): po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu gzhan yang dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smraso// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha
347b7(dkon brtsegs): bde dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang gis thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das sems cad pa
347b8(dkon brtsegs): ngag 'di skang du bdag cag gis gang 'dis sa rgyas kyi chos yong su gzung ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya'o// bcad par bya'o// klag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bstan papa
348a1(dkon brtsegs): bya'o zhes tshig tu rjod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bangan don dang ldan pa ma lagaso// de nas bcom ldan las la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'disad ces gsol
348a2(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan la sa gas kyi thu'ab rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam gram 'di thos na 'dzin tam/ 'chabs/ rtog gas/ kun rgyu par bgyid dam/ 'jug par bgying dam/ gzhan la yang tu cher bstan pa dang / 
348a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jam bral gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjesu bslab po zhes sems bskyed pa de/ bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan las kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' gang la las/ phyogs bcur de
348a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig gzigs pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste// de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba dang / rnam grangs de ni/ 
348a5(dkon brtsegs): du sems can thaMd la snyoms pa'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thang yang dag par blangs pa la gnas te/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thu/ gi bar du sbyin pa byin pa pas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gi
348a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'jug par byed dam/ gzhan la yang rgya cher ston tam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rje su bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i
348a7(dkon brtsegs): bar dusams skyed cing gom pa bdun 'dod na/ bsod nas kyi phung po de la/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ro// breng
348a8(dkon brtsegs): stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya stong phrag 'bum gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyar yang mi
348b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam ngal gzhon nur gyur ba la ga 'i byang chubasems pa'i ting 'dzin kun ras ldang bar sna du bur byung ba zhes bya ba la son sa tshus de me gang ma ma'o du rdzu ca ting len du la snyams
348b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis phyogs bcu ri 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yab mu me dang de dag gi/ sma sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dang
348b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi spyan snga na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug cing / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ston par mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de ltar 'jig rten gyi
348b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrags yo cig car du snang bar gyur pa ni smon lam dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi khyad par ngo mtshar che 'o snyam du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
348b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sa ma' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces pa/ sol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bac+doMs kyi bkar stsal pa/ byams pa de'i phyir
348b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mings su rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkong ba bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ 
348b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems yang dag par dga' bar byed pa zhes bya bar yang zu shig de nas de'i tshe 'khor der phyogs bcu dag nas/ byang chub sa ra tshad de dgras med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos kyi rnam
348b8(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ ma tog gi char chen po pha ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong shing / 'di skad du kye ma sangs rgyas/ kye ma sangs rgyas/ deng ni bdag
349a1(dkon brtsegs): drungamangs par garjid dung mi byes pa/ tha red ba yang 'ab rdzogs pa byang chub la byung ba ldog par gyu to// mams can cang ring pa'ang 'a ba'i rtsa ba rolas du chub par chur to// ma ldang pa
349a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam pal gzhon dur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byabs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus
349a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / dge slong ga dang / lha dang / mi dang / lham yin nga / dri za bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi mas / bcom ldan 'das kyis
349a4(dkon brtsegs): gsus pa'i mngon par 'ong ngo // 'phags pa dgod mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam gras le'u stong bral brgyu las/ 'phags pa 'jam pas
349a5(dkon brtsegs): sa rgyas kyi gang gi yon tan bkong pa zhes bya ba'i leru ste bco lnga rdzogs so// / rgyag gyi ma ngan po ni len dra ba deng / 'dzin mi tA dang / bu chen gyi lo tsa ba bang
349a6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes rjes bsgyur cing zhus te/ sang gas chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la babapa/ 'am po gsum ba// go log brgya bzhi bcu// bkra shis/ la ga'is su
x1a1(dkon brtsegs): nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang stong pashing med
x1a2(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid las gud na yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med de/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam ya
x1a3(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med stong po nyid las gud na yang 'phags
x1a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad ba med de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam
x1a5(dkon brtsegs): yan lag brgyad pa yi na/ da gi/  de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu las gud na yang ste
x1a6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid med/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yin no// de bzhin du
x1a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyar te// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las gung na
x1a8(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi
x1b1(dkon brtsegs): chos pa 'dres pa poco brgyad yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA dwa ti'i bugal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pan/ spyong nga zhes byabar khas mi lan/ mi spong
x1b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar khas mi len/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar mi len/ spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar mkhas par mi len na/ byang chub sems dpa'
x1b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa yin no// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
x1b4(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na
x1b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad du khas mi len/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sh+tsa radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ing bo nyid dmig su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes
x1b6(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ khaMs mi len to// de bzhin du sbyar te/ spyod pa yang ma yin/ mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba 'di lta bur yang khas mi len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
x1b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rje su zhugs pa dang / gzung ba med pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting 'dzin gyi chos thams cad nye bar
x1b8(dkon brtsegs): len pa med pa'i rgya che ba'i yo byad tshad med par gtogs pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mongs ma yin pa ste/ ting 'dzin 'di nyid dang ma bral ba'i byang chub sems
x2a1(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i bzod ba thob pa ste bcu pa'o// bzod pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ 'gro
x2a2(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa'i tshul du 'gro ba med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob// 'gag pa med pa'i tshul du skye ba med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo// 'jig pa med pa'i tshul du 'pho ba med pa
x2a3(dkon brtsegs): lus rab tu 'thob bo// 'ji ltar mthong ba ma yin pa'i tshul du bden pa med pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo// mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul du
x2b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa'i midog yongasu sbyong bzhes bya'o// matog gi lta la la gzi med par grub ba'i rnam par thang bani/ chos thams par la spyod bkun du gnon pa com pa zhes
